 11481                                  ;Break	<MSG_RETRIEVAL- get beginning addr of system and parser messages>
 11482                                  
 11483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11484                                  ;   DOS 4.00
 11485                                  ;
 11486                                  ;   Inputs:	DL=0 get extended error message addr
 11487                                  ;		  =1 set extended error message addr
 11488                                  ;		  =2 get parser error message addr
 11489                                  ;		  =3 set parser error message addr
 11490                                  ;		  =4 get critical error message addr
 11491                                  ;		  =5 set critical error message addr
 11492                                  ;		  =6 get file system error message addr
 11493                                  ;		  =7 set file system error message addr
 11494                                  ;		  =8 get address for code reduction
 11495                                  ;		  =9 set address for code reduction
 11496                                  ;   Function:	get/set message address
 11497                                  ;   Outputs:	ES:DI points to addr when get
 11498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11499                                  
 11500                                  ;Procedure MSG_RETRIEVAL,NEAR
 11501                                  ;	ASSUME	CS:DOSCODE,SS:NOTHING
 11502                                  
 11503                                  ; 23/09/2023
 11504                                  ;MSG_RETRIEVAL:
 11505                                  
 11506                                  ;;	NOTE:  This function lives in command.com resident code now.
 11507                                  ;;	If the int 2F ever gets this far, we'll return registers
 11508                                  ;;	unchanged, which produces the same result as before, if
 11509                                  ;;	command.com wasn't present (and therefore no messages available).
 11510                                  ;;
 11511                                  ;;	I didn't point the entry in the 2F table to No_Op because
 11512                                  ;;	No_Op zeroes AL.
 11513                                  ;;
 11514                                  ;;;hkn; set up ds to point to DOSDATA
 11515                                  ;;	push	ds
 11516                                  ;;	getdseg	<ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 11517                                  ;;
 11518                                  ;;	PUSH	AX		    ;AN000;;MS. save regs
 11519                                  ;;	PUSH	SI		    ;AN000;;MS. save regs
 11520                                  ;;	MOV	AX,DX		    ;AN000;;MS.
 11521                                  ;;	MOV	SI,OFFSET DOSDATA:MSG_EXTERROR ;AN000;;MS.
 11522                                  ;;	test	AL,1		    ;AN000;;MS. get ?
 11523                                  ;;	JZ	toget		    ;AN000;;MS. yes
 11524                                  ;;	DEC	AL		    ;AN000;;MS.
 11525                                  ;;toget:				    ;AN000;
 11526                                  ;;	SHL	AL,1		    ;AN000;;MS. times 2
 11527                                  ;;	XOR	AH,AH		    ;AN000;;MS.
 11528                                  ;;	ADD	SI,AX		    ;AN000;;MS. position to the entry
 11529                                  ;;	test	DL,1		    ;AN000;;MS. get ?
 11530                                  ;;	JZ	getget			     ;AN000;;MS. yes
 11531                                  ;;	MOV	WORD PTR DS:[SI],DI    ;AN000;;MS. set MSG
 11532                                  ;;	MOV	WORD PTR DS:[SI+2],ES  ;AN000;;MS. address to ES:DI
 11533                                  ;;	JMP	SHORT MSGret		     ;AN000;;MS. exit
 11534                                  ;;getget: 				     ;AN000;
 11535                                  ;;	LES	DI,DWORD PTR DS:[SI]	     ;AN000;;MS. get msg addr
 11536                                  ;;MSGret: 				     ;AN000;
 11537                                  ;;	POP	SI			     ;AN000;;MS.
 11538                                  ;;	POP	AX			     ;AN000;;MS.
 11539                                  ;;
 11540                                  ;;	pop	ds
 11541                                  
 11542                                  ;	return				     ;AN000;;MS. exit
 11543                                  
 11544                                  ; 23/09/2023
 11545                                  ;	retn	; 29/04/2019

 11603                                  ;============================================================================
 11604                                  ; CRIT.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 11605                                  ;============================================================================
 11606                                  ; 12/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11607                                  
 11608                                  ; Critical Section Routines
 11609                                  
 11610                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 - MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:513Ah
 11611                                  
 11612                                  ; 06/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 11613                                  ; DOSCODE:5126h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 11614                                  
 11615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11616                                  ; Each handler must leave everything untouched; including flags!
 11617                                  ;
 11618                                  ; Sleaze for time savings: first instruction is a return. This is patched
 11619                                  ; by the sharer to be a PUSH AX to complete the correct routines.
 11620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11621                                  
 11622                                  ; (DOSMAC.INC, MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 11623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11624                                  ; Some old versions of the 80286 have a bug in the chip. The popf instruction
 11625                                  ; will enable interrupts. Therefore in a section of code with interrupts
 11626                                  ; disabled and you need a popf instruction use the 'popff' macro instead.
 11627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11628                                  
 11629                                  ;%macro POPFF 0
 11630                                  ;	jmp	$+3
 11631                                  ;	iret
 11632                                  ;	push	cs
 11633                                  ;	call	$-2
 11634                                  ;%endmacro
 11635                                  
 11636                                  ; ---------------------------
 11637                                  
 11638                                  ; 14/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11639                                  %if 0
 11640                                  
 11641                                  ;Procedure  ECritDisk,NEAR
 11642                                  	;public  ECritMEM
 11643                                  	;public  ECritSFT
 11644                                  ECritMEM:
 11645                                  ECritSFT:
 11646                                  ;
 11647                                  ECritDisk:
 11648                                  
 11649                                  ;SR; Check if critical section is to be entered
 11650                                  
 11651                                  	pushf
 11652                                  	cmp	byte [ss:redir_patch],0
 11653                                  	jz	short ECritDisk_2
 11654                                  
 11655                                  ; 06/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 11656                                  ;	;popff  ; * (macro)
 11657                                  ;	jmp	short ECritDisk_1 ; *
 11658                                  ;
 11659                                  ;ECritDisk_iret: ; *
 11660                                  ;	iret ; *
 11661                                  
 11662                                  	; 16/12/2022
 11663                                  	; 13/11/2022
 11664                                  	;jmp	short ECritDisk_1
 11665                                  	; 06/11/2022
 11666                                  ;ECritDisk_iret:
 11667                                  ;	iret	
 11668                                  
 11669                                  	; 06/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 11670                                  ECritDisk_1:
 11671                                  	push	cs ; *
 11672                                  	call	ECritDisk_iret ; *		
 11673                                  	
 11674                                  ECritDisk_0:
 11675                                  	PUSH    AX
 11676                                  	;MOV	AX,8000h+critDisk
 11677                                  	;INT	int_IBM
 11678                                  	mov	ax,8001h
 11679                                  	int	2Ah	; Microsoft Networks - BEGIN DOS CRITICAL SECTION
 11680                                  			; AL = critical section number (00h-0Fh)
 11681                                  	POP     AX
 11682                                  	retn
 11683                                  
 11684                                  	; 16/12/2022
 11685                                  	; 13/11/2022
 11686                                  ECritDisk_iret:  ; 12/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11687                                  LCritDisk_iret: 
 11688                                  	iret
 11689                                  
 11690                                  ECritDisk_2:
 11691                                  	;;popff ; *
 11692                                  	;;retn
 11693                                  ;	jmp	short ECritDisk_3 ; *
 11694                                  ;ECritDisk_iret2: ; *
 11695                                  ;	iret
 11696                                  	
 11697                                  	; 16/12/2022
 11698                                  	; 13/11/2022
 11699                                  	;jmp	short ECritDisk_3
 11700                                  ;ECritDisk_iret2:
 11701                                  	;iret
 11702                                  
 11703                                  ECritDisk_3:
 11704                                  	push    cs ; *
 11705                                  	; 13/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 11706                                  	;call	ECritDisk_iret2 ; *
 11707                                  	;retn
 11708                                  	; 16/12/2022
 11709                                  	call	ECritDisk_iret
 11710                                  	retn
 11711                                  
 11712                                  ;EndProc ECritDisk

 11908                                  	call	LCritDevice_iret
 11909                                  	retn
 11910                                  
 11911                                  ;EndProc LCritDevice
 11912                                  
 11913                                  %endif

 12096                                  
 12097                                  ;**	Standard device IO for MSDOS (first 12 function calls)
 12098                                  ;
 12099                                  ;	TITLE	IBMCPMIO - device IO for MSDOS
 12100                                  ;	NAME	IBMCPMIO
 12101                                  
 12102                                  ;	Old style CP/M 1-12 system calls to talk to reserved devices
 12103                                  ;
 12104                                  ;	$Std_Con_Input_No_Echo
 12105                                  ;	$Std_Con_String_Output
 12106                                  ;	$Std_Con_String_Input
 12107                                  ;	$RawConIO
 12108                                  ;	$RawConInput
 12109                                  ;	RAWOUT
 12110                                  ;	RAWOUT2
 12111                                  ;
 12112                                  
 12113                                  ; The following routines form the console I/O group (funcs 1,2,6,7,8,9,10,11).
 12114                                  ; They assume ES and DS NOTHING, while not strictly correct, this forces data
 12115                                  ; references to be SS or CS relative which is desired.
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12118                                  
 12119                                  ;	TITLE	CPMIO2 - device IO for MSDOS
 12120                                  ;	NAME	CPMIO2
 12121                                  
 12122                                  ;
 12123                                  ;	Microsoft Confidential
 12124                                  ;	Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation 1991
 12125                                  ;	All Rights Reserved.
 12126                                  ;
 12127                                  
 12128                                  ;**	Old style CP/M 1-12 system calls to talk to reserved devices
 12129                                  ;
 12130                                  ;	$Std_Con_Input
 12131                                  ;	$Std_Con_Output
 12132                                  ;	OUTT
 12133                                  ;	TAB
 12134                                  ;	BUFOUT
 12135                                  ;	$Std_Aux_Input
 12136                                  ;	$Std_Aux_Output
 12137                                  ;	$Std_Printer_Output
 12138                                  ;	$Std_Con_Input_Status
 12139                                  ;	$Std_Con_Input_Flush
 12140                                  ;
 12141                                  ;	Revision History:
 12142                                  ;
 12143                                  ;	  AN000	 version 4.00 - Jan. 1988
 12144                                  
 12145                                  ; The following routines form the console I/O group (funcs 1,2,6,7,8,9,10,11).
 12146                                  ; They assume ES and DS NOTHING, while not strictly correct, this forces data
 12147                                  ; references to be SS or CS relative which is desired.
 12148                                  
 12149                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 12150                                  ;	ASSUME	SS:DOSDATA,CS:DOSCODE
 12151                                  
 12152                                  
 12153                                  ;hkn; 	All the variables use SS override or DS. Therefore there is
 12154                                  ;hkn;	no need to specifically set up any seg regs unless SS assumption is
 12155                                  ;hkn;	not valid. 
 12156                                  
 12157                                  ; DOSCODE:51BAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 12158                                  ; 08/11/2022
 12159                                  ; DOSCODE:51A6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 12160                                  
 12161                                  ;
 12162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12163                                  ;
 12164                                  ; Procedure : $Std_Con_Input_No_Echo
 12165                                  ;
 12166                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12167                                  ;
 12168                                  
 12169                                  _$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO:   ;System call 8
 12170                                  
 12171                                  ; Inputs:
 12172                                  ;	None
 12173                                  ; Function:
 12174                                  ;	Input character from console, no echo
 12175                                  ; Returns:
 12176                                  ;	AL = character
 12177                                  
 12178 00001941 1E                      	push	ds
 12179 00001942 56                      	push	si
 12180                                  INTEST:
 12181 00001943 E89B45                  	call	STATCHK
 12182 00001946 753B                    	jnz	short GET ; 08/09/2018
 12183                                  ;*************************************************************************
 12184                                  ;hkn; SS override
 12185 00001948 36803E[A00A]00          	cmp	byte [SS:PRINTER_FLAG],0  ; is printer idle?
 12186 0000194E 7505                    	jnz	short no_sys_wait
 12187 00001950 B405                    	mov	ah,5			; get input status with system wait
 12188 00001952 E89537                  	call	IOFUNC
 12189                                  no_sys_wait:
 12190                                  ;**************************************************************************
 12191 00001955 B484                    	MOV	AH,84h		; (Microsoft Networks - KEYBOARD BUSY LOOP)
 12192 00001957 CD2A                    	INT	int_IBM	 ; int 2Ah
 12193                                  
 12194                                  ;;; 7/15/86  update the date in the idle loop
 12195                                  ;;; Dec 19, 1986 D.C.L. changed following CMP to Byte Ptr from Word Ptr
 12196                                  ;;;;		 to shorten loop in consideration of the PC Convertible
 12197                                  
 12198                                  ;hkn; SS override
 12199 00001959 36803E[BD0D]FF          	CMP	byte [SS:DATE_FLAG],-1	; date is updated may be every
 12200 0000195F 751B                    	JNZ	short NoUpdate		; 65535 x ? ms if no one calls
 12201                                  
 12202 00001961 50                      	PUSH	AX
 12203 00001962 53                      	PUSH	BX			; following is tricky,
 12204 00001963 51                      	PUSH	CX			; it may be called by critical handler
 12205 00001964 52                      	PUSH	DX			; at that time, DEVCALL is used by
 12206                                  					; other's READ or WRITE
 12207 00001965 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; save DS = SFT's segment
 12208                                  
 12209                                  ;hkn; READTIME must use ds = DOSDATA
 12210                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS			; READTIME must use DS=CS
 12211                                  
 12212 00001966 16                      	PUSH	SS ; 04/05/2019
 12213 00001967 1F                      	POP	DS
 12214                                  
 12215 00001968 B80000                  	MOV	AX,0			; therefore, we save DEVCALL
 12216 0000196B E89802                  	CALL	Save_Restore_Packet	; save DEVCALL packet
 12217                                  	;invoke	READTIME		; readtime
 12218 0000196E E815F2                  	call	READTIME
 12219 00001971 B80100                  	MOV	AX,1
 12220 00001974 E88F02                  	CALL	Save_Restore_Packet	; restore DEVCALL packet
 12221                                  
 12222                                  ;	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM, Offset 1F8Ch)
 12223                                  ;	; (MSDOS 6.0 code does not contain IBM DOS FETCHI_TAG check)
 12224                                  ;	push	bx
 12225                                  ;	mov	bx,DATE_FLAG
 12226                                  ;	add	bx,2  ; mov bx,FETCHI_FLAG
 12227                                  ;	cmp	word [cs:bx],5872h
 12228                                  ;	jz	short FETCHI_TAG_chk_ok
 12229                                  ;	call	DOSINIT
 12230                                  ;FETCHI_TAG_chk_ok:
 12231                                  ;	pop	bx
 12232                                  
 12233 00001977 1F                      	POP	DS			; restore DS
 12234 00001978 5A                      	POP	DX
 12235 00001979 59                      	POP	CX
 12236 0000197A 5B                      	POP	BX
 12237 0000197B 58                      	POP	AX
 12238                                  NoUpdate:
 12239                                  
 12240                                  ;hkn; SS override
 12241 0000197C 36FF06[BD0D]            	INC	word [SS:DATE_FLAG]
 12242                                  
 12243                                  ;;; 7/15/86 ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 12244 00001981 EBC0                    	JMP	short INTEST
 12245                                  GET:
 12246 00001983 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 12247 00001985 E86237                  	call	IOFUNC
 12248 00001988 5E                      	POP	SI
 12249 00001989 1F                      	POP	DS
 12250                                  ;;; 7/15/86
 12251                                  
 12252                                  ;hkn; SS override
 12253                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 12254 0000198A 36C606[BC0D]00          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SCAN_FLAG],0
 12255                                  	;
 12256 00001990 3C00                    	CMP	AL,0	    ; extended code ( AL )
 12257 00001992 7505                    	JNZ	short noscan
 12258                                  
 12259                                  ;hkn; SS override
 12260                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SCAN_FLAG],1 ; set this flag for ALT_Q key
 12261                                  	; 20/06/2023
 12262 00001994 36FE06[BC0D]            	inc	byte [SS:SCAN_FLAG]
 12263                                  noscan:
 12264 00001999 C3                      	retn
 12265                                  ;
 12266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12267                                  ;
 12268                                  ;**	$STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT - Console String Output
 12269                                  ;
 12270                                  ;
 12271                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:DX) Point to output string '$' terminated
 12272                                  ;	EXIT	none
 12273                                  ;	USES	ALL
 12274                                  ;
 12275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12276                                  ;
 12277                                  
 12278                                  _$STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT:	;System call 9
 12279 0000199A 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 12280                                  STRING_OUT1:	
 12281 0000199C AC                      	lodsb
 12282 0000199D 3C24                    	cmp	al,'$'
 12283 0000199F 74F8                    	je	short noscan
 12284                                  NEXT_STR1:
 12285 000019A1 E88B02                  	call	OUTT
 12286 000019A4 EBF6                    	jmp	short STRING_OUT1
 12287                                  
 12288                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12289                                  ;
 12290                                  ;**	$STD_CON_STRING_INPUT - Input Line from Console
 12291                                  ;
 12292                                  ;	$STD_CON_STRING_INPUT Fills a buffer from console input until CR
 12293                                  ;
 12294                                  ;	ENTRY	(ds:dx) = input buffer
 12295                                  ;	EXIT	none
 12296                                  ;	USES	ALL
 12297                                  ;
 12298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12299                                  
 12300                                  	; 15/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 12301                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:58D4h
 12302                                  
 12303                                  _$STD_CON_STRING_INPUT:		;System call 10
 12304                                  
 12305                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12306                                  	;mov	ax,ss
 12307                                  	;mov	es,ax
 12308 000019A6 16                      	push	ss
 12309 000019A7 07                      	pop	es
 12310                                  
 12311 000019A8 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 12312 000019AA 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 12313 000019AC AD                      	lodsw
 12314                                  
 12315                                  ;	(AL) = the buffer length
 12316                                  ;	(AH) = the template length
 12317                                  
 12318 000019AD 08C0                            or	al,al
 12319 000019AF 74E8                            jz	short noscan	;Buffer is 0 length!!?
 12320 000019B1 88E3                    	mov	bl,ah		;Init template counter
 12321 000019B3 88EF                            mov	bh,ch		;Init template counter
 12322                                  
 12323                                  ;	(BL) = the number of bytes in the template
 12324                                  
 12325 000019B5 38D8                            cmp	al,bl
 12326 000019B7 7605                            jbe	short NOEDIT	;If length of buffer inconsistent with contents
 12327 000019B9 80380D                          cmp	byte [bx+si],c_CR ; 0Dh
 12328 000019BC 7402                            jz	short EDITON	;If CR correctly placed EDIT is OK
 12329                                  
 12330                                  ; The number of chars in the template is >= the number of chars in buffer or
 12331                                  ; there is no CR at the end of the template. This is an inconsistant state
 12332                                  ; of affairs. Pretend that the template was empty:
 12333                                  ;
 12334                                  
 12335                                  NOEDIT:	
 12336 000019BE 88EB                    	mov	bl,ch		;Reset buffer
 12337                                  EDITON: 
 12338 000019C0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 12339 000019C2 4A                      	dec	dx		;DL is # of bytes we can put in the buffer
 12340                                  
 12341                                  ;	Top level. We begin to read a line in.
 12342                                  
 12343                                  NEWLIN: 
 12344 000019C3 36A0[F901]              	mov	al,[SS:CARPOS]
 12345 000019C7 36A2[FA01]              	mov	[SS:STARTPOS],al ;Remember position in raw buffer
 12346                                  
 12347 000019CB 56                      	push	si
 12348 000019CC BF[FB01]                	mov	di,INBUF ;Build the new line here
 12349 000019CF 36882E[7905]            	mov	byte [SS:INSMODE],ch ;Insert mode off
 12350 000019D4 88EF                    	mov	bh,ch		;No chars from template yet
 12351 000019D6 88EE                    	mov	dh,ch		;No chars to new line yet
 12352 000019D8 E866FF                  	call	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO ;Get first char
 12353 000019DB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,c_LF		; 0Ah	;Linefeed 
 12354 000019DD 7503                    	jnz	short GOTCH
 12355                                  
 12356                                  ;	This is the main loop of reading in a character and processing it.
 12357                                  ;
 12358                                  ;	(BH) = the index of the next byte in the template
 12359                                  ;	(BL) = the length of the template
 12360                                  ;	(DH) = the number of bytes in the buffer
 12361                                  ;	(DL) = the length of the buffer
 12362                                  
 12363                                  GETCH:
 12364 000019DF E85FFF                  	call	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO
 12365                                  GOTCH:
 12366                                  ;
 12367                                  ; Brain-damaged Tim Patterson ignored ^F in case his BIOS did not flush the
 12368                                  ; input queue.
 12369                                  ;
 12370 000019E2 3C06                            cmp	al,"F"-"@"  ; CMP AL, 6  ; Ignore ^F
 12371 000019E4 74F9                    	jz	short GETCH
 12372                                  
 12373                                  ;	If the leading char is the function-key lead byte
 12374                                  
 12375                                  	;cmp	al,[SS:ESCCHAR]
 12376                                  
 12377                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12378                                  
 12379                                  ;hkn; 	ESCCHAR is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE)
 12380                                  
 12381 000019E6 2E3A06[900A]            	CMP	AL,[cs:ESCCHAR]
 12382 000019EB 7439                            jz	short ESCAPE	;change reserved keyword DBM 5-7-87
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ;	Rubout and ^H are both destructive backspaces.
 12385                                  
 12386 000019ED 3C7F                            cmp	al,c_DEL ; 7FH
 12387                                          ;jz	short BACKSPJ
 12388                                          ; 15/01/2024
 12389 000019EF 7466                    	je	short BACKSP
 12390 000019F1 3C08                    	cmp	al,c_BS  ; 8
 12391                                          ;jz	short BACKSPJ
 12392                                          ; 15/01/2024
 12393 000019F3 7462                    	je	short BACKSP
 12394                                  
 12395                                  	; 04/05/2019 -	MSDOS 6.0, also MSDOS 6.21 has bug (bullshit) here.
 12396                                  	;		Two NOPs -instead of a JMP short, as two bytes-
 12397                                  	;	   	after CMP and a CMP again!
 12398                                  	;		
 12399                                  	;		-It would be better if they use a 'JMP short' to 
 12400                                  	;	      	DOSCODE:5279h from DOSCODE:5271h and leave NOPs
 12401                                  	;		between them. Then, they would be able use a patch
 12402                                  	;		between 5271h and 5279h when if it will be required.
 12403                                  	;		I think Tim Patterson would not do this CMP mistake!-
 12404                                  	;	
 12405                                  	; (MSDOS.SYS, from DOSCODE:5271h to DOSCODE:5279h)
 12406                                  
 12407                                  	; 08/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 12408                                  	;
 12409                                  	; (Note: nops below might be used for patching code for Windows 3.1)
 12410                                  
 12411                                  ;DOSCODE:526D	cmp     al, 8
 12412                                  ;DOSCODE:526F	jz      short BACKSPJ
 12413                                  ;DOSCODE:5271	cmp     al, 17h
 12414                                  ;DOSCODE:5273	nop
 12415                                  ;DOSCODE:5274	nop
 12416                                  ;DOSCODE:5275	cmp     al, 15h
 12417                                  ;DOSCODE:5277	nop
 12418                                  ;DOSCODE:5278	nop
 12419                                  ;DOSCODE:5279	cmp     al, 0Dh
 12420                                  ;DOSCODE:527B	jz      short ENDLIN
 12421                                  ;DOSCODE:527D	cmp     al, 0Ah
 12422                                  ;DOSCODE:527F	jz      short PHYCRLF
 12423                                  	
 12424                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12425                                  	; DOSCODE:525Dh
 12426                                  
 12427                                  ; 16/12/2022
 12428                                  %if 0
 12429                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 12430                                  ;	^W deletes backward once and then backs up until a letter is before the
 12431                                  ;	cursor
 12432                                  
 12433                                  	CMP     AL,"W"-"@" ; 17h
 12434                                  
 12435                                  ;	The removal of the comment characters before the jump statement will
 12436                                  ;	cause ^W to backup a word.
 12437                                  
 12438                                  ;***	JZ	short WordDel
 12439                                  	NOP
 12440                                  	NOP
 12441                                  
 12442                                  	CMP     AL,"U"-"@" ; 15h
 12443                                  
 12444                                  ;	The removal of the comment characters before the jump statement will
 12445                                  ;	cause ^U to clear a line.
 12446                                  
 12447                                  ;***	JZ	short LineDel
 12448                                  	NOP
 12449                                  	NOP
 12450                                  
 12451                                  %endif
 12452                                  
 12453                                  ;	CR terminates the line.
 12454                                  
 12455 000019F5 3C0D                            cmp	al,c_CR ; 0Dh
 12456 000019F7 7430                            jz	short ENDLIN
 12457                                  
 12458                                  ;	LF goes to a new line and keeps on reading.
 12459                                  
 12460 000019F9 3C0A                            cmp	al,c_LF ; 0Ah
 12461 000019FB 7442                    	jz	short PHYCRLF
 12462                                  
 12463                                  ;	^X (or ESC) deletes the line and starts over
 12464                                  
 12465                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 12466                                  	;cmp	al,[ss:CANCHAR] ; 1Bh
 12467                                  	;jz	short KILNEW
 12468                                  
 12469                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 6.21)
 12470                                  
 12471                                  ;hkn; 	CANCHAR is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE), so CS override
 12472                                  
 12473 000019FD 2E3A06[8F0A]            	cmp	al,[cs:CANCHAR] ; 1Bh
 12474 00001A02 7440                    	jz	short KILNEW
 12475                                  	
 12476                                  	;cmp	al,CANCEL ; 1Bh	; Retro DOS v3.0
 12477                                  	;jz	short KILNEW
 12478                                  
 12479                                  ; Otherwise, we save the input character.
 12480                                  
 12481                                  SAVCH:	
 12482 00001A04 38D6                    	cmp	dh,dl
 12483 00001A06 7317                    	jnb	short BUFFUL		; buffer is full.
 12484 00001A08 AA                              stosb
 12485 00001A09 FEC6                    	inc	dh                      ; increment count in buffer.
 12486 00001A0B E8B502                  	call	BUFOUT			; Print control chars nicely
 12487                                  
 12488 00001A0E 36803E[7905]00                  cmp	byte [SS:INSMODE], 0
 12489 00001A14 75C9                    	jnz	short GETCH		; insertmode => don't advance template
 12490 00001A16 38DF                            cmp	bh,bl
 12491 00001A18 73C5                            jnb	short GETCH		; no more characters in template
 12492 00001A1A 46                              inc	si                      ; Skip to next char in template
 12493 00001A1B FEC7                            inc	bh                      ; remember position in template
 12494 00001A1D EBC0                            jmp	short GETCH
 12495                                  
 12496                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12497                                  ;BACKSPJ: 
 12498                                  	;jmp	short BACKSP
 12499                                  
 12500                                  BUFFUL: 
 12501 00001A1F B007                    	mov	al, 7			; Bell to signal full buffer
 12502 00001A21 E80B02                  	call	OUTT
 12503 00001A24 EBB9                    	jmp	short GETCH
 12504                                  
 12505                                  ESCAPE: 
 12506                                  	;transfer OEMFunctionKey
 12507 00001A26 E992F0                  	JMP	OEMFunctionKey		; let the OEM's handle the key dispatch
 12508                                  
 12509                                  ENDLIN:
 12510 00001A29 AA                              stosb				; Put the CR in the buffer
 12511 00001A2A E80202                  	call	OUTT                    ; Echo it
 12512 00001A2D 5F                              pop	di                      ; Get start of user buffer
 12513 00001A2E 8875FF                          mov	[di-1], dh		; Tell user how many bytes
 12514 00001A31 FEC6                            inc	dh			; DH is length including CR
 12515                                  
 12516                                  COPYNEW:
 12517                                  	; (IBMDOS.COM, MSDOS 2.0, STRIN.ASM)
 12518                                  	;mov	bp, es
 12519                                  	;mov	bx, ds
 12520                                  	;mov	es, bx
 12521                                  	;mov	ds, bp
 12522                                  	;mov	si, INBUF
 12523                                  	;mov	cl, dh
 12524                                  	;rep	movsb
 12525                                  	;retn
 12526                                  
 12527                                  	; CPMIO.ASM (MSDOS 6.0)
 12528                                  	; (IBMDOS.COM, MSDOS 3.3, Offset 2061h) 
 12529                                  	;SAVE	<DS,ES>
 12530 00001A33 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 12531 00001A34 06                      	PUSH	ES
 12532                                  	;RESTORE <DS,ES>		; XCHG ES,DS
 12533 00001A35 1F                      	POP	DS
 12534 00001A36 07                      	POP	ES
 12535                                  
 12536                                  ;;hkn; INBUF is in DOSDATA
 12537 00001A37 BE[FB01]                        MOV     SI,INBUF
 12538 00001A3A 88F1                            MOV     CL,DH                   ; set up count
 12539 00001A3C F3A4                            REP     MOVSB                   ; Copy final line to user buffer
 12540                                  OLDBAK_RETN:
 12541 00001A3E C3                              RETN
 12542                                  
 12543                                  ;	Output a CRLF to the user screen and do NOT store it into the buffer
 12544                                  
 12545                                  PHYCRLF:
 12546 00001A3F E81B01                  	CALL	CRLF
 12547 00001A42 EB9B                            JMP	short GETCH
 12548                                  
 12549                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3, IBMDOS.COM, 1987)
 12550                                  
 12551                                  ; DOSCODE:52CAh (MSDOS 621, MSDOS.SYS)
 12552                                  
 12553                                  	; Note: Following routines were not used in IBMDOS.COM
 12554                                  	;	-CRTL+W, CRTL+U is not activated-
 12555                                  	;	but they were in the kernel code!?)
 12556                                  
 12557                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12558                                  	; DOSCODE:52B6h
 12559                                  
 12560                                  ;;;;;;;;
 12561                                  
 12562                                  ; 16/12/2022
 12563                                  %if 0
 12564                                  ;
 12565                                  ; Delete the previous line
 12566                                  ;
 12567                                  LineDel:
 12568                                  	OR      DH,DH
 12569                                  	JZ	short GETCH	 ; 06/12/2022
 12570                                  	Call    BackSpace
 12571                                  	JMP	short LineDel
 12572                                  
 12573                                  %endif
 12574                                  
 12575                                  ;
 12576                                  ; delete the previous word.
 12577                                  ;
 12578                                  WordDel:
 12579                                  WordLoop:
 12580                                  ;	Call    BackSpace               ; backspace the one spot
 12581                                  ;	OR      DH,DH
 12582                                  ;	JZ	short GetChj
 12583                                  ;	MOV     AL,[ES:DI-1]
 12584                                  ;	cmp     al,'0'
 12585                                  ;	jb	short GetChj
 12586                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 12587                                  ;	jbe	short WordLoop
 12588                                  ;	OR      AL,20h
 12589                                  ;	CMP     AL,'a'
 12590                                  ;	JB	short GetChj
 12591                                  ;	CMP     AL,'z'
 12592                                  ;	JBE	short WordLoop
 12593                                  ;GetChj: 
 12594                                  ;	JMP	GETCH
 12595                                  
 12596                                  ; 16/12/2022
 12597                                  %if 0
 12598                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12599                                  	; (Worddel is not called or jumped from anywhere!)
 12600                                  WordDel:
 12601                                  WordLoop:
 12602                                  	Call    BackSpace               ; backspace the one spot
 12603                                  	OR      DH,DH
 12604                                  	JZ	short GetChj
 12605                                  	MOV     AL,[ES:DI-1]
 12606                                  	cmp     al,'0'
 12607                                  	jb	short GetChj
 12608                                  	cmp     al,'9'
 12609                                  	jbe	short WordLoop
 12610                                  	OR      AL,20h
 12611                                  	CMP     AL,'a'

 12614                                  	JBE	short WordLoop
 12615                                  GetChj:

 12617                                  
 12618                                  %endif
 12619                                  
 12620                                  ;;;;;;;;
 12621                                  
 12622                                  ; DOSCODE:52F3h (MSDOS 621, MSDOS.SYS)
 12623                                  
 12624                                  ; The user wants to throw away what he's typed in and wants to start over.
 12625                                  ; We print the backslash and then go to the next line and tab to the correct
 12626                                  ; spot to begin the buffered input.
 12627                                  
 12628                                  KILNEW:
 12629 00001A44 B05C                            mov	al,'\'
 12630 00001A46 E8E601                          call	OUTT            ;Print the CANCEL indicator
 12631 00001A49 5E                              pop	si		;Remember start of edit buffer
 12632                                  PUTNEW:
 12633 00001A4A E81001                  	call	CRLF            ;Go to next line on screen
 12634 00001A4D 36A0[FA01]              	mov	al,[SS:STARTPOS]
 12635 00001A51 E84F02                  	call	TAB             ;Tab over
 12636 00001A54 E96CFF                          JMP     NEWLIN		;Start over again
 12637                                  
 12638                                  ;	Destructively back up one character position
 12639                                  
 12640                                  BACKSP:
 12641                                  	; 09/09/2018
 12642 00001A57 E80800                  	Call    BackSpace
 12643 00001A5A EB83                    	JMP     short GETCH	; 15/01/2024
 12644                                  
 12645                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12646                                  ;User really wants an ESC character in his line
 12647                                  TWOESC:	
 12648 00001A5C 2EA0[900A]              	mov	al,[cs:ESCCHAR] ; 10/06/2019
 12649 00001A60 EBA2                    	jmp	short SAVCH
 12650                                  
 12651                                  BackSpace:
 12652 00001A62 08F6                    	or	dh,dh
 12653 00001A64 7419                    	jz	short OLDBAK	;No chars in line, do nothing to line
 12654 00001A66 E85800                  	call	BACKUP          ;Do the backup
 12655 00001A69 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]	;Get the deleted char
 12656 00001A6C 3C20                            cmp	al,20h	; ' '
 12657 00001A6E 730F                    	jnb	short OLDBAK	;Was a normal char
 12658 00001A70 3C09                            cmp	al,c_HT ; 9
 12659 00001A72 741B                    	jz	short BAKTAB	;Was a tab, fix up users display
 12660                                  ;; 9/27/86 fix for ctrl-U backspace
 12661 00001A74 3C15                    	CMP     AL,"U"-"@" ; 15h ; ctrl-U is a section symbol not ^U
 12662 00001A76 7407                    	JZ	short OLDBAK
 12663 00001A78 3C14                           	CMP     AL,"T"-"@" ; 14h ; ctrl-T is a paragraphs symbol not ^T
 12664 00001A7A 7403                    	JZ	short OLDBAK
 12665                                  ;; 9/27/86 fix for ctrl-U backspace
 12666 00001A7C E84500                          call	BACKMES         ;Was a control char, zap the '^'
 12667                                  OLDBAK:
 12668 00001A7F 36803E[7905]00                  cmp	byte [SS:INSMODE], 0
 12669 00001A85 75B7                    	jnz	short OLDBAK_RETN ;In insert mode, done
 12670 00001A87 08FF                    	or	bh,bh
 12671 00001A89 74B3                            jz	short OLDBAK_RETN 
 12672                                  				;Not advanced in template, stay where we are
 12673 00001A8B FECF                    	dec	bh		;Go back in template
 12674 00001A8D 4E                              dec	si
 12675 00001A8E C3                      	retn
 12676                                  BAKTAB:
 12677 00001A8F 57                              push	di
 12678 00001A90 4F                              dec	di		;Back up one char
 12679 00001A91 FD                              std			;Go backward
 12680 00001A92 88F1                            mov	cl,dh		;Number of chars currently in line
 12681 00001A94 B020                            mov	al,20h	; ' '
 12682 00001A96 53                              push	bx
 12683 00001A97 B307                            mov	bl,7		;Max
 12684 00001A99 E30E                            jcxz	FIGTAB		;At start, do nothing
 12685                                  FNDPOS:
 12686 00001A9B AE                              scasb			;Look back
 12687 00001A9C 7609                    	jbe	short CHKCNT
 12688 00001A9E 26807D0109              	cmp	byte [es:di+1],9
 12689 00001AA3 7409                    	jz	short HAVTAB	;Found a tab
 12690 00001AA5 FECB                    	dec	bl		;Back one char if non tab control char
 12691                                  CHKCNT:
 12692 00001AA7 E2F2                            loop	FNDPOS
 12693                                  FIGTAB:		
 12694 00001AA9 362A1E[FA01]            	sub	bl,[SS:STARTPOS]
 12695                                  HAVTAB:
 12696 00001AAE 28F3                    	sub	bl,dh
 12697 00001AB0 00D9                    	add	cl,bl
 12698 00001AB2 80E107                  	and	cl,7		;CX has correct number to erase
 12699 00001AB5 FC                      	cld			;Back to normal
 12700 00001AB6 5B                      	pop	bx
 12701 00001AB7 5F                      	pop	di
 12702 00001AB8 74C5                    	jz	short OLDBAK	;Nothing to erase
 12703                                  TABBAK:
 12704 00001ABA E80700                  	call	BACKMES
 12705 00001ABD E2FB                    	loop	TABBAK		;Erase correct number of chars
 12706 00001ABF EBBE                    	jmp	short OLDBAK
 12707                                  
 12708                                  BACKUP:
 12709 00001AC1 FECE                            dec	dh		;Back up in line
 12710 00001AC3 4F                              dec	di
 12711                                  BACKMES:
 12712 00001AC4 B008                            mov	al,c_BS ; 8	;Backspace
 12713 00001AC6 E86601                          call	OUTT
 12714 00001AC9 B020                            mov	al,20h ; ' '	;Erase
 12715 00001ACB E86101                          call	OUTT
 12716 00001ACE B008                            mov	al,c_BS ; 8	;Backspace
 12717 00001AD0 E95C01                  	jmp	OUTT		;Done
 12718                                  
 12719                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12720                                  ;User really wants an ESC character in his line
 12721                                  ;TWOESC:	
 12722                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:ESCCHAR] ; 10/06/2019
 12723                                  ;	jmp	SAVCH
 12724                                  
 12725                                  ;Copy the rest of the template
 12726                                  COPYLIN:
 12727 00001AD3 88D9                            mov	cl,bl		;Total size of template
 12728 00001AD5 28F9                    	sub	cl,bh		;Minus position in template, is number to move
 12729 00001AD7 EB07                            jmp	short COPYEACH
 12730                                  
 12731                                  COPYSTR:
 12732 00001AD9 E83200                  	call	FINDOLD         ;Find the char
 12733 00001ADC EB02                    	jmp	short COPYEACH  ;Copy up to it
 12734                                  
 12735                                  ;Copy one char from template to line
 12736                                  COPYONE:
 12737 00001ADE B101                            mov	cl,1
 12738                                  ;Copy CX chars from template to line
 12739                                  COPYEACH:
 12740 00001AE0 36C606[7905]00                  mov	byte [SS:INSMODE],0	;All copies turn off insert mode
 12741 00001AE6 38D6                    	cmp	dh,dl
 12742 00001AE8 740F                            jz	short GETCH2		;At end of line, can't do anything
 12743 00001AEA 38DF                            cmp	bh,bl
 12744 00001AEC 740B                            jz	short GETCH2		;At end of template, can't do anything
 12745 00001AEE AC                              lodsb
 12746 00001AEF AA                              stosb
 12747 00001AF0 E8D001                  	call	BUFOUT
 12748 00001AF3 FEC7                            inc	bh			;Ahead in template
 12749 00001AF5 FEC6                            inc	dh			;Ahead in line
 12750 00001AF7 E2E7                            loop	COPYEACH
 12751                                  GETCH2:
 12752 00001AF9 E9E3FE                          jmp	GETCH
 12753                                  
 12754                                  ;Skip one char in template
 12755                                  SKIPONE:
 12756 00001AFC 38DF                    	cmp	bh,bl
 12757 00001AFE 74F9                    	jz	short GETCH2		;At end of template
 12758 00001B00 FEC7                    	inc	bh			;Ahead in template
 12759 00001B02 46                      	inc	si
 12760                                          ;jmp	GETCH
 12761                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12762 00001B03 EBF4                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12763                                  
 12764                                  SKIPSTR:
 12765 00001B05 E80600                  	call	FINDOLD                 ;Find out how far to go
 12766 00001B08 01CE                            add	si,cx			;Go there
 12767 00001B0A 00CF                            add	bh,cl
 12768                                          ;jmp	GETCH
 12769                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12770 00001B0C EBEB                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12771                                  
 12772                                  ;Get the next user char, and look ahead in template for a match
 12773                                  ;CX indicates how many chars to skip to get there on output
 12774                                  ;NOTE: WARNING: If the operation cannot be done, the return
 12775                                  ;       address is popped off and a jump to GETCH is taken.
 12776                                  ;       Make sure nothing extra on stack when this routine
 12777                                  ;       is called!!! (no PUSHes before calling it).
 12778                                  
 12779                                  FINDOLD:
 12780 00001B0E E830FE                          call	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO
 12781                                  
 12782                                  	; STRIN.ASM (MSDOS 2.11, 19/07/2018) 
 12783                                  
 12784                                  	;CMP     AL,[SS:ESCCHAR]	
 12785                                  	;JNZ     SHORT FINDSETUP
 12786                                  
 12787                                  	; CPMIO.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0)
 12788                                  
 12789                                  ;hkn; ESCCHAR is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE), so CS override
 12790                                  
 12791 00001B11 2E3A06[900A]            	CMP	AL,[CS:ESCCHAR]		; did he type a function key?
 12792 00001B16 7505                    	JNZ	SHORT FINDSETUP		; no, set up for scan
 12793                                  
 12794 00001B18 E826FE                  	CALL	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO	; eat next char
 12795 00001B1B EB1D                            JMP	SHORT NOTFND		; go try again
 12796                                  FINDSETUP:
 12797 00001B1D 88D9                    	mov	cl,bl
 12798 00001B1F 28F9                            sub	cl,bh		;CX is number of chars to end of template
 12799 00001B21 7417                    	jz	short NOTFND	;At end of template
 12800 00001B23 49                              dec	cx		;Cannot point past end, limit search
 12801 00001B24 7414                            jz	short NOTFND	;If only one char in template, forget it
 12802 00001B26 06                      	push	es
 12803 00001B27 1E                      	push	ds
 12804 00001B28 07                      	pop	es
 12805 00001B29 57                      	push	di
 12806 00001B2A 89F7                    	mov	di,si		;Template to ES:DI
 12807 00001B2C 47                      	inc	di
 12808 00001B2D F2AE                    	repne	scasb		;Look
 12809 00001B2F 5F                      	pop	di
 12810 00001B30 07                      	pop	es
 12811 00001B31 7507                    	jnz	short NOTFND	;Didn't find the char
 12812 00001B33 F6D1                            not	cl		;Turn how far to go into how far we went
 12813 00001B35 00D9                            add	cl,bl		;Add size of template
 12814 00001B37 28F9                            sub	cl,bh		;Subtract current pos, result distance to skip
 12815                                  FINDOLD_RETN:
 12816 00001B39 C3                      	retn
 12817                                  
 12818                                  NOTFND:
 12819 00001B3A 5D                      	pop	bp              ;Chuck return address
 12820                                  	;jmp	GETCH
 12821                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12822                                  GETCH2_j:
 12823 00001B3B EBBC                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12824                                  
 12825                                  REEDIT:
 12826 00001B3D B040                    	mov	al,'@'		;Output re-edit character
 12827 00001B3F E8ED00                  	call	OUTT
 12828 00001B42 5F                      	pop	di
 12829 00001B43 57                      	push	di
 12830 00001B44 06                      	push	es
 12831 00001B45 1E                      	push	ds
 12832 00001B46 E8EAFE                  	call	COPYNEW		;Copy current line into template
 12833 00001B49 1F                      	pop	ds
 12834 00001B4A 07                      	pop	es
 12835 00001B4B 5E                      	pop	si

 12837 00001B4E E9F9FE                  	jmp	PUTNEW		;Start over again
 12838                                  
 12839                                  EXITINS:

 12843                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12844 00001B56 EBE3                    	jmp	short GETCH2_j
 12845                                  
 12846                                  ;Put a real live ^Z in the buffer (embedded)
 12847                                  CTRLZ:

 12850                                  
 12851                                  ;Output a CRLF
 12852                                  CRLF:

 12854 00001B5F E8CD00                  	call	OUTT

 12856 00001B64 E9C800                  	jmp	OUTT

 12860                                  ;
 12861                                  ;**	$RAW_CON_IO - Do Raw Console I/O
 12862                                  ;
 12863                                  ;	Input or output raw character from console, no echo
 12864                                  ;
 12865                                  ;	ENTRY	DL = -1 if input
 12866                                  ;		   =  output character if output
 12867                                  ;	EXIT	(AL) = input character if input
 12868                                  ;	USES	all
 12869                                  ;
 12870                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12871                                  ; 20/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 12872                                  
 12873                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12874                                  ; DOSCODE:541Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 12875                                  
 12876                                  ; 08/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 12877                                  ; DOSCODE:5408h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 12878                                  
 12879                                  _$RAW_CON_IO:			; System call 6
 12880                                  
 12881 00001B67 88D0                            MOV	AL,DL
 12882 00001B69 3CFF                            CMP	AL,-1
 12883 00001B6B 7541                    	JNZ	SHORT RAWOUT ; 16/12/2022
 12884                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12885                                  	;jz	short rci1
 12886                                  	;jmp	short RAWOUT
 12887                                  	; 16/12/202
 12888                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12889                                  	;nop
 12890                                  rci1:
 12891                                  			; Get pointer to register save area
 12892 00001B6D 36C43E[8405]            	LES	DI,[SS:USER_SP] ; 12/03/2018
 12893 00001B72 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 12894                                      	;CALL	GET_IO_FCB	; MSDOS 2.11 (Retro DOS v2.0)
 12895 00001B74 E85923                  	CALL	GET_IO_SFT	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 12896                                          ;JC	SHORT RET17
 12897 00001B77 72C0                            jc	short FINDOLD_RETN
 12898 00001B79 B401                    	MOV	AH,1
 12899 00001B7B E86C35                  	CALL	IOFUNC
 12900 00001B7E 750B                    	JNZ	SHORT RESFLG
 12901 00001B80 E83043                  	CALL	SPOOLINT
 12902                                  	;OR	BYTE [ES:DI+16H],40H
 12903 00001B83 26804D1640              	OR	BYTE [ES:DI+user_env.user_F],40H ; Set user's zero flag
 12904 00001B88 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 12905                                  RET17:
 12906 00001B8A C3                      	RETN
 12907                                  
 12908                                  RESFLG:
 12909                                  	;AND	BYTE [ES:DI+16H],0FFH-40H  ; 0BFh
 12910 00001B8B 26806516BF              	AND	BYTE [ES:DI+user_env.user_F],0FFH-40H
 12911                                  				; Reset user's zero flag
 12912                                  ;RILP:
 12913                                  rci0:
 12914 00001B90 E82043                       	CALL	SPOOLINT
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12917                                  ;
 12918                                  ;**	$Raw_CON_INPUT - Raw Console Input
 12919                                  ;
 12920                                  ;	Input raw character from console, no echo
 12921                                  ;
 12922                                  ;	ENTRY	none
 12923                                  ;	EXIT	(al) = character
 12924                                  ;	USES	all
 12925                                  ;
 12926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12927                                  ;
 12928                                  
 12929                                  ;rci0:	invoke	SPOOLINT
 12930                                  
 12931                                  	;entry	$RAW_CON_INPUT
 12932                                  
 12933                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12934                                  
 12935                                  ; DOSCODE:544Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 12936                                  
 12937                                  	; 15/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 12938                                  
 12939                                  ; DOSCODE:5ACBh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 12940                                  
 12941                                  _$RAW_CON_INPUT:		; System call 7
 12942 00001B93 53                      	push	bx
 12943 00001B94 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 12944                                  	;CALL	GET_IO_FCB	; MSDOS 2.11 (Retro DOS v2.0)
 12945 00001B96 E83723                  	CALL	GET_IO_SFT	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0

 13114                                  ; Inputs:
 13115                                  ;	AX=0 save the DEVCALL request packet
 13116                                  ;	  =1 restore the DEVCALL request packet

 13624                                  ;
 13625                                  ;		Created: ARR 4 April 1983"
 13626                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 13627                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple
 13628                                  ;					  times.  Change so successive closes work by
 13629                                  ;					  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to
 13630                                  ;					  already closed FCB and return EOF.
 13631                                  ;			 MZ 16 Jan   1984 More braindamage.  Need to separate info

 13636                                  ;Break <$Get_FCB_Position - set random record fields to current pos>
 13637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13638                                  ;
 13639                                  ;   $Get_FCB_Position - look at an FCB, retrieve the current position from the
 13640                                  ;	extent and next record field and set the random record field to point
 13641                                  ;	to that record
 13642                                  ;
 13643                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 13644                                  ;   Outputs:	The random record field of the FCB is set to the current record
 13645                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13646                                  ;
 13647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13648                                  ;
 13649                                  
 13650                                  _$GET_FCB_POSITION:
 13651 00001D4A E80605                  	call	GetExtended		; point to FCB
 13652 00001D4D E8D704                  	call	GetExtent		; DX:AX is current record
 13653                                  	;mov	[si+21h],ax
 13654 00001D50 894421                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR],AX 	; drop in low order piece
 13655                                  	;mov	[si+23h],dl
 13656 00001D53 885423                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2],DL	; drop in high order piece
 13657                                  	;cmp	word [si+0Eh],64
 13658 00001D56 837C0E40                	CMP	word [SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],64
 13659 00001D5A 7303                    	JAE	short GetFCBBye
 13660                                  	;mov	[si+24h],dh
 13661 00001D5C 887424                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2+1],DH	; Set 4th byte only if record size < 64
 13662                                  GoodPath:	; 16/12/2022
 13663                                  GetFCBBye:
 13664 00001D5F E924E9                  	jmp	FCB_RET_OK
 13665                                  
 13666                                  ;Break <$FCB_Delete - remove several files that match the input FCB>
 13667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13668                                  ;
 13669                                  ;**	$FCB_Delete - Delete from FCB Template
 13670                                  ;
 13671                                  ;	given an FCB, remove all directory entries in the current
 13672                                  ;	directory that have names that match the FCB's ?  marks.
 13673                                  ;
 13674                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:DX) = address of FCB
 13675                                  ;	EXIT	entries matching the FCB are deleted
 13676                                  ;		(al) = ff iff no entries were deleted
 13677                                  ;	USES	all
 13678                                  ;
 13679                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13680                                  ;
 13681                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 13682                                  
 13683                                  _$FCB_DELETE:		; System call 19
 13684                                  					; OpenBuf is in DOSDATA
 13685 00001D62 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF 		; appropriate place 
 13686                                  
 13687 00001D65 E8C65E                  	call	TransFCB		; convert FCB to path
 13688 00001D68 7207                    	JC	short BadPath 		; signal no deletions
 13689                                  
 13690 00001D6A 16                      	push	SS
 13691 00001D6B 1F                      	pop	DS			; SS is DOSDATA
 13692                                  
 13693 00001D6C E8F80D                  	call	DOS_DELETE		; wham
 13694                                  	;JC	short BadPath
 13695                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13696 00001D6F 73EE                    	jnc 	short GoodPath
 13697                                  ;GoodPath:
 13698                                  ;	;jmp	FCB_RET_OK		; do a good return
 13699                                  ;	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 13700                                  ;	jmp	short GetFCBBye
 13701                                  
 13702                                  BadPath:
 13703                                  	; Error code is in AX
 13704                                  
 13705 00001D71 E915E9                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR		; let someone else signal the error
 13706                                  
 13707                                  ;Break <$Get_FCB_File_Length - return the length of a file>
 13708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13709                                  ;
 13710                                  ;   $Get_FCB_File_Length - set the random record field to the length of the
 13711                                  ;	file in records (rounded up if partial).
 13712                                  ;
 13713                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX - point to a possible extended FCB
 13714                                  ;   Outputs:	Random record field updated to reflect the number of records
 13715                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13716                                  ;
 13717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13718                                  ;

 13722

 13727 00001D77 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 13728

 13730 00001D7B 56                      	push	si

 13732 00001D7F 5E                      	pop	si

 13740 00001D8A 5E                      	pop	si			; get pointer back
 13741 00001D8B 1F                      	pop	ds
 13742 00001D8C 72E3                    	JC	short BadPath 		; invalid something
 13743                                  	; 15/01/2024
 13744                                  	;MOV	DX,BX (*)		; get high order size
 13745                                  	;MOV	AX,DI (**)		; get low order size
 13746 00001D8E 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx ; hw of file size
 13747                                  	;
 13748                                  	;mov	bx,[si+0Eh]

 13750 00001D93 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX			; empty record => 0 size for file
 13751 00001D95 7502                    	JNZ	short GetSize 		; not empty
 13752                                  	;MOV	BX,128

 13754                                  GetSize:
 13755                                  	; 15/01/2024
 13756                                  	;MOV	DI,AX			; save low order word
 13757                                  	;MOV	AX,DX			; move high order for divide

 13759                                  	; ax = hw of file size
 13760

 13762 00001D9B F7F3                    	DIV	BX			; wham
 13763 00001D9D 50                      	PUSH	AX			; save dividend
 13764 00001D9E 89F8                    	MOV	AX,DI ; (**)		; get low order piece
 13765 00001DA0 F7F3                    	DIV	BX			; wham
 13766 00001DA2 89D1                    	MOV	CX,DX			; save remainder
 13767 00001DA4 5A                      	POP	DX			; get high order dividend
 13768 00001DA5 E306                    	JCXZ	LengthStore		; no roundup
 13769 00001DA7 83C001                  	ADD	AX,1
 13770 00001DAA 83D200                  	ADC	DX,0			; 32-bit increment
 13771                                  LengthStore:
 13772                                  	;mov	[si+21h],ax

 13774                                  	;mov	[si+23h],dl
 13775 00001DB0 885423                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2],DL	; store high order
 13776 00001DB3 08F6                    	OR	DH,DH
 13777 00001DB5 74A8                    	JZ	short GoodPath		; not storing insignificant zero
 13778                                  	;mov	[si+24h],dh
 13779 00001DB7 887424                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+3],DH	; save that high piece
 13780                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13781                                  GoodRet:
 13782                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_OK
 13783 00001DBA EBA3                    	jmp	short GoodPath

 13785                                  ;Break <$FCB_Close - close a file>
 13786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13787                                  ;
 13788                                  ;   $FCB_Close - given an FCB, look up the SFN and close it. Do not free it
 13789                                  ;	as the FCB may be used for further I/O
 13790                                  ;
 13791                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to FCB
 13792                                  ;   Outputs:	AL = FF if file was not found on disk
 13793                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13794                                  ;
 13795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13796                                  ;
 13797                                  	; 16/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 13798                                  
 13799                                  _$FCB_CLOSE:		; System call 16
 13800                                  
 13801 00001DBC 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; default search attributes
 13802 00001DBE E89204                  	call	GetExtended		; DS:SI point to real FCB
 13803 00001DC1 7403                    	JZ	short NoAttr		; not extended
 13804 00001DC3 8A44FF                  	MOV	AL,[SI-1]		; get attributes
 13805                                  NoAttr:
 13806                                  					; SS override
 13807 00001DC6 36A2[6B05]              	MOV	[SS:ATTRIB],AL		; stash away found attributes
 13808 00001DCA E8D903                  	call	SFTFromFCB
 13809 00001DCD 72EB                    	JC	short GoodRet 		; MZ 16 Jan Assume death
 13810                                  
 13811                                  	; If the sharer is present, then the SFT is not regenable. Thus, 
 13812                                  	; there is no need to set the SFT's attribute.
 13813

 13815                                  	;;; done
 13816                                  
 13817                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+4]
 13818 00001DCF 268A4504                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr]
 13819 00001DD3 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 13820 00001DD5 50                      	PUSH	AX
 13821

 13823                                  	;;; done

 13826 00001DD9 7508                    	JNZ	short NoStash
 13827 00001DDB 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[SS:ATTRIB]
 13828                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],al
 13829 00001DDF 26884504                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],AL ; attempted attribute for close
 13830                                  NoStash:
 13831                                  
 13832                                  ; 16/01/2024
 13833                                  %if 0
 13834                                  	;mov	ax,[si+14h]
 13835                                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.FDATE] ; move in the time and date
 13836                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 13837                                  	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 13838                                  	;mov	ax,[si+16h]

 13840                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],ax

 13846                                  	;mov	ax,[si+12h]

 13848                                  	;mov	[es:di+13h],ax
 13849                                  	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2],AX
 13850                                  	;or	word [es:di+5],4000h

 13853                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_close_nodate
 13854                                  %else
 13855                                  	; 16/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 13857                                  	;lds	ax,[si+14h]

 13859                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
