 18655                                  
 18656                                  ;**	DELETE.ASM - Low level routine for deleting files
 18657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18658                                  ;		DOS_DELETE
 18659                                  ;		REN_DEL_Check
 18660                                  ;		FastOpen_Delete	       ; DOS 3.3
 18661                                  ;		FastOpen_Update	       ; DOS 3.3
 18662                                  
 18663                                  ;   Revision history:
 18664                                  ;
 18665                                  ;   A000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 18666                                  ;   A001  Fastopen Rename fix	April 1989
 18667                                  
 18668                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 18669                                  
 18670                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 18671                                  ;	i_need	Creating,BYTE
 18672                                  ;	i_need	DELALL,BYTE
 18673                                  ;	i_need	THISDPB,DWORD
 18674                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 18675                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 18676                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 18677                                  ;	i_need	ATTRIB,BYTE
 18678                                  ;	i_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 18679                                  ;	i_need	WFP_START,WORD
 18680                                  ;	i_need	REN_WFP,WORD			 ;BN001
 18681                                  ;	i_need	NAME1,BYTE			 ;BN001
 18682                                  ;	i_need	FoundDel,BYTE
 18683                                  ;	i_need	AUXSTACK,BYTE
 18684                                  ;	i_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 18685                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 18686                                  ;	i_need	FastOpenTable,BYTE		  ; DOS 3.3
 18687                                  ;	i_need	FastTable,BYTE			  ; DOS 4.00
 18688                                  ;
 18689                                  ;	i_need	Del_ExtCluster,WORD		  ; DOS 4.00
 18690                                  ;
 18691                                  ;	i_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ; DOS 4.00
 18692                                  ;	i_need	DMAADD,DWORD
 18693                                  ;	i_need	RENAMEDMA,BYTE
 18694                                  
 18695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18696                                  ;
 18697                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DELETE
 18698                                  ;
 18699                                  ; Inputs:
 18700                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18701                                  ;		terminated)
 18702                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18703                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18704                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18705                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18706                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18707                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18708                                  ; Function:
 18709                                  ;	Delete the specified file(s)
 18710                                  ; Outputs:
 18711                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18712                                  ;		OK
 18713                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18714                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18715                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 18716                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 18717                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18718                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18719                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18720                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18721                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18722                                  ;			Attempt to delete device or directory
 18723                                  ;		***error_sharing_violation***
 18724                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 18725                                  ;			This error is NOT returned. The INT 24H is generated,
 18726                                  ;			  and the file is ignored (not deleted). Delete will
 18727                                  ;			  simply continue on looking for more files.
 18728                                  ;			  Carry will NOT be set in this case.
 18729                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18730                                  ;
 18731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18732                                  
 18733                                  FILEFOUND   equ 01h
 18734                                  FILEDELETED equ 10h
 18735                                  
 18736                                  	; 12/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18737                                  	; DOSCODE:63E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 18738                                  
 18739                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IBMDOS.COM)
 18740                                  	; DOSCODE:6B11h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 18741                                  
 18742                                  DOS_DELETE:
 18743                                  
 18744                                  ;hkn; DOS_Delete is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up 
 18745                                  ;hkn; appropriately at this point.
 18746                                  
 18747 00002B67 E8B5EC                  	call	TestNet
 18748 00002B6A 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DELETE
 18749                                  
 18750                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18751                                  ;	transfer NET_DELETE
 18752                                  ;ELSE
 18753                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) | 19
 18754                                  	;INT	2FH
 18755                                  	;return
 18756                                  
 18757 00002B6C B81311                  	mov	ax,1113h
 18758 00002B6F CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - DELETE REMOTE FILE
 18759                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> 
 18760                                  			;		fully-qualified filename in DOS CS
 18761                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory structure for drive with file
 18762                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 18763 00002B71 C3                      	retn
 18764                                  ;ENDIF
 18765                                  
 18766                                  LOCAL_DELETE:
 18767 00002B72 C606[6F05]00            	MOV	byte [FOUNDDEL],0	; No files found and no files deleted
 18768 00002B77 E867ED                  	call	ECritDisk
 18769                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 18770 00002B7A C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Assume not del *.*
 18771 00002B80 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 18772                                  SKPNUL:
 18773 00002B84 AC                      	LODSB
 18774 00002B85 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 18775 00002B87 75FB                    	JNZ	short SKPNUL		; go to end
 18776 00002B89 83EE04                  	SUB	SI,4			; Back over possible "*.*"
 18777 00002B8C 813C2A2E                	CMP	WORD [SI],2E2Ah ; "*."
 18778 00002B90 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_QUEST
 18779 00002B92 807C022A                	CMP	BYTE [SI+2],"*"
 18780 00002B96 741F                    	JZ	short CHECK_ATTS
 18781                                  TEST_QUEST:
 18782 00002B98 83EE09                  	SUB	SI,9		; Back over possible "????????.???"
 18783 00002B9B 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18784                                  
 18785 00002B9D 16                      	push	ss
 18786                                  	;pop	ds ; ! Retro DOS v3.0 BUG !
 18787 00002B9E 07                      	pop	es ; 17/05/2019
 18788                                  
 18789 00002B9F B83F3F                  	MOV	AX,"??" ; 3F3Fh
 18790 00002BA2 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4		; four sets of "??"
 18791 00002BA5 F3AF                    	REPE	SCASW
 18792 00002BA7 751C                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18793 00002BA9 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18794 00002BAB AD                      	LODSW
 18795 00002BAC 3D2E3F                  	CMP	AX,3F2Eh ; ".?"
 18796 00002BAF 7514                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18797 00002BB1 AD                      	LODSW
 18798 00002BB2 3D3F3F                  	CMP	AX,"??"
 18799 00002BB5 750E                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18800                                  CHECK_ATTS:
 18801 00002BB7 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 18802                                  	;and	al,1Fh
 18803 00002BBA 241F                    	AND	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18804                                  					; Look only at hidden bits
 18805                                  	;cmp	al,1Fh
 18806 00002BBC 3C1F                    	CMP	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18807                                  					; All must be set
 18808 00002BBE 7505                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18809                                  
 18810                                  ; NOTE WARNING DANGER-----
 18811                                  ;    This DELALL stuff is not safe. It allows directories to be deleted.
 18812                                  ;	It should ONLY be used by FORMAT in the ROOT directory.
 18813                                  
 18814 00002BC0 C606[7F05]00            	MOV	byte [DELALL],0		; DEL *.* - flag deleting all
 18815                                  NOT_ALL:
 18816 00002BC5 C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1
 18817 00002BCA E85E1F                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 18818 00002BCD 7312                    	JNC	short Del_found
 18819 00002BCF 750B                    	JNZ	short _bad_path
 18820 00002BD1 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 18821 00002BD3 7407                    	JZ	short _bad_path
 18822                                  No_file:
 18823 00002BD5 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 18824                                  ErrorReturn:
 18825 00002BD8 F9                      	STC
 18826                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18827                                  	;retn
 18828                                  	; 18/12/2022
 18829 00002BD9 E932ED                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18830                                  
 18831                                  _bad_path:
 18832 00002BDC B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 18833 00002BDF EBF7                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18834                                  
 18835                                  Del_found:
 18836 00002BE1 750C                    	JNZ	short NOT_DIR		; Check for dir specified
 18837 00002BE3 803E[7F05]00            	CMP	byte [DELALL],0		; DelAll = 0 allows delete of dir.
 18838 00002BE8 7405                    	JZ	short NOT_DIR
 18839                                  Del_access_err:
 18840 00002BEA B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 18841 00002BED EBE9                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18842                                  
 18843                                  NOT_DIR:
 18844 00002BEF 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Check if device name
 18845 00002BF1 78F7                    	JS	short Del_access_err	; Can't delete I/O devices
 18846                                  
 18847                                  ; Main delete loop. CURBUF+2:BX points to a matching directory entry.
 18848                                  
 18849                                  DELFILE:
 18850 00002BF3 800E[6F05]01            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEFOUND ; file found, not deleted yet
 18851                                  
 18852                                  ; If we are deleting the Volume ID, then we set VOLUME_CHNG flag to make
 18853                                  ; DOS issue a build BPB call the next time this drive is accessed.
 18854                                  
 18855 00002BF8 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 18856 00002BF9 8A26[7F05]              	MOV	AH,[DELALL]
 18857 00002BFD C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 18858                                  	
 18859                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18860 00002C01 36F606[6B05]01          	TEST	byte [SS:ATTRIB],attr_read_only ; are we deleting RO files too?
 18861 00002C07 7509                    	JNZ	short DoDelete		; yes
 18862                                  
 18863 00002C09 F6470B01                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_read_only
 18864 00002C0D 7403                    	JZ	short DoDelete		; not read only
 18865                                  
 18866                                  	; 30/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18867                                  Skip_it:
 18868 00002C0F 1F                      	POP	DS
 18869 00002C10 EB57                    	JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it (Note ES:BP not set)
 18870                                  
 18871                                  DoDelete:
 18872 00002C12 E8AF00                  	call	REN_DEL_Check		; Sets ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 18873                                  	;JNC	short DEL_SHARE_OK
 18874                                  	;POP	DS
 18875                                  	;JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it
 18876                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18877 00002C15 72F8                    	jc	short Skip_it
 18878                                  
 18879                                  DEL_SHARE_OK:
 18880                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18881                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18882                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 18883 00002C17 F6450540                	TEST	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18884                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 18885 00002C1B 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 18886 00002C1D E8D93F                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 18887                                  	;or	byte [di+5],40h
 18888 00002C20 804D0540                	OR	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18889                                  yesdirty:
 18890 00002C24 8827                    	mov	[bx],ah 
 18891                                  	;MOV	[BX+dir_entry.dir_name],AH ; Put in E5H or 0
 18892                                  	;;;
 18893                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18894                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18895 00002C26 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 18896                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 18897 00002C28 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 18898 00002C2C 7503                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_1	;  not FAT32
 18899 00002C2E 8B5CFA                  	mov     bx,[si-6]		;  high word of the first cluster (FAT32)
 18900                                  yesdirty_fc_1:
 18901                                  	;mov	[ss:CLUSTNUM_HW],bx 
 18902 00002C31 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18903                                  	;;;
 18904                                  
 18905 00002C33 8B1C                    	MOV	BX,[SI] 		; Get firclus pointer
 18906 00002C35 1F                      	POP	DS
 18907                                  	;;;
 18908 00002C36 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18909                                  	;;;
 18910 00002C3A 800E[6F05]10            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEDELETED ; 10h ; Deleted file
 18911                                  
 18912                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18913                                  	;CMP	BX,2
 18914                                  	;JB	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 18915                                  	;;;
 18916                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18917                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18918                                  	;cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 18919 00002C3F 21D2                    	and	dx,dx ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18920 00002C41 7505                    	jnz	short yesdirty_fc_2
 18921 00002C43 83FB02                  	cmp	bx,2
 18922 00002C46 7221                    	jb	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 18923                                  yesdirty_fc_2:
 18924                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 18925 00002C48 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 18926 00002C4D 750C                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_3	; not FAT32
 18927                                  	;push	bx
 18928                                  	;mov	bx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 18929                                  	;;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Fh]
 18930                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 18931                                  	;30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18932                                  	;mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 18933                                  	; dx = [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; *
 18934 00002C4F 263B562F                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 18935                                  	;pop	bx
 18936 00002C53 750A                    	jne	short yesdirty_fc_4
 18937                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 18938 00002C55 263B5E2D                	cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 18939 00002C59 EB04                    	jmp     short yesdirty_fc_4
 18940                                  yesdirty_fc_3:
 18941                                  	;;;
 18942                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 18943 00002C5B 263B5E0D                	CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 18944                                  yesdirty_fc_4:	; 30/01/2024
 18945 00002C5F 7708                    	JA	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too big)
 18946                                  
 18947 00002C61 E89B2F                  	call	RELEASE 		; Free file data
 18948 00002C64 7258                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18949                                  
 18950                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 18951                                  
 18952 00002C66 E8D900                  	CALL	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete the dir info in fastopen
 18953                                  
 18954                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 18955                                  
 18956                                  DELNXT:
 18957 00002C69 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Possible to get here without this set
 18958 00002C6D E83D1C                  	call	GETENTRY		; Registers need to be reset
 18959 00002C70 724C                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18960 00002C72 E8341B                  	call	NEXTENT
 18961                                  	;JNC	short DELFILE
 18962                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18963 00002C75 7203                    	jc	short DELNXT2
 18964 00002C77 E979FF                  	jmp	DELFILE
 18965                                  DELNXT2:
 18966 00002C7A C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; NEXTENT sets ES=DOSGROUP
 18967                                  	
 18968                                  	;;;
 18969                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18970                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18971                                  	;
 18972 00002C7E E8EE07                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 18973                                  	;;;
 18974                                  
 18975                                  	; 12/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18976                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 18977                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 18978                                  	; 15/12/2022
 18979 00002C81 268A4600                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP]
 18980 00002C85 E83F3E                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 18981 00002C88 7234                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18982                                  ;
 18983                                  ; Now we need to test FoundDel for our flags. The cases to consider are:
 18984                                  ;
 18985                                  ;   not found not deleted		file not found
 18986                                  ;   not found	  deleted		*** impossible ***
 18987                                  ;	found not deleted		access denied (read-only)
 18988                                  ;	found	  deleted		no error
 18989                                  ;
 18990 00002C8A F606[6F05]10            	TEST	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEDELETED ; did we delete a file?
 18991 00002C8F 7426                    	JZ	short DelError		; no, figure out what's wrong.
 18992                                  
 18993                                  ; We set VOLCHNG_FLAG to indicate that we have changed the volume label
 18994                                  ; and to force the DOS to issue a media check.
 18995                                  
 18996 00002C91 F606[6B05]08            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id ; 8
 18997 00002C96 741C                    	jz	short No_Set_Flag
 18998 00002C98 50                      	PUSH	AX
 18999 00002C99 06                      	PUSH	ES
 19000 00002C9A 57                      	PUSH	DI
 19001 00002C9B C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 19002 00002C9F 268A25                  	MOV	AH,[ES:DI]		; Get drive
 19003 00002CA2 80EC41                  	SUB	AH,'A'                  ; Convert to 0-based
 19004 00002CA5 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],AH
 19005                                  	
 19006                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19007 00002CA9 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH			;>32mb delete volume id from boot record ;AN000;
 19008 00002CAB E8EB04                  	call	Set_Media_ID		;>32mb set volume id to boot record	 ;AN000;
 19009                                  	 
 19010 00002CAE E8DC38                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; force media check
 19011 00002CB1 5F                      	POP	DI
 19012 00002CB2 07                      	POP	ES
 19013 00002CB3 58                      	POP	AX
 19014                                  No_Set_Flag:
 19015                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; carry is clear
 19016                                  	;retn
 19017                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19018 00002CB4 E957EC                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19019                                  DelError:
 19020 00002CB7 F606[6F05]01            	TEST	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEFOUND ; not deleted. Did we find file?
 19021 00002CBC 7503                    	JNZ	short Del_access_errJ 	; yes. Access denied
 19022                                  No_fileJ:
 19023 00002CBE E914FF                  	JMP	No_file ; 10/08/2018 		; Nope
 19024                                  Del_access_errJ:
 19025 00002CC1 E926FF                  	JMP	Del_access_err ; 10/08/2018
 19026                                  
 19027                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19028                                  
 19029                                  ;Break	<REN_DEL_Check - check for access for rename and delete>
 19030                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19031                                  ; Procedure Name : REN_DEL_Check
 19032                                  ;
 19033                                  ; Inputs:
 19034                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 19035                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 19036                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI points to firclus field of entry
 19037                                  ;	[WFP_Start] points to name
 19038                                  ; Function:
 19039                                  ;	Check for Exclusive access on given file.
 19040                                  ;	  Used by RENAME, SET_FILE_INFO, and DELETE.
 19041                                  ; Outputs:
 19042                                  ;	ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 19043                                  ;	NOTE: The WFP string pointed to by [WFP_Start] Will be Modified. The
 19044                                  ;		last element will be loaded from the directory entry. This is
 19045                                  ;		so the name given to the sharer doesn't have any meta chars in
 19046                                  ;		it.
 19047                                  ;	Carry set if sharing violation, INT 24H generated

 19050                                  ;		Caller must set the error if needed.

 19285                                  ;============================================================================
 19286                                  ; RENAME.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19287                                  ;============================================================================
 19288                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19289                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19290                                  
 19291                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 19292                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME
 19293                                  
 19294                                  ;**	Low level routine for renaming files
 19295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19296                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 19297                                  ;
 19298                                  ;	Modification history:
 19299                                  ;
 19300                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19301                                  
 19302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19303                                  ;
 19304                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19305                                  ;
 19306                                  ; Inputs:
 19307                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19308                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19309                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19310                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19311                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19312                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19313                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19314                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19315                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19316                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19317                                  ; Function:
 19318                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19319                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19320                                  ; Outputs:
 19321                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19322                                  ;	    OK
 19323                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19324                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19325                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19326                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19327                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19328                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19329                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19330                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19331                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19332                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19333                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19334                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19335                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19336                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19337                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19338                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19339                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19340                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19341                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19342                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19343                                  ;
 19344                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19345                                  
 19346                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19347                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19348                                  
 19349                                  DOS_RENAME:
 19350                                  
 19351                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 19352                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 19353                                  
 19354 00002D7A E8A2EA                  	call	TestNet
 19355 00002D7D 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 19356                                  
 19357                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19358                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 19359                                  ;ELSE
 19360                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19361                                  	;INT	2FH
 19362                                  	;return
 19363                                  
 19364 00002D7F B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19365 00002D82 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19366                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19367                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19368                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19369                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19370 00002D84 C3                      	retn
 19371                                  ;ENDIF
 19372                                  
 19373                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 19374 00002D85 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 19375 00002D8A 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 19376 00002D8E 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 19377 00002D92 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 19378 00002D94 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 19379 00002D96 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 19380 00002D99 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 19381 00002D9B 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 19382 00002D9D B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 19383 00002DA0 F9                      	STC
 19384 00002DA1 C3                      	retn
 19385                                  
 19386                                  SAMEDRV:
 19387 00002DA2 FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19388 00002DA6 FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 19389 00002DAA 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 19390                                  
 19391                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19392 00002DAE C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 19393 00002DB4 C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 19394 00002DB9 E825EB                  	call	ECritDisk
 19395 00002DBC E86807                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 19396                                  					;    points to entry
 19397 00002DBF 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 19398 00002DC1 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 19399 00002DC4 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19400 00002DC6 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 19401                                  GOTERR:
 19402 00002DC9 F9                      	STC
 19403                                  RENAME_POP:
 19404 00002DCA 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 19405 00002DCE 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19406                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19407                                  	;retn
 19408                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19409 00002DD2 E939EB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19410                                  
 19411                                  Check_Dev:
 19412                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19413                                  	;mov	ax,5
 19414 00002DD5 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 19415                                  	
 19416                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19417 00002DD8 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19418 00002DD9 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  check if source a dir  ;AN000;
 19419                                  	;add	si,21
 19420 00002DDD 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19421                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19422 00002DE0 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 19423 00002DE4 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19424 00002DE6 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 19425 00002DEA E86FFA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 19426                                  notdir:
 19427 00002DED 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19428 00002DEE 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19429                                  
 19430                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19431 00002DF0 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 19432 00002DF5 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19433                                  
 19434                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 19435                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 19436                                  ; directory entry found.
 19437                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 19438                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 19439                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 19440                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 19441                                  
 19442 00002DF7 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19443                                  	;add	si,26
 19444 00002DF9 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 19445 00002DFC E8C5FE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19446 00002DFF 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 19447 00002E01 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19448 00002E04 EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 19449                                  
 19450                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19451                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 19452                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later
 19453                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19454                                  
 19455                                  REN_OK1:				;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 19456                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19457                                  	; 31/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19458                                  	;PUSH	SI
 19459 00002E06 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;BN00X; PTM. check if source a dir ;AN000;
 19460                                  	;add	si,21
 19461 00002E0A 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 19462                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19463 00002E0D F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM. ;AN000;
 19464                                  	;JZ	short NOT_DIR1		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 19465 00002E11 7503                    	jnz	short SWAP_SOURCE ; 31/01/2024
 19466                                  	;POP	SI			;BN00X
 19467                                  	;JMP	SHORT SWAP_SOURCE	;BN00X
 19468                                  ;NOT_DIR1:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19469                                  	;POP	SI
 19470                                  
 19471                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19472 00002E13 E82CFF                  	call	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19473                                  SWAP_SOURCE:
 19474                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19475                                  	;MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]
 19476                                  	;MOV	[WFP_START],SI
 19477                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19478 00002E16 A1[B205]                	MOV	AX,[WFP_START]		; Swap source and destination
 19479 00002E19 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		; Swap source and destination
 19480 00002E1D 8936[B205]              	MOV	[WFP_START],SI		; WFP_START = Destination path
 19481 00002E21 A3[B405]                	MOV	[REN_WFP],AX		; REN_WFP   = Source path
 19482                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19483 00002E24 C706[B605]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1	; No current dir on dest
 19484                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 19485 00002E2A C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0FFh  ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 19486                                  					; A rename is like a CREATE_NEW as far
 19487                                  					; as the destination is concerned.
 19488 00002E30 E8F81C                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 19489                                  
 19490                                  ;   If this GETPATH fails due to file not found, we know all renames will work
 19491                                  ;   since no files match the destination name. If it fails for any other
 19492                                  ;   reason, the rename fails on a path not found, or whatever (also fails if
 19493                                  ;   we find a device or directory). If the GETPATH succeeds, we aren't sure
 19494                                  ;   if the rename should fail because we haven't built an explicit name by
 19495                                  ;   substituting for the meta chars in it. In this case the destination file
 19496                                  ;   spec with metas is in [NAME1] and the explicit source name is at RENAMEDMA
 19497                                  ;   in the directory entry part.
 19498                                  	
 19499 00002E33 722A                    	JC	short NODEST
 19500

 19884                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19885                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19886                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19887                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and

 19893                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19894                                  NEWNAM:
 19895                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 19908                                  ;============================================================================
 19909                                  ; FINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19910                                  ;============================================================================
 19911                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19912                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19913                                  
 19914                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 19915                                  ;	attributes
 19916                                  ;
 19917                                  ;	GET_FILE_INFO
 19918                                  ;	SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19919                                  ;
 19920                                  ;	Modification history:
 19921                                  ;
 19922                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19923                                  ;
 19924                                  ;	M025: Return access_denied if attempting to set
 19925                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 19926                                  ;
 19927                                  
 19928                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19929                                  
 19930                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19931                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19932                                  ;
 19933                                  ; Inputs:
 19934                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19935                                  ;		terminated)
 19936                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19937                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19938                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19939                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19940                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19941                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19942                                  ; Function:
 19943                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19944                                  ; Returns:
 19945                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19946                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19947                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19948                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19949                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19950                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19951                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19952                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19953                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19954                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19955                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19956                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19957                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19958                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19959                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19960                                  
 19961                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 20064                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 20065                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20066                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 20067                                  ; Inputs:
 20068                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20069                                  ;		terminated)
 20070                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20071                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20072                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20073                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20074                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20075                                  ;	[SATTRIB] is attribute of search (determines what files may be found)
 20076                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 20077                                  ; Function:
 20078                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 20079                                  ; Returns:
 20080                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20081                                  ;	    No error
 20082                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20083                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20084                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20085                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20086                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20087                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20088                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20089                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20090                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20091                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 20092                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 20093                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20094                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 20095                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 20096                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 20097                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20099

 20242                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 20244                                  
 20245                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 20246                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 20247                                  ;
 20248                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 20249                                  ;
 20250                                  ;	Modification history:
 20251                                  ;
 20252                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20253                                  
 20254                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 20255                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20256                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 20257                                  ;
 20258                                  ; Inputs:
 20259                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 20260                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 20261                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 20262                                  ; Function:
 20263                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20264                                  ; Returns:
 20265                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20266                                  ;    Carry clear
 20267                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20268                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20269                                  ; NOTE:
 20270                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20271                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20272                                  ;	that time.
 20273                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20274                                  
 20275                                  DOS_DUP:
 20276                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20277                                  
 20278                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20279 000030B7 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20280 000030BC 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20281                                  
 20282                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20283                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20284 000030C1 E874E7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20285 000030C4 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20286 000030C6 E86F21                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20287                                  DO_INC:
 20288                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20289 000030C9 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20290                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20291 000030CC C3                      	retn
 20292

 20299                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20300                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20301                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20302                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20303                                  ;
 20304                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20305                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20306                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20307                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20308                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20309                                  ;
 20310                                  ;	Revision history:
 20311                                  ;
 20312                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20313                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20314                                  
 20315                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20316                                  
 20317                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20318                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20319                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20320                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20321                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20322                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20323                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20324                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20325                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20326                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20327                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20328                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20329                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20330                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20331                                  
 20332                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20334                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20335                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20336                                  ;
 20337                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20338                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20339                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20340                                  ;			terminated)
 20341                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20342                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20343                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20344                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20345                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20346                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20347                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20348                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20349                                  ;
 20350                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20351                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20352                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20353                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20354                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20355                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20356                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20357                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20358                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20359                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20360                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20361                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20362                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20363                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20364                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20365                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20366                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20368                                  
 20369                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20370                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20371                                  
 20372                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20373                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20374                                  
 20375                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20376                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20377                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20378                                  
 20379                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20380                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20381                                  
 20382 000030CD 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20383                                  
 20384                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20385                                  ;
 20386                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20387                                  
 20388                                  Create_inter:
 20389 000030CF A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20390                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20391 000030D1 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20392 000030D3 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20393 000030D5 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20394                                  	
 20395                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20396                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20397 000030D7 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20398                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20399                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20400                                  	
 20401 000030DC B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20402                                  NoReset:
 20403 000030DE 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20404 000030E0 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20405 000030E2 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20406                                  AttErr:
 20407 000030E4 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20408                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20409                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20410 000030E7 E8EBE1                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20411 000030EA EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20412                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20413                                  ATT_OK:
 20414 000030EC C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20415 000030F0 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20416 000030F1 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20417 000030F5 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20418 000030F8 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20419                                  
 20420                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20421                                  
 20422 000030FA 07                      	POP	ES
 20423                                  
 20424                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20425                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20426                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20427 000030FB F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20428 00003100 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20429                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20430 00003102 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20431                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20432 00003103 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20433                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20434 00003106 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20435 00003108 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20436 00003109 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.

 20564 00003155 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20565 00003156 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20566 00003157 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20567 00003158 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20568 00003159 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4

 20570 0000315B 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6

 20577                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20578                                  ; file to the current size.

 20618                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20619                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20620                                  ;
 20621                                  ; Inputs:
 20622                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20623                                  ;		terminated)
 20624                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20625                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20626                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20627                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20628                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20629                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20630                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20631                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20632                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20633                                  ; Function:
 20634                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20635                                  ; Outputs:
 20636                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20637                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20638                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20639                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20640                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20641                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20642                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20643                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20644                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20645                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20646                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20647                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20648                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20649                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20650                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20651                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20652                                  
 20653                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20654 00003194 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20655 00003196 E936FF                  	JMP	Create_inter

 20664                                  ;	    1, set new volume id

 20668                                  ; Outputs:

 20701 000031AB 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20702

 20705

 20707 000031B1 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20708                                  
 20709                                  	; 01/02/2024

 20712 000031B3 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2

 20714 000031B8 F9                      	stc

 20741

 20746

 20769

 20777                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_EXT_mode
 20778                                  ;
 20779                                  ; Inputs:
 20780                                  ;	[EXTOPEN_ON]= flag for extended open
 20781                                  ;	SAVE_BX= mode specified in Extended Open
 20782                                  ; Function:
 20783                                  ;	Set mode in ThisSFT
 20784                                  ; Outputs:
 20785                                  ;	carry set,mode is set if from Extended Open
 20786                                  ;	carry clear, mode not set yet

 20790                                  
 20791                                  Set_EXT_mode:
 20792                                  
 20793                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20794 000031EA 36F606[F605]01          	TEST	byte [ss:EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20795 000031F0 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20796 000031F2 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20797                                  
 20798                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20799 000031F3 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 20800                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 20801 000031F7 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 20802 000031FB 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20803 000031FC F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.
 20804                                  NOTEX:					    ;AN000;
 20805 000031FD C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.

 20809                                  ;============================================================================
 20810                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20811                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20812                                  
 20813                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20814                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20815                                  
 20816                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20818                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20819                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20820                                  ;
 20821                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20822                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20823                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20824                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20825                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20826                                  ;
 20827                                  ;	Revision history:
 20828                                  ;
 20829                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20830                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20831                                  ;
 20832                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20833                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20834                                  ;
 20835                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20836                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20837                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20838                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20839                                  ;	       else do not.
 20840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20841                                  
 20842                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20843                                  
 20844                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20845                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20846                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20847                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20848                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20849                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20850                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20851                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20852                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20853                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20854                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20855                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20856                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20857                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20858                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20859                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20860                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20861                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20862                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20863                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20864                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20865                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20866                                  ;
 20867                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20868                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20869                                  
 20870                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20871                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20872                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20873                                  ;
 20874                                  ; Inputs:
 20875                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20876                                  ;		terminated)
 20877                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20878                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20879                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20880                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20881                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20882                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20883                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20884                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20885                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20886                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20887                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20888                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20889                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20890                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20891                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20892                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20893                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20894                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20895                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20896                                  ;
 20897                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20898                                  ;		(not checked)
 20899                                  ; Function:
 20900                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20901                                  ; Outputs:
 20902                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20903                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20904                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20905                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20906                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20907                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20908                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20909                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20910                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20911                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20912                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20913                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 20914                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 20915                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20916                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 20917                                  ;			open a directory
 20918                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20919                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20920                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 20921                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20923                                  
 20924                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20925                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20926                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20927                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20928

 20932                                  DOS_OPEN:

 20959                                  					    ; has the open access bits.

 20976                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 20977                                  ;ELSE
 20978                                  	
 20979                                  do_net_int2f:
 20980 00003234 F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 20981 00003239 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20982                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 20983                                  					;    of this 
 20984                                  	
 20985                                  					; M042 - start
 20986                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h

 20988                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 20989                                  					;    this
 20990 00003240 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20991                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 20992                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 20993                                  					; M042 - end
 20994

 20996                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 20997                                  	; always one.

 21002                                  not_exec_open:
 21003                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 21004 00003244 50                      	PUSH	AX
 21005

 21007                                  	;INT	2FH
 21008

 21010 00003248 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 21011                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 21012                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
