 21083                                  Open_found:
 21084 00003287 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 21085 00003289 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 21086 0000328B 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 21087 0000328D 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 21088                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 21089 00003291 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 21090 00003295 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 21091 00003297 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 21092 00003299 A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 21093 0000329B 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 21094                                  
 21095                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 21096                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 21097                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 21098                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 21099                                  ;
 21100                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21101                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21102                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 21103                                  
 21104 0000329D 1E                      	push	ds
 21105 0000329E 56                      	push	si
 21106 0000329F C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 21107                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 21108 000032A3 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21109                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21110                                  	;test	ch,80h
 21111 000032A6 F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 21112                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 21113 000032A9 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 21114 000032AB 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 21115 000032AD 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 21116 000032B0 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 21117 000032B3 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 21118                                  ResetAccess:
 21119                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 21120                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 21121                                  	; 16/12/2022
 21122                                  	;and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 21123                                  	;;;
 21124                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21125                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21126                                  	;and	cx,0FFFCh
 21127 000032B5 80E1FC                  	and	cl,0FCh ; ~3 ; ~open_mode_mask ; clear access
 21128                                  	;;;
 21129                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 21130 000032B8 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 21131 000032BB EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 21132                                  
 21133                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 21134                                  
 21135                                  NormalOpen:
 21136                                  	;AND	CL,access_mask	; 0Fh	; remove extras
 21137                                  	;;;
 21138                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21139                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21140 000032BD 80E103                  	and     cl,3		; it was 'and cl,0Fh' in MSDOS 6.22
 21141                                  				; (and cl,access_mask)
 21142                                  				; this may be open_mode_mask
 21143                                  	;;;
 21144 000032C0 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 21145 000032C3 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT	; yes
 21146 000032C5 5E                      	pop	si
 21147 000032C6 1F                      	pop	ds
 21148 000032C7 EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 21149                                  ;
 21150                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 21151                                  ;
 21152                                  FillSFT:
 21153 000032C9 5E                      	pop	si
 21154 000032CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 21155                                  open_ok:
 21156 000032CB E85A23                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 21157                                  
 21158                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 21159                                  	; 18/05/2019
 21160                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 21161 000032CE 368026[4611]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 21162                                  	; 12/08/2018

 21164

 21167 000032D7 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK

 21171                                  	;;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 21172                                  	;retn	; 18/05/2019
 21173                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 21174                                  	;jmp	short Clear_FastOpen	
 21175                                  
 21176                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 21177                                  ;DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21178                                  ;	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21179                                  ;OpenShareRetry:
 21180                                  ;	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21181                                  ;	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21182                                  ;	pop	cx			; CX = # left

 21186                                  ;OpenShareFail:

 21188                                  ;	call	SHARE_ERROR

 21190                                  	
 21191                                  	;12/08/2018

 21193                                  	;08/09/2018
 21194                                  	;mov	byte [FastOpenFlg],0

 21199                                  SHARE_OK:
 21200                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 21201 000032DC B80300                  	MOV	AX,3
 21202 000032DF C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21203                                  ;if installed
 21204                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 21205 000032E3 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 21206                                  ;else
 21207                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 21208                                  ;endif
 21209 000032E7 E824E6                  	call	LCritDisk
 21210                                  	
 21211                                  	;FallThru Set_SFT_Mode
 21212                                  
 21213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21214                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_SFT_MODE
 21215                                  ;
 21216                                  ; Finish SFT initialization for new reference. Set the correct mode.
 21217                                  ;
 21218                                  ;   Inputs:
 21219                                  ;	ThisSFT points to SFT
 21220                                  ;
 21221                                  ;   Outputs:
 21222                                  ;	Carry clear
 21223                                  ;   Registers modified: AX.
 21224                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21225                                  
 21226                                  ;hkn; called from create. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 21227                                  
 21228                                  SET_SFT_MODE:
 21229 000032EA C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21230 000032EE E8471F                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 21231                                  	;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 21232                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21233                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 21234 000032F1 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8
 21235                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; Clears carry
 21236 000032F6 7407                    	JZ	short Clear_FastOpen	; sf_mode correct (retz)
 21237 000032F8 A1[3003]                	MOV	AX,[CurrentPDB]
 21238                                  	;mov	[es:di+31h],ax

 21240

 21243                                  
 21244                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21245                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 21246                                  ;
 21247                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 21248                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 21249                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 21250                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 21251                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21252                                  
 21253                                  SHARE_ERROR:
 21254                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21255                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 21256 00003300 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8 ; 80h
 21257                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h
 21258 00003305 7509                    	JNZ	short _HARD_ERR
 21259 00003307 268A4D02                	MOV	CL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21260 0000330B 80E1F0                  	AND	CL,SHARING_MASK  ; 0F0h
 21261                                  	;CMP	CL,SHARING_COMPAT ; 0
 21262                                  	;JNE	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21263                                  	; 21/09/2023
 21264 0000330E 7505                    	jnz	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21265                                  _HARD_ERR:
 21266 00003310 E86851                  	call	SHARE_VIOLATION
 21267                                  	;retnc				; User wants retry
 21268 00003313 73EA                    	jnc	short Clear_FastOpen
 21269                                  _NO_HARD_ERR:
 21270 00003315 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 21271 00003318 F9                      	STC
 21272 00003319 C3                      	retn
 21273                                  
 21274                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 21275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21276                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 21277                                  ;
 21278                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 21279                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 21280                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 21281                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok
 21282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21283                                  
 21284                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21285                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21286 0000331A E8C4E5                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 21287                                  OPN_RETRY:
 21288 0000331D 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21289                                  OpenShareRetry:
 21290 00003321 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21291 00003322 E85151                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21292 00003325 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21293 00003326 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 21294 00003328 E8AFE4                  	call	Idle
 21295 0000332B E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 21296                                  OpenShareFail:
 21297 0000332D C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21298 00003331 E8CCFF                  	call	SHARE_ERROR
 21299 00003334 73E7                    	JNC	short OPN_RETRY		; User wants more retry
 21300                                  Share_Ok2:
 21301                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; leave critical section
 21302                                  	;retn
 21303                                  	; 18/12/2022
 21304 00003336 E9D5E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21305                                  
 21306                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21307                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 21308                                  ;
 21309                                  ; Inputs:
 21310                                  ;	AX is mode
 21311                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 21312                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 21313                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 21314                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 21315                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 21316                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 21317                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 21318                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 21319                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 21320                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 21321                                  ; Function:
 21322                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 21323                                  ; Outputs:
 21324                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 21325                                  ;	Carry Clear
 21326                                  ;		Mode is correct
 21327                                  ;		AX unchanged
 21328                                  ;	Carry Set
 21329                                  ;		Mode is bad
 21330                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 21331                                  ; No other registers effected
 21332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21333                                  
 21334                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21335                                  Check_Access_AX:
 21336 00003339 A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 21337 0000333C 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21338                                  
 21339                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 21340                                  
 21341 0000333D 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21342 0000333F 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 21343                                  
 21344                                  	;CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 21345                                  	;JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21346                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21347                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21348 00003342 803E[7205]00            	cmp	byte [FSHARING],0
 21349 00003347 7405                    	jz	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21350                                  
 21351 00003349 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h
 21352 0000334C 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 21353                                  CheckShareMode:
 21354 0000334E 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 21355 00003351 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21356                                  CheckAccessMode:
 21357 00003353 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21358                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21359 00003355 80E303                  	and	bl,3 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM	
 21360                                  	;AND	BL,access_mask ; 0Fh
 21361 00003358 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 21362 0000335B 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21363 0000335D 5B                      	POP	BX
 21364 0000335E F8                      	CLC
 21365 0000335F C3                      	retn
 21366                                  
 21367                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 21368 00003360 B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 21369 00003363 5B                      	POP	BX
 21370 00003364 F9                      	STC
 21371 00003365 C3                      	retn
 21372                                  
 21373                                  ;============================================================================
 21374                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21375                                  ;============================================================================
 21376                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21377                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21378                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21379                                  
 21380                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 21381                                  ;	  or NET device
 21382                                  ;
 21383                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 21384                                  ;
 21385                                  ;	  Modification history:
 21386                                  ;
 21387                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21388                                  
 21389                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 21390                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21391                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 21392                                  ;
 21393                                  ; Inputs:
 21394                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 21395                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 21396                                  ; Function:
 21397                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 21398                                  ; Returns:
 21399                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 21400                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 21401                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 21402                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 21403                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 21404                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 21405                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 21406                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21407                                  
 21408                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to
 21409                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 21410                                  
 21411                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21412                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:732Bh
 21413                                  
 21414                                  DISK_INFO:
 21415                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21416                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 21417                                  
 21418 00003366 E8B6E4                  	call	TestNet
 21419 00003369 7318                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 21420                                  
 21421                                  	;;;
 21422                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21423 0000336B 31F6                    	xor     si,si	; free cluster count hw = 0
 21424 0000336D 31FF                    	xor     di,di	; number of clusters hw = 0
 21425                                  	;;;
 21426                                  
 21427                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21428                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 21429                                  ;ELSE
 21430                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 21431                                  	;INT	2FH
 21432                                  	;return
 21433                                  
 21434 0000336F B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 21435 00003372 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 21436                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 21437                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 21438                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 21439                                  	;;;
 21440                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21441 00003374 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh
 21442 00003377 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_1
 21443 00003379 89DF                    	mov	di,bx
 21444                                  dsk_info_1:
 21445 0000337B 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh
 21446 0000337E 7502                    	jne	short disk_info_retn
 21447 00003380 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 21448                                  disk_info_retn:
 21449                                  	;;;
 21450 00003382 C3                      	retn
 21451                                  ;ENDIF
 21452                                  
 21453                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 21454                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 21455                                  	;;;
 21456                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21457 00003383 E858DF                  	call	set_exerr_locus_disk
 21458                                  	;;;
 21459 00003386 E858E5                  	call	ECritDisk
 21460 00003389 E80132                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; perform media check.
 21461                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21462                                  	;;; 02/02/2024
 21463 0000338C 720D                    	jc	short dsk_info_2
 21464 0000338E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21465 00003390 A3[E80A]                	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],ax ; 0	; clear high word of cluster number
 21466                                  	;;;
 21467 00003393 BB0200                  	MOV	BX,2
 21468 00003396 E8792F                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 21469                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21470                                  	;;;
 21471                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21472 00003399 7303                    	jnc	short dsk_info_3
 21473                                  dsk_info_2:
 21474                                  	;jmp	CRIT_LEAVE
 21475 0000339B E970E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21476                                  dsk_info_3:
 21477                                  	;;;
 21478 0000339E C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 21479                                  	; 02/02/2024
 21480                                  	;;mov	ah,[si+20]
 21481                                  	;mov	ah,[si+24] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21482 000033A2 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 21483                                  
 21484                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 21485 000033A5 16                      	push	ss
 21486 000033A6 1F                      	pop	ds
 21487                                  
 21488                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21489                                  %if 0
 21490                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21491                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21492                                  
 21493                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 21494                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 21495                                  
 21496                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21497                                  	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 21498                                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 21499                                  	JZ	short DoScan
 21500                                  
 21501                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 21502                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 21503                                  ; the count.
 21504                                  
 21505                                  	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 21506                                  	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 21507                                  DoScan:
 21508                                  	XOR	DX,DX
 21509                                  	DEC	CX
 21510                                  SCANFREE:
 21511                                  	call	UNPACK
 21512                                  	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21513                                  	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 21514                                  	INC	DX			; A free one
 21515                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21516                                  	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 21517                                  	LOOP	SCANFREE
 21518                                  	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 21519                                  ReturnVals:
 21520                                  	DEC	BX			; count
 21521                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21522                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 21523                                  	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 21524                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21525                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 21526                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 21527                                  	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 21528                                  	CLC
 21529                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21530                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21531                                  	;retn
 21532                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21533                                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21534                                  
 21535                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 21536                                  ; return.
 21537                                  
 21538                                  GotVal: 
 21539                                  	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 21540                                  	JMP	short ReturnVals
 21541                                  
 21542                                  %else
 21543                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21544 000033A7 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21545 000033A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si	; 0
 21546                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21547 000033AB 268B561F                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]	; get free count
 21548                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],si
 21549 000033AF 2639760F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],si ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21550 000033B3 7406                    	jz	short dsk_info_4	; yes
 21551                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21552 000033B5 268B4E0D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21553 000033B9 EB18                    	jmp	short dsk_info_5 ; zf=0, si=di=0
 21554                                  
 21555                                  dsk_info_4:
 21556                                  	;mov	di,[es:bp+2Fh]
 21557 000033BB 268B7E2F                	mov	di,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 21558                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 21559 000033BF 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 21560                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+21h]
 21561 000033C3 268B7621                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW] ; hw of free cluster count
 21562 000033C7 39F2                    	cmp	dx,si			; same (zero) ?
 21563                                  ;dsk_info_5:
 21564 000033C9 7504                    	jnz	short dsk_info_6	; not same (not zero)
 21565 000033CB 42                      	inc	dx
 21566 000033CC 740B                    	jz	short dsk_info_8	; 0FFFFh -> 0 (free count is invalid/initial)
 21567                                  					; free count calculation is needed
 21568 000033CE 4A                      	dec	dx
 21569                                  dsk_info_6:
 21570 000033CF 39FE                    	cmp	si,di			; same hw ?
 21571 000033D1 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_7	; no
 21572                                  dsk_info_5:	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 21573 000033D3 39CA                    	cmp	dx,cx			; same lw ?
 21574                                  dsk_info_7:
 21575 000033D5 7268                    	jb	short GotVal		; free cluster count < last cluster number
 21576 000033D7 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; 0
 21577                                  dsk_info_8:
 21578 000033D9 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21579 000033DB 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; last cluster number - 1 = number of clusters
 21580 000033DE 19F7                    	sbb	di,si
 21581                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 21582 000033E0 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1 ; set first access bit 0
 21583                                  					; (Update flag for FSINFO sector)
 21584                                  SCANFREE:
 21585 000033E5 56                      	push	si
 21586 000033E6 FF36[EC0A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21587 000033EA 57                      	push	di
 21588 000033EB E8242F                  	call	UNPACK
 21589 000033EE 5F                      	pop	di
 21590 000033EF 8F06[EC0A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21591 000033F3 5E                      	pop	si
 21592 000033F4 7246                    	jc	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21593 000033F6 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21594 000033F8 42                      	inc	dx			; a free one
 21595 000033F9 7501                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21596 000033FB 46                      	inc	si			; increase hw of free cluster count
 21597                                  
 21598                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21599 000033FC 43                      	inc	bx			; next cluster
 21600 000033FD 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS2
 21601 000033FF FF06[E80A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]	; increase hw of (next) cluster number
 21602                                  
 21603                                  NOTFREECLUS2:
 21604 00003403 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; decrease remain cluster count for calculation
 21605 00003406 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0
 21606 00003409 75DA                    	jnz	short SCANFREE
 21607 0000340B E302                    	jcxz	NOTFREECLUS3		; calculation completed
 21608 0000340D EBD6                    	jmp	short SCANFREE
 21609                                  
 21610                                  NOTFREECLUS3:
 21611 0000340F 8B3E[E80A]              	mov	di,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 21612 00003413 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21613 00003416 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0			; di:bx = last cluster number
 21614                                  
 21615                                  ReturnVals:
 21616 00003419 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21617 0000341B 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21618 0000341E 19CF                    	sbb	di,cx			; di:bx = number of clusters
 21619                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21620 00003420 268A4604                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK] ; spc - 1
 21621 00003424 FEC0                    	inc	al			; sectors per cluster
 21622                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx		
 21623 00003426 2689561F                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],dx	; free cluster count,lw
 21624                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx ; 0
 21625 0000342A 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0 ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21626 0000342E 7507                    	jnz	short ReturnVals2	; no
 21627                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],si
 21628 00003430 26897621                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW],si ; hw of free cluster count
 21629                                  
 21630 00003434 E83800                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 21631                                  
 21632                                  ReturnVals2:
 21633                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21634 00003437 268B4E02                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; bytes per sector
 21635 0000343B F8                      	clc
 21636                                  
 21637                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21638                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21639                                  	;retn
 21640 0000343C E9CFE4                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21641                                  
 21642                                  GotVal:
 21643 0000343F 89CB                    	mov	bx,cx
 21644 00003441 EBD6                    	jmp	short ReturnVals
 21645                                  
 21646                                  %endif
 21647                                  
 21648                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21649                                  
 21650                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21651                                  
 21652                                  modify_spc:
 21653 00003443 50                      	push	ax			; ax = sectors per cluster
 21654 00003444 52                      	push	dx
 21655 00003445 F7E1                    	mul	cx			; bytes per sector
 21656                                  	;cmp	dx,0
 21657 00003447 21D2                    	and	dx,dx
 21658 00003449 7503                    	jnz	short mspc_1
 21659 0000344B 3D0040                  	cmp	ax,16384		; 16 kilobytes (per cluster)
 21660                                  					; ***
 21661                                  					; actual disk size limit
 21662                                  					; without invalidating cluster counts is
 21663                                  					; 2 GB (512K clusters * 8 sectors per cluster)
 21664                                  					;      (128K clusters * 32 sectors per cluster)
 21665                                  mspc_1:
 21666 0000344E 5A                      	pop	dx
 21667 0000344F 58                      	pop	ax
 21668 00003450 760E                    	jbe	short mspc_3		; bytes per cluster <= 16 KB
 21669                                                                          ; ***
 21670                                                                          ; bytes per cluster > 16 KB
 21671 00003452 31FF                    	xor	di,di			; 0
 21672 00003454 BBFEFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFEh		; (invalidated)
 21673 00003457 09F6                    	or	si,si			; hw of free cluster count
 21674 00003459 7404                    	jz	short mspc_2		; si = 0
 21675 0000345B 89FE                    	mov	si,di			; si = 0
 21676 0000345D 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx			; dx = bx = 0FFFEh (invalidated)
 21677                                  mspc_2:
 21678 0000345F C3                      	retn
 21679                                  
 21680                                  mspc_3:
 21681 00003460 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1			; sectors per clust = sectors per clust * 2
 21682                                  					; (ax <= 32768) -modified spc limit-
 21683 00003462 D1EF                    	shr	di,1			; cluster count = cluster count /2
 21684                                  					; di:bx = modified value of total clusters
 21685                                  mspc_4:
 21686 00003464 D1DB                    	rcr	bx,1
 21687 00003466 D1EE                    	shr	si,1			; free clusters = free clusters / 2
 21688 00003468 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1			; si:dx = modified value of free clusters
 21689                                  
 21690                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21691                                  
 21692                                  	; 03/02/2024
 21693                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7431h
 21694                                  
 21695                                  modify_cluster_count:
 21696 0000346A 09FF                    	or	di,di			; hw of cluster count
 21697 0000346C 75D5                    	jnz	short modify_spc
 21698 0000346E C3                      	retn
 21699                                  
 21700                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21701                                  
 21702                                  ; write FSINFO sector onto disk
 21703                                  
 21704                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21705                                  ; --------------------------------
 21706                                  ; FAT32 FSInfo Sector Structure
 21707                                  ; --------------------------------
 21708                                  ; ref: Microsoft FAT32 File System Specification (2000)
 21709                                  
 21710                                  struc FSINFO		; Offset ;
 21711 00000000 ????????                .LeadSig:	resb 4	  ; 0		; Value 0x41615252. Lead Signature.
 21712 00000004 <res 1E0h>              .Reserved1:	resb 480  ; 4		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21713 000001E4 ????????                .StrucSig:	resb 4	  ; 484		; Value 0x61417272. Fields Signature.
 21714 000001E8 ????????                .Free_Count:	resb 4	  ; 488		; Last known free cluster count. (*) 
 21715 000001EC ????????                .Nxt_Free:	resb 4	  ; 492		; Start clus for free clus srch. (**)
 21716 000001F0 <res Ch>                .Reserved2:	resb 12	  ; 496		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21717 000001FC ????????                .TrailSig:	resb 4	  ; 508		; Value 0xAA550000. Trail Signature.
 21718                                  .size:
 21719                                  endstruc
 21720                                  
 21721                                  ; (*) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then the free count is unknown
 21722                                  ;     and must be computed.
 21723                                  ; (**) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then free cluster search must be started
 21724                                  ;     from cluster 2.
 21725                                  ; Lead Signature, Fields (Structure) Signature and Trail Signature
 21726                                  ; are used to validate FSInfo sector.
 21727                                  
 21728                                  ; --------------------------------
 21729                                  
 21730                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21731                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7436h
 21732                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7227h)
 21733                                  
 21734                                  update_fat32_fsinfo:
 21735 0000346F 51                      	push	cx
 21736 00003470 52                      	push	dx
 21737 00003471 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21738                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+25h]
 21739 00003473 268B5625                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FSINFO_SECTOR]
 21740                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx
 21741 00003477 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0
 21742                                  				; (16bit FAT size field = 0 for FAT32 fs)
 21743 0000347B 7505                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_1
 21744 0000347D 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh ; -1
 21745 00003480 7508                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_2
 21746                                  
 21747                                  u_fat32_inf_1:
 21748 00003482 5A                      	pop	dx
 21749 00003483 59                      	pop	cx
 21750                                  	;and	byte [es:bp+18h],0F4h
 21751 00003484 26806618F4              	and	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],0F4h ; clear bit 0,1 and 3
 21752                                  					; bit 0 - FSINFO update (dirty) bit
 21753                                  					; bit 1 - BPB_RootClus update bit
 21754                                  					; bit 3 - BPB_ExtFlags update bit
 21755 00003489 C3                      	retn
 21756                                  
 21757                                  u_fat32_inf_2:
 21758 0000348A 50                      	push	ax
 21759 0000348B 53                      	push	bx
 21760 0000348C 57                      	push	di
 21761 0000348D 56                      	push	si
 21762 0000348E 1E                      	push	ds
 21763 0000348F 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffers in HMA?
 21764 00003495 740A                    	jz	short u_fat32_inf_3	; no
 21765 00003497 36C53E[7A00]            	lds	di,[ss:LoMemBuff]	; read it into scratch buffer
 21766                                  	;sub	di,24
 21767 0000349C 83EF18                  	sub	di,BUFINSIZ		; space for buffer header
 21768                                  					; (buffer header size = 24)
 21769                                  	;clc
 21770 0000349F EB0E                    	jmp	short u_fat32_inf_4
 21771                                  
 21772                                  u_fat32_inf_3:
 21773 000034A1 06                      	push	es
 21774 000034A2 55                      	push	bp
 21775 000034A3 E84534                  	call	GETCURHEAD		; ds:di = first buffer in queue
 21776 000034A6 52                      	push	dx
 21777 000034A7 E8A136                  	call	BUFWRITE		; BufWrite writes a buffer to the disk,
 21778                                  					;  if it's dirty.
 21779 000034AA 5A                      	pop	dx
 21780 000034AB 5D                      	pop	bp
 21781 000034AC 07                      	pop	es
 21782                                  ;u_fat32_inf_4:
 21783 000034AD 726A                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21784                                  u_fat32_inf_4:
 21785 000034AF 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21786                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24]
 21787 000034B1 8D5D18                  	lea	bx,[di+BUFINSIZ]	; buffer data address
 21788                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 21789 000034B4 36C606[4B03]18          	mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 21790 000034BA 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 21791 000034BF 41                      	inc	cx			; cx = sector count = 1
 21792                                  					; es:bp = DPB
 21793 000034C0 53                      	push	bx			; ds:bx = buffer (data) address
 21794 000034C1 52                      	push	dx			; HIGH_SECTOR:dx = disk sector address
 21795 000034C2 E8300B                  	call	DREAD		 	; read fs info sector
 21796 000034C5 5A                      	pop	dx
 21797 000034C6 5B                      	pop	bx
 21798 000034C7 7250                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21799                                  
 21800                                  	;cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig],5252h	
 21801 000034C9 813F5252                	cmp	word [bx],5252h		; 'RR'
 21802 000034CD 754A                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21803                                  	;cmp	word [bx+2],4161h	; 'aA' ; (NASM syntax)
 21804 000034CF 817F026141              	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig+2],4161h
 21805 000034D4 7543                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21806                                  	
 21807                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E4h],7272h	; 'rr' at offset 484
 21808 000034D6 81BFE4017272            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig],7272h
 21809 000034DC 753B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21810                                  
 21811                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E6h],6141h	; 'Aa' at offset 486
 21812 000034DE 81BFE6014161            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig+2],6141h
 21813 000034E4 7533                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21814                                  
 21815                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1FEh],0AA55h	; boot signature at offset 510
 21816 000034E6 81BFFE0155AA            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.TrailSig+2],0AA55h
 21817 000034EC 752B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21818                                  	
 21819                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21820 000034EE 268B461F                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]
 21821                                  	;mov	[bx+1E8h],ax 
 21822 000034F2 8987E801                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count],ax ; at offset 488
 21823                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+21h]
 21824 000034F6 268B4621                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 21825                                  	;mov	[bx+1EAh],ax
 21826 000034FA 8987EA01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count+2],ax
 21827                                  
 21828                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+39h]
 21829 000034FE 268B4639                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE]
 21830                                  	;mov	[bx+1ECh],ax

 21850                                  ;============================================================================
 21851                                  ; ISEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21852                                  ;============================================================================
 21853                                  ; 22/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21854                                  
 21855                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_SEARCH - Internal SEARCH calls for MS-DOS
 21856                                  ;	NAME	DOS_SEARCH
 21857                                  
 21858                                  ;**	Low level routines for doing local and NET directory searches
 21859                                  ;
 21860                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21861                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 21862                                  ;	RENAME_NEXT
 21863                                  ;
 21864                                  ;	Revision history:
 21865                                  ;
 21866                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21867                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 21868                                  ;	    A001	PTM 3564 -- search for fastopen
 21869                                  
 21870                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 21871                                  
 21872                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21873                                  ;
 21874                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21875                                  ;
 21876                                  ; Inputs:
 21877                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 21878                                  ;		terminated)
 21879                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 21880                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 21881                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 21882                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 21883                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 21884                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 21885                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer
 21886                                  ; Function:
 21887                                  ;	Initiate a search for the given file spec
 21888                                  ; Outputs:
 21889                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 21890                                  ;	    The 53 bytes ot DMAADD are filled in as follows:
 21891                                  ;
 21892                                  ;	LOCAL
 21893                                  ;	    Drive Byte (A=1, B=2, ...) High bit clear
 21894                                  ;		NEVER STORE DRIVE BYTE AFTER  found_it
 21895                                  ;	    11 byte search name with Meta chars in it
 21896                                  ;	    Search Attribute Byte, attribute of search
 21897                                  ;	    WORD LastEnt value
 21898                                  ;	    WORD DirStart
 21899                                  ;	    4 byte pad
 21900                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21901                                  ;	NET
 21902                                  ;	    21 bytes First byte has high bit set
 21903                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21904                                  ;
 21905                                  ;	CARRY SET
 21906                                  ;	    AX = error code
 21907                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 21908                                  ;			No match for this file
 21909                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 21910                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 21911                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 21912                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 21913                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 21914                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21915                                  
 21916                                  ; 24/01/2024
 21917                                  %if 1
 21918                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21919                                  GET_FAST_SEARCH:
 21920                                  	; 22/07/2018
 21921                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21922                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21923 00003521 36800E[1206]04          	OR	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],(SEARCH_FASTOPEN>>8)  ; 04h
 21924                                  	;OR	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],SEARCH_FASTOPEN  ; 400h
 21925                                  					;FO.trigger fastopen ;AN000;
 21926                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21927                                  	;retn
 21928                                  	; 24/01/2024
 21929                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21930                                  	;jmp	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21931                                  %endif

 22160                                  ;BREAK <DOS_SEARCH_NEXT - scan for subsequent matches>
 22161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22162                                  ;
 22163                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 22164                                  ;
 22165                                  ; Inputs:
 22166                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer returned by DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 22167                                  ;	    (only first 21 bytes must have valid information)
 22168                                  ; Function:
 22169                                  ;	Look for subsequent matches
 22170                                  ; Outputs:
 22171                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 22172                                  ;	    The 53 bytes at DMAADD are updated for next call
 22173                                  ;		(see DOS_SEARCH_FIRST)
 22174                                  ;	CARRY SET
 22175                                  ;	    AX = error code
 22176                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 22177                                  ;			No more files to find
 22178                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 22179                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22180                                  
 22181                                  ;hkn; called from search.asm. DS already set up at this point.
 22182                                  
 22183                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22184                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:75ECh
 22185                                  
 22186                                  DOS_SEARCH_NEXT:
 22187 00003621 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]	; 24/01/2024 (Retro DOS v5-v4)
 22188 00003625 268A05                  	MOV	AL,[ES:DI]
 22189 00003628 A880                    	TEST	AL,80H			; Test for NET
 22190 0000362A 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_SEARCH_NEXT
 22191                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 22192                                  ;	transfer NET_SEARCH_NEXT
 22193                                  ;ELSE
 22194                                  	;mov	ax,111Ch
 22195 0000362C B81C11                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|28
 22196 0000362F CD2F                    	INT	2FH  ; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - FINDNEXT
 22197                                  		     ; SS = DS = DOS CS, [DTA] = 21-byte findfirst search data
 22198                                  		     ; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22199                                  		     ; CF clear if successful
 22200 00003631 C3                      	retn
 22201                                  ;ENDIF
 22202                                  
 22203                                  LOCAL_SEARCH_NEXT:
 22204                                  	;AL is drive A=1
 22205                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 22206 00003632 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk

 22311                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_QUESTION
 22312                                  ;
 22313                                  ; Input: [WFP_START]= pointer to final path
 22314                                  ; Function: check '?' char
 22315                                  ; Output: carry clear, if no '?'
 22316                                  ;	 carry set, if '?' exists
 22317                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22318

 22320                                  %if 0

 22323                                  ;hkn;	wfp_start is in DOSDATA;hkn;	MOV	WORD PTR ThisCDS+2,CS

 22342                                  ;============================================================================
 22343                                  ; ABORT.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22344                                  ;============================================================================
 22345                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22346                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22347                                  
 22348                                  ;**
 22349                                  ;
 22350                                  ; Internal Abort call closes all handles and FCBs associated with a process.
 22351                                  ;  If process has NET resources a close all is sent out over the net.
 22352                                  ;
 22353                                  ;   DOS_ABORT
 22354                                  ;
 22355                                  ;   Modification history:
 22356                                  ;
 22357                                  ;       Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 22358                                  ;
 22359                                  ;	M038	SR	10/16/90	Free SFT with the PSP of the process
 22360                                  ;				being terminated only if it is busy.
 22361                                  ;
 22362                                  
 22363                                  ;Break   <DOS_ABORT -- CLOSE all files for process>
 22364                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22365                                  ;
 22366                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ABORT
 22367                                  ;
 22368                                  ; Inputs:
 22369                                  ;       [CurrentPDB] set to PID of process aborting
 22370                                  ; Function:
 22371                                  ;       Close all files and free all SFTs for this PID
 22372                                  ; Returns:
 22373                                  ;       None
 22374                                  ; All destroyed except stack
 22375                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22376                                  
 22377                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22378                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7685h
 22379                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:74F4h) 
 22380                                  
 22381                                  DOS_ABORT:
 22382 000036B4 368E06[3003]            	MOV     ES,[SS:CurrentPDB]	; SS override
 22383 000036B9 268B0E3200              	MOV     CX,[ES:PDB.JFN_Length]  ; Number of JFNs
 22384                                  reset_free_jfn:
 22385 000036BE 89CB                    	MOV     BX,CX
 22386 000036C0 51                      	PUSH    CX
 22387 000036C1 4B                      	DEC     BX                      ; get jfn (start with last one)
 22388                                  
 22389 000036C2 E8D740                  	CALL	_$CLOSE
 22390 000036C5 59                      	POP     CX
 22391 000036C6 E2F6                    	LOOP    reset_free_jfn          ; and do 'em all
 22392                                  
 22393                                  ; Note: We do need to explicitly close FCBs. Reasons are as follows: If we
 22394                                  ; are running in the no-sharing no-network environment, we are simulating the
 22395                                  ; 2.0 world and thus if the user doesn't close the file, that is his problem
 22396                                  ; BUT... the cache remains in a state with garbage that may be reused by the
 22397                                  ; next process. We scan the set and blast the ref counts of the FCBs we own.
 22398                                  ;
 22399                                  ; If sharing is loaded, then the following call to close process will
 22400                                  ; correctly close all FCBs. We will then need to walk the list AFTER here.
 22401                                  ;
 22402                                  ; Finally, the following call to NET_Abort will cause an EOP to be sent to all
 22403                                  ; known network resources. These resources are then responsible for cleaning
 22404                                  ; up after this process.
 22405                                  ;
 22406                                  ; Sleazy, eh?
 22407                                  
 22408                                  	;context DS			; SS is DOSDATA
 22409 000036C8 16                      	push	ss
 22410 000036C9 1F                      	pop	ds  ; 09/09/2018
 22411                                  
 22412                                  	;CallInstall Net_Abort, MultNET, 29
 22413 000036CA B81D11                  	mov	ax,111Dh
 22414 000036CD CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR 
 22415                                  			;	    - CLOSE ALL REMOTE FILES FOR PROCESS
 22416                                  			; DS???, SS = DOS CS
 22417                                  ;if installed
 22418 000036CF FF1E[A000]              	call	far [JShare+(4*4)]	; 4 = MFTCloseP
 22419                                  ;else
 22420                                  ;	call 	MFTCloseP
 22421                                  ;endif
 22422                                  
 22423                                  ; Scan the FCB cache for guys that belong to this process and zap their ref
 22424                                  ; counts.
 22425                                  					; SS override
 22426 000036D3 36C43E[4000]            	les     di,[ss:SFTFCB]		; grab the pointer to the table
 22427                                  
 22428                                  	;;;
 22429                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22430                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22431                                  SFTFCB_check:
 22432 000036D8 8CC1                    	mov	cx,es
 22433 000036DA 09F9                    	or	cx,di
 22434 000036DC E31C                    	jcxz	FCBScanDone
 22435 000036DE 57                      	push	di
 22436                                  SFTFCB_OK:
 22437                                  	;;;
 22438                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 22439 000036DF 268B4D04                	mov     cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]
 22440 000036E3 E315                    	jcxz    FCBScanDone
 22441                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 22442 000036E5 8D7D06                  	LEA     DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]	; point at table
 22443 000036E8 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22444                                  FCBTest:
 22445                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22446 000036EC 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax ; is this one of ours
 22447 000036F0 7503                    	jnz	short FCBNext		; no, skip it
 22448                                  
 22449                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22450                                  %if 0
 22451                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22452                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; yes, blast ref count
 22453                                  %else
 22454                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22455                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22456 000036F2 E80814                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22457                                  %endif
 22458                                  
 22459                                  FCBNext:
 22460 000036F5 83C73B                  	add     di,SF_ENTRY.size ; 59 (for MSDOS 6.0)
 22461 000036F8 E2F2                    	loop    FCBTest
 22462                                  FCBScanDone:
 22463                                  
 22464                                  ; Walk the SFT to eliminate all busy SFT's for this process.
 22465                                  
 22466 000036FA 31DB                    	XOR     BX,BX
 22467                                  Scan:
 22468 000036FC 53                      	push    bx
 22469 000036FD E81840                  	call	SFFromSFN
 22470 00003700 5B                      	pop     bx
 22471                                  	;jnc	short Scan1
 22472                                  	;retn
 22473                                  
 22474                                  	; 18/12/2022
 22475                                  	;jc	short NO_Question ; retn
 22476                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22477 00003701 7232                    	jc	short RET2
 22478                                  
 22479                                  ;M038
 22480                                  ; Do what the comment above says, check for busy state
 22481                                  
 22482                                  Scan1:
 22483                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0
 22484                                  	;jz	short scan_next  ; MSDOS 3.3
 22485                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22486 00003703 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1
 22487                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy
 22488                                  				; Is Sft busy? ;M038
 22489 00003707 7517                    	jnz	short scan_next ; no
 22490                                  ;
 22491                                  ; we have a SFT that is busy. See if it is for the current process
 22492                                  ;
 22493 00003709 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22494                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22495 0000370D 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax
 22496 00003711 750D                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22497 00003713 36A1[3E03]              	mov     ax,[SS:USER_ID]		; SS override
 22498                                  	;sub	ax,[es:di+2Fh] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM ; 03/02/2024
 22499                                  	;cmp	[es:di+2Fh],ax
 22500 00003717 2639452F                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_UID],ax
 22501 0000371B 7503                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22502                                  
 22503                                  ; This SFT is labelled as ours.
 22504                                  
 22505                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22506                                  %if 0
 22507                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22508                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 22509                                  %else
 22510                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22511                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22512 0000371D E8DD13                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22513                                  %endif
 22514                                  
 22515                                  scan_next:
 22516 00003720 43                      	inc     bx
 22517 00003721 EBD9                    	jmp     short Scan
 22518                                  
 22519                                  ;============================================================================
 22520                                  ; CLOSE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22521                                  ;============================================================================
 22522                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22523                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22524                                  
 22525                                  ;**	Internal Close and Commit calls to close a local or NET SFT.
 22526                                  ;
 22527                                  ;	DOS_CLOSE
 22528                                  ;	DOS_COMMIT
 22529                                  ;	FREE_SFT
 22530                                  ;	SetSFTTimes
 22531                                  ;
 22532                                  ;	Revision history:
 22533                                  ;
 22534                                  ;	   AN000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 22535                                  ;	   A005   PTM 3718 --- lost clusters when fastopen installed
 22536                                  ;	   A011   PTM 4766 --- C2 fastopen problem
 22537                                  
 22538                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 22539                                  
 22540                                  ;Break <DOS_CLOSE -- CLOSE FILE from SFT>
 22541                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22542                                  ;
 22543                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_CLOSE
 22544                                  ;
 22545                                  ; Inputs:
 22546                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being used
 22547                                  ; Function:
 22548                                  ;	Close the indicated file via the SFT
 22549                                  ; Returns:
 22550                                  ;	sf_ref_count decremented otherwise
 22551                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 22552                                  ;	Carry set if error
 22553                                  ;	    AX has error code
 22554                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 22555                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22556                                  
 22557                                  ;hkn; DOS_CLOSE called from fcbio.asm and handle.asm. DS alreday set up.
 22558                                  
 22559                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22560                                  ; DOSCODE:6E2Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22561                                  
 22562                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22563                                  ; DOSCODE:6E1Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22564                                  
 22565                                  ; 23/07/2018 - IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987 - Offset 39D0h
 22566                                  
 22567                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22568                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:76FEh
 22569                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7579h) 
 22570                                  
 22571                                  DOS_CLOSE:
 22572 00003723 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 22573                                  	;mov	bx,[ES:DI+5]
 22574 00003727 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 22575                                  
 22576                                  ; Network closes are handled entirely by the net code.
 22577                                  
 22578                                  	;;test	bx,8000h
 22579                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet
 22580                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22581                                  	;test	bh,80h
 22582 0000372B F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8)
 22583 0000372E 7406                    	JZ	short LocalClose
 22584                                  
 22585                                  	;CallInstall Net_Close,MultNET,6
 22586 00003730 B80611                  	mov     ax,1106h
 22587 00003733 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CLOSE REMOTE FILE
 22588                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 22589                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 22590                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22591                                  			; CF clear if successful
 22592                                  RET2:		; 03/02/2024
 22593 00003735 C3                      	retn
 22594                                  
 22595                                  ; All closes release the sharing information.
 22596                                  ; No commit releases sharing information
 22597                                  ;
 22598                                  ; All closes decrement the ref count.
 22599                                  ; No commit decrements the ref count.

 22601                                  LocalClose:

 22603 00003739 E8C901                  	CALL	SetSFTTimes

 22605

 22607                                  	;Context DS
 22608 0000373F 16                      	push	ss
 22609 00003740 1F                      	pop	ds
 22610                                  
 22611 00003741 50                      	push	ax

 22634

 22639

 22644                                  	;;jc	short CloseFinish ; 24/07/2019

 22650                                  rdir2:

 22996                                  ;
 22997                                  ; Procedure Name : FREE_SFT
 22998                                  ;
 22999                                  ; ES:DI -> SFT. Decs sft_ref_count. If the count goes to 0, mark it as busy.
 23000                                  ; Flags preserved. Return old ref count in AX
 23001                                  ;
 23002                                  ; Note that busy is indicated by the SFT ref count being -1.
 23003                                  ;
 23004                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 23015                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]

 23107                                  ;
 23108                                  ;**	DOS_Commit - UPdate Directory Entries
 23109                                  ;
 23110                                  ;	ENTRY	same as DOS_CLOSE (??? BUGBUG - update this jgl)
 23111                                  ;		(DS) = DOSGROUP
 23112                                  ;	EXIT	Same as DOS_CLOSE except ref_count field is not altered
 23113                                  ;	USES	all but DS
