 23116                                  
 23117                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23118                                  ; DOSCODE:6F72h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23119                                  
 23120                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23121                                  ; DOSCODE:78B8h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23122                                  
 23123                                  DOS_COMMIT:
 23124                                  	;hkn; called from srvcall. DS already set up.
 23125 000038D6 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 23126                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+5]
 23127 000038DA 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 23128                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 23129                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23130 000038DE F6C3C0                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 23131                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 23132 000038E1 75F2                    	jnz	short PopDone_retn
 23133                                  	;test	bx,8000h
 23134                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23135                                  	;test	bh,80h
 23136 000038E3 F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 23137                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet ; 8000h
 23138 000038E6 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_COMMIT
 23139                                  
 23140                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 23141                                  ;	transfer NET_COMMIT
 23142                                  ;ELSE
 23143                                  	;mov	ax,1107h
 23144 000038E8 B80711                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|7
 23145 000038EB CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - COMMIT REMOTE FILE
 23146                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 23147                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 23148                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 23149                                  			; CF clear if successful
 23150                                  localcommit_retn: ; 18/12/2022	
 23151 000038ED C3                      	retn
 23152                                  ;ENDIF
 23153                                  
 23154                                  ; Perform local commit operation by doing a close but not releaseing the SFT.
 23155                                  ; There are three ways we can do this. One is to enter a critical section to
 23156                                  ; protect a potential free. The second is to increment the ref count to mask
 23157                                  ; the close decrementing.
 23158                                  ;
 23159                                  ; The proper way is to let the caller's of close decide if a decrement should
 23160                                  ; be done. We do this by providing another entry into close after the
 23161                                  ; decrement and after the share information release.
 23162                                  
 23163                                  ; DOSCODE:6FA0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23164                                  ; DOSCODE:6F8Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23165                                  
 23166                                  LOCAL_COMMIT:
 23167 000038EE E8F0DF                  	call	ECritDisk
 23168                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23169 000038F1 E8EDDF                  	call	ECritDisk	;PTM.
 23170 000038F4 E80E00                  	call	SetSFTTimes
 23171 000038F7 B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 23172 000038FA E84BFE                  	call	CloseEntry
 23173                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23174 000038FD 9C                      	PUSHF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23175 000038FE E83719                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT	;PTM.  increment device count	;AN000;
 23176 00003901 9D                      	POPF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23177                                  	;call	LCritDisk	;PTM.				;AN000;
 23178                                  	; 18/12/2022
 23179 00003902 E909E0                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 23180                                  ;localcommit_retn:
 23181                                  ;	retn

 23186                                  ; Procedure Name : SetSFTTimes
 23187                                  ;
 23188                                  ;   SetSFTTimes - Examine the flags for a SFT and set the time appropriately.
 23189                                  ;   Reflect these times in other SFT's for the same file.
 23190                                  ;
 23191                                  ;   Inputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 23192                                  ;		BX = sf_flags set appropriately
 23193                                  ;   Outputs:	Set sft times to current time if File & dirty & !nodate
 23194                                  ;   Registers modified: All except ES:DI, BX, AX
 23195                                  ;
 23196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23197                                  
 23198                                  	; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 23199                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM 
 23200                                  
 23201                                  SetSFTTimes:
 23202                                  
 23203                                  ; 04/02/2024
 23204                                  %if 0
 23205                                  ;	File clean or device does not get stamped nor disk looked at.
 23206

 23210                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device

 23212                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23213

 23215

 23217                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23218                                  	;test	bh,40h

 23220                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_close_nodate
 23221                                  	;retnz				; nodate => no timestamp

 23223                                  %else
 23224                                  	; 04/02/2024
 23225                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23226                                  	;test	bx,40C0h
 23227 00003905 F7C3C040                	test	bx,sf_close_nodate+devid_file_clean+devid_device
 23228 00003909 75E2                    	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23229                                  %endif
 23230                                  
 23231 0000390B 50                      	push	ax
 23232 0000390C 53                      	push	bx
 23233 0000390D E84CD2                  	call	DATE16			; Date/Time to AX/DX
 23234                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 23235 00003910 2689450F                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 23236                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],dx
 23237 00003914 2689550D                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time],DX
 23238 00003918 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 23239                                  ;if installed
 23240                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 23241 0000391A FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]	; 14 = ShSU
 23242                                  ;else
 23243                                  ;	call	ShSU
 23244                                  ;endif
 23245 0000391E 5B                      	pop	bx
 23246 0000391F 58                      	pop	ax
 23247 00003920 C3                      	retn

 23257                                  ;TITLE DIRCALL - Directory manipulation internal calls
 23258                                  ;NAME  DIRCALL
 23259                                  
 23260                                  ;**	Low level directory manipulation routines for making removing and
 23261                                  ;	  verifying local or NET directories
 23262                                  ;
 23263                                  ;	DOS_MKDIR
 23264                                  ;	DOS_CHDIR
 23265                                  ;	DOS_RMDIR
 23266                                  ;
 23267                                  ;	Modification history:
 23268                                  ;
 23269                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 23270                                  
 23271                                  ;BREAK <DOS_MkDir - Make a directory entry>
 23272                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23273                                  ;
 23274                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_MkDir
 23275                                  ;
 23276                                  ; Inputs:
 23277                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23278                                  ;		terminated)
 23279                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23280                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else

 23915                                  ;	TITLE	DISK - Disk utility routines
 23916                                  ;	NAME	Disk
 23917                                  
 23918                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 23919                                  ;
 23920                                  ;	SWAPCON
 23921                                  ;	SWAPBACK
 23922                                  ;	DOS_READ
 23923                                  ;	DOS_WRITE
 23924                                  ;	get_io_sft
 23925                                  ;	DirRead
 23926                                  ;	FIRSTCLUSTER
 23927                                  ;	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 23928                                  ;	FATSecRd
 23929                                  ;	DREAD
 23930                                  ;	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK
 23931                                  ;	CHECK_READ_LOCK
 23932                                  ;
 23933                                  ;	Revision history:
 23934                                  ;
 23935                                  ;		A000   version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 23936                                  ;
 23937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23938                                  ;
 23939                                  ; M065 : B#5276. On raw read/write of a block of characters if a critical
 23940                                  ;		error happens, DOS retries the entire block assuming that
 23941                                  ;		zero characters were transferred. Modified the code to take
 23942                                  ;		into account the number of characters transfered before
 23943                                  ;		retrying the operation.
 23944                                  ;
 23945                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23946                                  ;
 23947                                  
 23948                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 23949                                  
 23950                                  ;Break	<SwapCon, Swap Back - Old-style I/O to files>
 23951                                  
 23952                                  ; **** Drivers for file input from devices ****
 23953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23954                                  ;   Indicate that there is no more I/O occurring through another SFT outside
 23955                                  ;   of handles 0 and 1
 23956                                  ;
 23957                                  ;   Inputs:	DS is DOSDATA
 23958                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set to false.
 23959                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23961                                  
 23962                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 3CF8h
 23963                                  
 23964                                  ; DOSCODE:71E3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23965                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23966                                  
 23967                                  ; DOSCODE:71CFh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23968                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23969                                  
 23970                                  SWAPBACK:
 23971 00003B63 C606[5703]00            	MOV	BYTE [CONSWAP],0	; signal no conswaps
 23972 00003B68 C3                      	retn
 23973                                  
 23974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23975                                  ;
 23976                                  ; Procedure Name : SWAPCON
 23977                                  ;
 23978                                  ;   Copy ThisSFT to CONSFT for use by the 1-12 primitives.
 23979                                  ;
 23980                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT as the sft of the desired file
 23981                                  ;		DS is DOSDATA
 23982                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set.  CONSFT = ThisSFT.
 23983                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23984                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23985                                  
 23986                                  SWAPCON:
 23987                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 23988                                  	;push	es
 23989                                  	;push	di
 23990                                  	;mov	byte [CONSWAP],1
 23991                                  	;les	di,[THISSFT]
 23992                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT],di
 23993                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT+2],es
 23994                                  	;pop	di
 23995                                  	;pop	es
 23996                                  	;retn
 23997                                  
 23998                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23999 00003B69 C606[5703]01            	mov	byte [CONSWAP],1	; ConSwap = TRUE
 24000 00003B6E 50                      	push	ax
 24001 00003B6F A1[9E05]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT]
 24002 00003B72 A3[E605]                	mov	[CONSFT],ax
 24003 00003B75 A1[A005]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT+2]
 24004 00003B78 A3[E805]                	mov	[CONSFT+2],ax
 24005 00003B7B 58                      	pop	ax
 24006 00003B7C C3                      	retn
 24007                                  
 24008                                  ; DOSCODE:71FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24009                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24010                                  
 24011                                  ;Break	<DOS_READ -- MAIN READ ROUTINE AND DEVICE IN ROUTINES>
 24012                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24013                                  ;
 24014                                  ; Inputs:
 24015                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24016                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24017                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to read
 24018                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 24019                                  ; Function:
 24020                                  ;	Perform read operation
 24021                                  ; Outputs:
 24022                                  ;    Carry clear
 24023                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24024                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes read
 24025                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24026                                  ;    Carry set
 24027                                  ;	AX is error code
 24028                                  ;	CX = 0
 24029                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24030                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24031                                  ;
 24032                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24033                                  
 24034                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is be set up.
 24035                                  
 24036                                  ; DOSCODE:71E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24037                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24038                                  
 24039                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24040                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24041                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7B76h
 24042                                  
 24043                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7997h)
 24044                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:71FDh)
 24045                                  
 24046                                  DOS_READ:
 24047 00003B7D C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24048                                  
 24049                                  ; Verify that the sft has been opened in a mode that allows reading.
 24050                                  
 24051                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+2]
 24052 00003B81 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24053                                  	;;and	al,0Fh	; (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.22)
 24054                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24055                                  	; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 24056                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 & Win Me)
 24057 00003B85 2403                    	and	al,3	; open_mode_mask ?
 24058                                  
 24059                                  	;cmp	al,1
 24060 00003B87 3C01                    	CMP	AL,open_for_write
 24061 00003B89 7503                    	JNE	short READ_NO_MODE	; Is read or both
 24062 00003B8B E96506                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24063                                  
 24064                                  READ_NO_MODE:
 24065 00003B8E E82505                  	call	SETUP
 24066 00003B91 E30B                    	JCXZ	NoIORet 		; no bytes to read - fast return
 24067 00003B93 E8A2DC                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24068 00003B96 7408                    	JZ	short LOCAL_READ
 24069                                  
 24070                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24071                                  ;	transfer NET_READ
 24072                                  ;ELSE
 24073                                  	;mov	ax,1108h
 24074 00003B98 B80811                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|8
 24075 00003B9B CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - READ FROM REMOTE FILE
 24076                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24077                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24078                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24079                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes read
 24080 00003B9D C3                      	retn
 24081                                  ;ENDIF
 24082                                  
 24083                                  ; The user ended up requesting 0 bytes of input. We do nothing for this case
 24084                                  ; except return immediately.
 24085                                  
 24086                                  NoIORet:
 24087 00003B9E F8                      	CLC
 24088 00003B9F C3                      	retn

 24091                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h

 24107                                  ; We are reading from a device. Examine the status of the device to see if we
 24108                                  ; can short-circuit the I/O. If the device in the EOF state or if it is the
 24109                                  ; null device, we can safely indicate no transfer.

 24111                                  READDEV:

 24113 00003BB5 C606[2303]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_SerDev

 24123 00003BCC 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Indicate EOF by setting zero
 24124                                  ENDRDDEVJ3:
 24125                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility!)

 24130                                  ; We need to hit the device. Figure out if we do a raw read or we do the
 24131                                  ; bizarre std_con_string_input.
 24132                                  
 24133                                  TESTRAW:
 24134                                  	;test	bl,20h
 24135 00003BD1 F6C320                  	test	BL,devid_device_raw	; Raw mode?

 24141                                  
 24142                                  DVRDRAW:
 24143 00003BDE 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24144 00003BDF 1F                      	POP	DS			; Xaddr to DS:DI
 24145                                  
 24146                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24147                                  
 24148                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24149                                  ;SR;
 24150                                  ;Check for win386 presence -- if present, do polled read of characters
 24151                                  
 24152 00003BE0 36F606[5B0F]01          	test	byte [ss:IsWin386],1 ; 19/05/2019
 24153 00003BE6 7408                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;not present
 24154 00003BE8 F6C301                  	test	bl,devid_device_con_in	;is it console device?
 24155 00003BEB 7403                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;no, do normal read
 24156 00003BED E9A800                  	jmp	do_polling		;yes, do win386 polling loop
 24157                                  
 24158                                  ReadRawRetry:
 24159                                  
 24160                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24161                                  %if 0
 24162                                  	MOV	BX,DI			; DS:BX transfer addr
 24163                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24164                                  	;XOR	AX,AX			; Media Byte, unit = 0
 24165                                  	;;MOV	DX,AX			; Start at 0

 24172 00003BF0 E83917                  	call	SETREAD_XJ
 24173                                  %endif

 24175 00003BF3 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; Save Seg part of Xaddr
 24176                                  
 24177                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24178 00003BF4 36C536[9E05]            	LDS	SI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24179 00003BF9 E8BA16                  	call	DEVIOCALL
 24180 00003BFC 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; DS:DX is preserved by INT 24
 24181 00003BFE B486                    	MOV	AH,86H			; Read error
 24182                                  
 24183                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24184 00003C00 368B3E[5D03]            	MOV	DI,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 24185                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 24186                                  	;test	di,8000h
 24187                                  	;jz	short CRDROK
 24188                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24189 00003C05 09FF                    	or	di,di
 24190 00003C07 7920                    	jns	short CRDROK		; no errors
 24191                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24192 00003C09 E84624                  	call	CHARHARD
 24193                                  
 24194                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retrro DOS v5.0
 24195                                  %if 0
 24196                                  	MOV	DI,DX			; DS:DI is Xaddr
 24197                                  	; 04/05/2019
 24198                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24199                                  	add	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; update ptr and count to reflect the	M065
 24200                                  	sub	cx,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; number of chars xferred		M065
 24201                                  %else
 24202 00003C0C 368B3E[6C03]            	mov	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]
 24203 00003C11 29F9                    	sub	cx,di			; update transfer count
 24204 00003C13 01D7                    	add	di,dx			; update pointer
 24205                                  %endif
 24206                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24207 00003C15 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24208 00003C17 7410                    	JZ	short CRDROK		; Ignore
 24209 00003C19 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 24210 00003C1B 7403                    	JZ	short CRDFERR 		; fail.
 24211 00003C1D 1F                      	POP	DS			; Recover saved seg part of Xaddr
 24212 00003C1E EBD0                    	JMP	short ReadRawRetry	; Retry
 24213                                  
 24214                                  ; We have encountered a device-driver error. We have informed the user of it
 24215                                  ; and he has said for us to fail the system call.
 24216                                  
 24217                                  CRDFERR:
 24218 00003C20 5F                      	POP	DI			; Clean stack
 24219                                  DEVIOFERR:
 24220                                  
 24221                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24222 00003C21 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24223 00003C26 E9C805                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 24225                                  CRDROK:

 24234                                  
 24235                                  ; We are going to do a cooked read on some character device. There is a
 24236                                  ; problem here, what does the data look like? Is it a terminal device, line
 24237                                  ; CR line CR line CR, or is it file data, line CR LF line CR LF? Does it have
 24238                                  ; a ^Z at the end which is data, or is the ^Z not data?  In any event we're
 24239                                  ; going to do this: Read in pieces up to CR (CRs included in data) or ^z (^z
 24240                                  ; included in data). this "simulates" the way con works in cooked mode
 24241                                  ; reading one line at a time. With file data, however, the lines will look
 24242                                  ; like, LF line CR. This is a little weird.
 24243                                  
 24244                                  NOTRDCON:

 24574                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24575                                  
 24576                                  ;Break	<DOS_WRITE -- MAIN WRITE ROUTINE AND DEVICE OUT ROUTINES>
 24577                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24578                                  ;
 24579                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_WRITE
 24580                                  ;
 24581                                  ; Inputs:
 24582                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24583                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24584                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to write
 24585                                  ; Function:
 24586                                  ;	Perform write operation
 24587                                  ;	NOTE: If CX = 0 on input, file is truncated or grown
 24588                                  ;		to current sf_position
 24589                                  ; Outputs:
 24590                                  ;    Carry clear
 24591                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24592                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes written
 24593                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24594                                  ;    Carry set
 24595                                  ;	AX is error code
 24596                                  ;	CX = 0
 24597                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24598                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24599                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24600                                  
 24601                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio2.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is set up at this 
 24602                                  ;hkn; point to DOSDATA.
 24603                                  
 24604                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24605                                  ; DOSCODE:742Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24606                                  
 24607                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24608                                  ; DOSCODE:7418h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24609                                  
 24610                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24611                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7D8Fh
 24612                                  
 24613                                  DOS_WRITE:
 24614 00003D7E C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24615                                  	;mov	al,[ES:DI+2]
 24616 00003D82 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24617                                  	;;and	al,0Fh
 24618                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24619                                  	; 07/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 24620                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 & Win Me)
 24621 00003D86 2403                    	and	al,3	; open_mode_mask ?
 24622                                  	;cmp	al,0
 24623 00003D88 3C00                    	CMP	AL,open_for_read
 24624 00003D8A 7503                    	JNE	short Check_FCB_RO		 ;Is write or both
 24625                                  BadMode:
 24626 00003D8C E96404                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24627                                  
 24628                                  ; NOTE: The following check for writting to a Read Only File is performed
 24629                                  ;	    ONLY on FCBs!!!!
 24630                                  ;	We ALLOW writes to Read Only files via handles to allow a CREATE
 24631                                  ;	    of a read only file which can then be written to.
 24632                                  ;	This is OK because we are NOT ALLOWED to OPEN a RO file via handles
 24633                                  ;	    for writting, or RE-CREATE an EXISTING RO file via handles. Thus,
 24634                                  ;	    CREATing a NEW RO file, or RE-CREATing an existing file which
 24635                                  ;	    is NOT RO to be RO, via handles are the only times we can write
 24636                                  ;	    to a read-only file.
 24637                                  
 24638                                  Check_FCB_RO:
 24639                                  	;;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 24640                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 24641                                  	;JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24642                                  	
 24643                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 24644 00003D8F 26F6450380              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],(sf_isFCB>>8)
 24645 00003D94 7407                    	JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24646                                  
 24647                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],1
 24648 00003D96 26F6450401              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_read_only
 24649 00003D9B 75EF                    	JNZ	short BadMode 		; Can't write to Read_Only files via FCB
 24650                                  WRITE_NO_MODE:
 24651 00003D9D E81603                  	call	SETUP
 24652 00003DA0 E895DA                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24653 00003DA3 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_WRITE
 24654                                  
 24655                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24656                                  ;	transfer NET_WRITE
 24657                                  ;ELSE
 24658                                  	;mov	ax,1109h
 24659 00003DA5 B80911                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|9
 24660 00003DA8 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - WRITE TO REMOTE FILE
 24661                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24662                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24663                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24664                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes written
 24665 00003DAA C3                      	retn
 24666                                  ;ENDIF
 24667                                  
 24668                                  LOCAL_WRITE:
 24669                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 24670                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 24671                                  	;jnz	short WRTDEV
 24672                                  
 24673                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],80h
 24674 00003DAB 26F6450580              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device ; Check for named device I/O
 24675 00003DB0 756D                    	jnz	short WRTDEV
 24676                                  
 24677                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 24678 00003DB2 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 24679 00003DB7 E827DB                  	call	ECritDisk
 24680                                  
 24681 00003DBA E8A905                  	call	DISKWRITE
 24682                                  
 24683                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24684                                  
 24685                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24686                                  ; Extended Open
 24687 00003DBD 7210                    	JC	short nocommit
 24688                                  	
 24689 00003DBF C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24690                                  	
 24691                                  	;;test	word [ES:DI+2],4000h
 24692                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AUTO_COMMIT_WRITE

 24907                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24908                                  ;
 24909                                  ; Procedure Name : get_io_sft
 24910                                  ;
 24911                                  ;   Convert JFN number in BX to sf_entry in DS:SI We get the normal SFT if
 24912                                  ;   CONSWAP is FALSE or if the handle desired is 2 or more. Otherwise, we
 24913                                  ;   retrieve the sft from ConSFT which is set by SwapCon.
 24914                                  ;
 24915                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24916                                  
 24917                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24918                                  ; DOSCODE:7583h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24919                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24920                                  ; DOSCODE:756Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24921                                  
 24922                                  GET_IO_SFT:
 24923                                  	;test	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0FFh
 24924 00003ED0 36803E[5703]00          	cmp	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0			;smr;SS Override
 24925 00003ED6 7512                    	JNZ	short GetRedir
 24926                                  GetNormal:
 24927 00003ED8 16                      	push	ss
 24928 00003ED9 1F                      	pop	ds
 24929 00003EDA 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24930 00003EDB 57                      	PUSH	DI
 24931 00003EDC E82338                  	call	SFFromHandle
 24932 00003EDF 7206                    	JC	short RET44P
 24933 00003EE1 8CC6                    	MOV	SI,ES
 24934 00003EE3 8EDE                    	MOV	DS,SI
 24935 00003EE5 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24936                                  RET44P:
 24937 00003EE7 5F                      	POP	DI
 24938 00003EE8 07                      	POP	ES
 24939 00003EE9 C3                      	retn
 24940                                  GetRedir:
 24941 00003EEA 83FB01                  	CMP	BX,1
 24942 00003EED 77E9                    	JA	short GetNormal
 24943 00003EEF 36C536[E605]            	LDS	SI,[SS:CONSFT]
 24944 00003EF4 F8                      	CLC
 24945                                  get_io_sft_retn:
 24946 00003EF5 C3                      	retn

 24948                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 24949                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24950                                  ;
 24951                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 24952                                  ;
 24953                                  ; Inputs:
 24954                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 24955                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24956                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 24957                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 24958                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24959                                  ; Function:
 24960                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 24961                                  ; Outputs:
 24962                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 24963                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 24964                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 24965                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 24966                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 24967                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 24968                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24969                                  
 24970                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 24971                                  
 24972                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24973                                  
 24974                                  DIRREAD:
 24975                                  
 24976                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 24977                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 24978                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 24979                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 24980                                  
 24981 00003EF6 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 24982                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 24983 00003EF8 3916[DC0A]              	cmp	[DIRSTART_HW],dx
 24984 00003EFC 7509                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24985                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 24986                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24987 00003EFE 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 24988 00003F02 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24989 00003F04 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24990 00003F05 EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 24991                                  
 24992                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 24993                                  
 24994                                  SubDir:
 24995 00003F07 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 24996                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 24997 00003F09 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24998                                  
 24999                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 25000                                  
 25001                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 25002 00003F0D 268A4E05                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 25003 00003F11 D3E8                    	SHR	AX,CL
 25004                                  
 25005                                  ;	(DX) = position in cluster
 25006                                  ;	(AX) = number of clusters to skip
 25007                                  
 25008                                  DoRead:
 25009 00003F13 8816[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],DL
 25010 00003F17 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 25011 00003F19 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 25012                                  
 25013                                  ;	(CX) = number of clusters to skip.
 25014                                  ;	(AH) = remainder
 25015                                  
 25016                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25017                                  
 25018                                  ; 08/02/2024
 25019                                  %if 0
 25020                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25021                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC+2]	     	  ;>32mb
 25022                                  	;MOV	[HIGH_SECTOR],DX	  ;>32mb
 25023                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC]
 25024                                  	;ADD	DL,AH
 25025                                  	;ADC	DH,0
 25026                                  	;ADC	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0	  ;>32mb
 25027                                  	; 21/09/2023
 25028                                  	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 25029                                  	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25030                                  	add	dl,ah
 25031                                  	adc	dh,bl ; 0
 25032                                  	adc	bx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25033                                  	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],bx
 25034                                  
 25035                                  	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 25036                                  	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 25037                                  	JCXZ	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25038                                  %else
 25039                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25040 00003F1B 8B1E[DE0A]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 25041 00003F1F 891E[E00A]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM_HW],bx
 25042 00003F23 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 25043 00003F27 8B16[C005]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25044 00003F2B 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx
 25045 00003F2F 8B16[BE05]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25046 00003F33 00E2                    	add	dl,ah
 25047 00003F35 80D600                  	adc	dh,0
 25048 00003F38 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 25049 00003F3D 8B1E[BC05]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM]
 25050 00003F41 891E[DC05]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM],bx
 25051 00003F45 E339                    	jcxz	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25052                                  %endif
 25053                                  
 25054                                  SKPCLLP:
 25055 00003F47 E8C823                  	call	UNPACK
 25056 00003F4A 72A9                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 25057                                  	;;;
 25058                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25059 00003F4C FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 25060 00003F50 8F06[F20A]              	pop	word [CLUSTERS_HW]
 25061 00003F54 FF36[EC0A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]

 25084                                  FIRSTCLUSTER:
 25085                                  	; 22/09/2023
 25086                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 25087                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 25088                                  	;XOR	AL,AL ; *	; Indicate pre-read

 25096                                  
 25097                                  SET_BUF_AS_DIR:
 25098                                  
 25099                                  ;	Set the type of CURBUF to be a directory sector.
 25100                                  ;	Only flags are modified.
 25101                                  
 25102 00003F85 1E                      	PUSH	DS

 25109                                  dirread_retn:
 25110 00003F91 C3                      	retn

 25112                                  ;Break	<FATSECRD -- READ A FAT SECTOR>
 25113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25114                                  ;
 25115                                  ; Procedure Name : FATSECRD
 25116                                  ; Inputs:
 25117                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25118                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25119                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25120                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number
 25121                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25122                                  ; Function:
 25123                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform FAT read.
 25124                                  ; Outputs:
 25125                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25126                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25127                                  
 25128                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25129                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25130                                  
 25131                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25132                                  
 25133                                  FATSECRD:
 25134                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25135                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 25136 00003F92 36C606[4B03]18          	MOV	byte [SS:ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 25137 00003F98 89CF                    	MOV	DI,CX
 25138                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+8]
 25139 00003F9A 268A4E08                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 25140                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25141                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25142                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE]
 25143                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 25144                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25145                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25146 00003F9E 268B460F                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE] ;>32mb
 25147 00003FA2 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 25148                                  	;;;
 25149                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25150 00003FA4 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 25151 00003FA6 7509                    	jnz	short FATSECRD_cont	; not FAT32
 25152                                  	;test	byte [es:bp+23h],80h
 25153 00003FA8 26F6462380              	test	byte [es:bp+DPB.EXT_FLAGS],80h ; (FAT32 bs extd flags bit 7)
 25154 00003FAD 7402                    	jz      short FATSECRD_cont
 25155                                  	;mov	cx,1           		; only one FAT is active
 25156 00003FAF B101                    	mov	cl,1
 25157                                  FATSECRD_cont:
 25158 00003FB1 36FF36[0706]            	push	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25159                                  	;;;
 25160 00003FB6 52                      	PUSH	DX
 25161                                  NXTFAT:
 25162                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25163                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25164                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25165                                  	;MOV	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0	;>32mb FAT sectors cannot exceed
 25166 00003FB7 51                      	PUSH	CX			;32mb

 25213                                  ;Break	<DREAD -- DO A DISK READ>
 25214                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25215                                  ;
 25216                                  ; Procedure Name : DREAD
 25217                                  ;
 25218                                  ; Inputs:
 25219                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25220                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25221                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	      (LOW)
 25222                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25223                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25224                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case call to HARDERR needed
 25225                                  ; Function:
 25226                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk read. If BIOS reports
 25227                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25228                                  ; Outputs:
 25229                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILED to INT 24)
 25230                                  ; DS,ES:BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25231                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 25236 00003FF8 7497                    	jz	short dirread_retn	; Carry clear
 25237                                  ;hkn; SS override

 25239 00004000 E89A00                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25240 00004003 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25241 00004005 74EE                    	JZ	short DREAD
 25242

 25266                                  ;
 25267                                  ; Inputs:

 25285                                  	;JZ	short write_cont			     ;no
 25286                                  	;;call	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 25291                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 25293 0000401A 7403                    	JZ	short write_cont
 25294                                  	;call	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25295                                  	;retn
 25296                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25297 0000401C E9D201                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25298                                  
 25299                                  write_cont:				;
 25300 0000401F 51                      	PUSH	CX			;save reg
 25301 00004020 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;
 25302 00004022 7501                    	JNZ	short Not_Truncate	;
 25303 00004024 49                      	dec	cx			;(cx) = -1; check for lock on whole file
 25304                                  Not_Truncate:				;
 25305 00004025 B080                    	MOV	AL,80H			;check write access
 25306 00004027 E8E943                  	call	LOCK_CHECK		;check lock
 25307 0000402A 59                      	POP	CX			;restore reg
 25308 0000402B 7305                    	JNC	short WRITE_OK		;lock ok
 25309 0000402D E87301                  	call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION	;issue I24
 25310 00004030 73ED                    	JNC	short write_cont	;retry
 25311                                  WRITE_OK:				;
 25312 00004032 C3                      	retn				;

 25361                                  ;	TITLE	DISK2 - Disk utility routines
 25362                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25363                                  
 25364                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs

 25367                                  ;	DWRITE
 25368                                  ;	DSKWRITE
 25369                                  ;	HarderrRW

 25381                                  ;	Revision history:
 25382                                  ;
 25383                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25384                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25385                                  
 25386                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25387                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25388                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25389                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25390                                  
 25391                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25392                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25393                                  ;
 25394                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25395                                  ;
 25396                                  ; Inputs:
 25397                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25398                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25399                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25400                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25401                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25402                                  ; Function:
 25403                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25404                                  ; Outputs:
 25405                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25406                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25407                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25408                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25409                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25410                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25412                                  
 25413                                  DSKREAD:
 25414 0000404A 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25415                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25416 0000404B 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25417                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25418 0000404F 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25419 00004053 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25420 00004054 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25421 00004055 E8E212                  	call	SETREAD
 25422 00004058 EB22                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25423                                  
 25424                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25425                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25426                                  ;
 25427                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25428                                  ;
 25429                                  ; Inputs:
 25430                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25431                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25432                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25433                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25434                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25435                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25436                                  ; Function:
 25437                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25438                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25439                                  ; Output:
 25440                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25441                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25442                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25443                                  
 25444                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25445                                  DWRITE:
 25446 0000405A E81100                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25447 0000405D 74EA                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25448                                  
 25449                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25450 0000405F 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1	; Write
 25451 00004065 E83500                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25452 00004068 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25453 0000406A 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 25454                                  
 25455                                  ; 09/02/2024
 25456                                  %if 0
 25457                                  	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25458                                  	CLC
 25459                                  	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 		; Ignore
 25460                                  	STC
 25461                                  NO_CAR2:
 25462                                  dw_ret_label:
 25463                                  	retn
 25464                                  %else
 25465                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 25466 0000406C EB99                    	jmp	short fail_ignore
 25467                                  %endif
 25468                                  
 25469                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25470                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25471                                  ;
 25472                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25473                                  ;
 25474                                  ; Inputs:
 25475                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25476                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25477                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25478                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25479                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25480                                  ; Function:
 25481                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25482                                  ; Outputs:
 25483                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25484                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25485                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25486                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25487                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25488                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25489                                  ;
 25490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25491                                  
 25492                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25493                                  DSKWRITE:
 25494 0000406E 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25495                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25496 0000406F 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25497                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25498 00004073 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25499 00004077 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25500 00004078 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25501 00004079 E8F112                  	call	SETWRITE
 25502                                  DODSKOP:
 25503 0000407C 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 25504 0000407E 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 25505 0000407F 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25506                                  
 25507                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 25508 00004080 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 25509 00004084 E83212                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 25510                                  
 25511 00004087 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 25512 00004089 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 25513 0000408A 5B                      	POP	BX
 25514                                  
 25515                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25516 0000408B 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred
 25517 00004090 5F                      	POP	DI
 25518 00004091 29F9                    	SUB	CX,DI
 25519 00004093 F7D9                    	NEG	CX		; Number of sectors not transferred
 25520                                  
 25521                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25522 00004095 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 25523                                  	;test	ax,8000h
 25524                                  	; 17/12/2022
 25525                                  	;test	ah,80h
 25526 00004099 F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 25527                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 25528 0000409C C3                      	retn
 25529                                  
 25530                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 25531                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25532                                  ;
 25533                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 25534                                  ;
 25535                                  ; Inputs:
 25536                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 25537                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 25538                                  ; Function:
 25539                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 25540                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 25541                                  ;	Harderr
 25542                                  ; Outputs:
 25543                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 25544                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 25545                                  ; No other registers altered.
 25546                                  ;
 25547                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25548                                  
 25549                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25550                                  HARDERRRW:
 25551                                  	;cmp	al,0Fh
 25552 0000409D 3C0F                    	CMP	AL,error_I24_wrong_disk
 25553 0000409F 7512                    	JNZ	short DO_ERR			; Nothing to do
 25554                                  
 25555                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25556                                  	;push	ds
 25557                                  	;push	si
 25558                                  	;lds	si,[ss:CALLVIDRW]
 25559                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2], ds
 25560                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT], si
 25561                                  	;pop	si
 25562                                  	;pop	ds
 25563

 25565 000040A1 50                      	push	ax
 25566 000040A2 36A1[7003]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW]		; get ptr lo  ;smr;SS Override
 25567 000040A6 36A3[2803]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT],ax		; set ext err ptr lo
 25568 000040AA 36A1[7203]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW+2]		; get ptr hi from dev
 25569 000040AE 36A3[2A03]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2],ax		; set ext err ptr hi
 25570 000040B2 58                      	pop	ax
 25571                                  DO_ERR:
 25572                                  	;;call	HARDERR
 25573                                  	;;retn

 25578                                  	;call	HARDERR

 25581                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25582                                  
 25583                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25585                                  ;
 25586                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25587                                  ;
 25588                                  ; Inputs:
 25589                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25590                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25591                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25592                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25593                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25594                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25595                                  ; Outputs:
 25596                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25597                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25598                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25599                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25600                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25601                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25602                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25603                                  ;
 25604                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25605                                  ;
 25606                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25607                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25608                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25609                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25610                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25611                                  ;
 25612                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25613                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25614                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25615                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25616                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25618                                  
 25619                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 25620                                  
 25621                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25622                                  
 25623                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25624                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25625                                  
 25626                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25627                                  ; DOSCODE:80D8h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 25628                                  
 25629                                  SETUP:
 25630                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 25631                                  
 25632                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 25633 000040B6 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 25634                                  
 25635                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25636 000040BA 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 25637                                  
 25638                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25639 000040BF 16                      	push	ss
 25640 000040C0 1F                      	pop	ds
 25641                                  
 25642 000040C1 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 25643                                  
 25644 000040C5 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]
 25645 000040C9 891E[B805]              	MOV	[NEXTADD],BX		;Set NEXTADD to start of Xaddr
 25646 000040CD C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 25647                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 25648 000040D2 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 25649                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 25650 000040D6 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 25651 000040DA 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 25652 000040DE A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 25653                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 25654 000040E1 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 25655 000040E7 7555                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 25656 000040E9 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25657 000040EA C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 25658                                  
 25659                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25660                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 25661                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 25662                                  	; 05/12/2022
 25663 000040EE 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 25664                                  	
 25665 000040F2 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 25666                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 25667 000040F6 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25668                                  
 25669                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 25670                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 25671                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 25672                                  	;div	bx
 25673                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 25674                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 25675                                  	;mov	dx,ax

 25764                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 25765                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25766                                  ;
 25767                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 25768                                  ;
 25769                                  ; Inputs:
 25770                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 25771                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25772                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 25773                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25774                                  ; Outputs:
 25775                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 25776                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 25777                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 25778                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 25779                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25780                                  
 25781                                  BREAKDOWN:
 25782 00004159 A1[CC05]                	MOV	AX,[BYTSECPOS]
 25783 0000415C 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX
 25784 0000415E 09C0                    	OR	AX,AX
 25785 00004160 740E                    	JZ	short SAVFIR	; Partial first sector?
 25786                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]
 25787 00004162 262B4602                	SUB	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25788 00004166 F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Max number of bytes left in first sector
 25789 00004168 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length
 25790 0000416A 7304                    	JAE	short SAVFIR
 25791 0000416C 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 25792 0000416E 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 25793                                  SAVFIR:
 25794 00004170 A3[D205]                	MOV	[BYTCNT1],AX
 25795 00004173 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 25796 00004175 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 25797                                  	;div	word [ES:BP+2]
 25798 00004177 26F77602                	DIV	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; How many whole sectors?
 25799 0000417B A3[D605]                	MOV	[SECCNT],AX
 25800 0000417E 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector
 25801                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25802                                  	;OR	DX,[BYTCNT1]	; SMR ONESECTORFIX BUGBUG

 25805                                  	;retnz

 25807                                  	;MOV	[BYTCNT2],AX
 25808                                  	;MOV	[SECCNT],DX	; DX = 0
 25809                                  _RET45:
 25810 00004182 C3                      	retn
