 26345                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26347                                  ;
 26348                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26349                                  ;
 26350                                  ; Inputs:
 26351                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26352                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26353                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26354                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26355                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26356                                  ;
 26357                                  ; Function:
 26358                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26359                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26360                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26361                                  ;
 26362                                  ; Outputs:
 26363                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26364                                  ;
 26365                                  ; Uses:
 26366                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26367                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26368                                  ;
 26369                                  ; Notes:
 26370                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26371                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26373                                  ;M039: Created
 26374                                  
 26375                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26376                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26377                                  
 26378                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26379                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26380                                  
 26381                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26382                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8313h
 26383                                  
 26384                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26385                                  ;
 26386                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26387                                  
 26388                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26389 000042DC 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26390 000042E2 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26391                                  
 26392 000042E4 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26393 000042E9 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26394 000042EB 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26395 000042ED 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26396                                  
 26397 000042F0 E8F825                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26398                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26399 000042F3 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26400 000042F6 36A3[7E11]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26401                                  		
 26402                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26403                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26404                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26405                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26406 000042FA 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26407                                  
 26408                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26409                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26410                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26411                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26412                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26413                                  
 26414                                  bufq:	
 26415                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26416 000042FE 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26417 00004301 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26418                                  
 26419                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26420                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26421                                  
 26422                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26423 00004303 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26424 00004306 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26425                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 26426 00004308 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26427                                  bufq01:
 26428 0000430B 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 26429                                  
 26430                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26431                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 26432                                  
 26433                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 26434 0000430D 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26435 00004310 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 26436                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 26437 00004312 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26438                                  bufq02:
 26439 00004315 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 26440                                  bufq1:	
 26441 00004317 363B3E[7E11]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 26442 0000431C 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 26443                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 26444 0000431E 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 26445                                  bufx:
 26446 00004320 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 26447                                  
 26448                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 26449                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 26450                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 26451                                  
 26452                                  bufq2:	
 26453 00004321 50                      	push	ax
 26454                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 26455 00004322 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 26456 00004326 7430                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 26457                                  
 26458                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 26459 00004328 51                      	push	cx
 26460 00004329 52                      	push	dx
 26461 0000432A 56                      	push	si
 26462 0000432B 57                      	push	di
 26463 0000432C 06                      	push	es
 26464                                  
 26465 0000432D 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 26466                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 26467 0000432F 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26468 00004332 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 26469                                  
 26470                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 26471                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 26472                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 26473                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 26474                                  
 26475                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 26476 00004334 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 26477                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26478 00004337 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 26479 0000433B F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 26480                                  	;mov	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26481                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26482 0000433D 36C43E[0C06]            	les	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26483 00004342 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 26484                                  	;mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 26485 00004344 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26486                                  
 26487                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 26488                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 26489                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 26490                                  
 26491                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26492                                  %if 0
 26493                                  	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 26494                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 26495                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 26496                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 26497                                  	;jnc	short bufq03
 26498                                  	;movsb
 26499                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26500                                  	;adc	cx,0
 26501                                  	;rep	movsb
 26502                                  	; 22/09/2023
 26503                                  	jnc	short bufq03
 26504                                  	movsb
 26505                                  %else
 26506                                  	;;;
 26507                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26508 00004346 36803E[6A00]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0
 26509                                  	;jz	short bufq03+1 ; rep movsw (skip 32bit prefix)
 26510                                  	; 06/04/2024 
 26511 0000434C 7403                    	jz	short bufq03
 26512 0000434E D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26513                                  ;bufq03:
 26514                                  	;rep	movsd
 26515                                  	; 06/04/2024
 26516 00004350 66                      	db	66h	; 32bit prefix
 26517                                  bufq03:
 26518 00004351 F3A5                    	rep	movsw
 26519                                  	;;;
 26520                                  %endif
 26521                                  
 26522                                  ;bufq03:	; 09/02/2024
 26523                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 26524 00004353 07                      	pop	es
 26525 00004354 5F                      	pop	di
 26526 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 26527 00004356 5A                      	pop	dx
 26528 00004357 59                      	pop	cx
 26529                                  
 26530                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 26531                                  bufq3:	
 26532 00004358 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 26533                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 26534 0000435A E8A025                  	call	SCANPLACE
 26535 0000435D 363B06[7E11]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 26536 00004362 58                      	pop	ax
 26537                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 26538                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 26539                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 26540                                  	;retn
 26541                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 26542 00004363 7599                    	jne	short bufq
 26543                                  	;jmp	short bufx
 26544                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26545 00004365 C3                      	retn	; Exit
 26546                                  
 26547                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan

 26557                                  ;
 26558                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE
 26559                                  ;
 26560                                  ; Inputs:
 26561                                  ;       Outputs of SETUP
 26562                                  ; Function:
 26563                                  ;       Perform disk write
 26564                                  ; Outputs:
 26565                                  ;    Carry clear

 26567                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT

 26569                                  ;    Carry set
 26570                                  ;       CX = 0
 26571                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT
 26572                                  ;       AX has error code

 26574                                  
 26575                                  ;hkn; called by DOS_WRITE. DS already set up at this point.

 26577                                  ; DOSCODE:797Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 26585

 26595                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 26605                                  	;jnb	short _WRITE_OK
 26606                                  	;call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION
 26607                                  	;jnb	short DISKWRITE
 26608                                  	;retn
 26609                                  
 26610                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26611 00004366 E8ACFC                  	call	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK	;IFS. check write lock	;AN000;
 26612                                  	; 19/08/2018
 26613 00004369 7304                    	JNC	short _WRITE_OK		;IFS. lock check ok	;AN000;
 26614 0000436B C3                      	retn
 26615                                  
 26616                                  WRTEOFJ:
 26617 0000436C E95902                  	JMP     WRTEOF
 26618                                  
 26619                                  _WRITE_OK:
 26620                                   	; 27/07/2018
 26621                                  	; IBMDOS.COM - Offset 438Eh
 26622                                  	
 26623                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 26624                                  	;and	word [es:di+5],0BFBFh
 26625 0000436F 26816505BFBF            	AND     word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],~(sf_close_nodate|devid_file_clean)
 26626                                  				; Mark file as dirty, clear no date on close
 26627                                  ; 10/02/2024
 26628                                  %if 0
 26629                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26630                                  
 26631                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26632                                  	;mov 	ax,[es:di+11h]

 26634                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR],AX                           ;M039

 26637                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR2],AX                          ;M039
 26638                                  %else

 26640                                  	;les	ax,[es:di+11h]
 26641 00004375 26C44511                	les	ax,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]
 26642 00004379 8C06[0E06]              	mov	[TEMP_VAR2],es
 26643 0000437D A3[0C06]                	mov	[TEMP_VAR],ax

 27542                                  
 27543                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 27544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27545                                  ;
 27546                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 27547                                  ;
 27548                                  ; Inputs:
 27549                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 27550                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 27551                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 27552                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 27553                                  ;
 27554                                  ; Function:
 27555                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 27556                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 27557                                  ;
 27558                                  ; Outputs:
 27559                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 27560                                  ; Uses:
 27561                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 27562                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 27563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27564                                  ;M039: Created
 27565                                  
 27566                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 27567                                  ;
 27568                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27569                                  
 27570                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27571                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27572                                  
 27573                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27574                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27575                                  
 27576                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27577                                  ; DOSCODE:8714h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27578                                  
 27579                                  ; NOTE: Secondary (Buffer) Cache is not used in PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27580                                  
 27581                                  ; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:BB93h)
 27582                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - DOSCODE:7C0Eh)
 27583                                  
 27584                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27585                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27586 000046CC 53                      	push	bx
 27587 000046CD 51                      	push	cx
 27588                                  
 27589 000046CE 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27590 000046D3 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27591 000046D5 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27592 000046D7 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27593                                  
 27594                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27595                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27596                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27597                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27598 000046DA 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27599                                  
 27600                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27601                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27602                                  %if 0
 27603                                  
 27604                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27605                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27606                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27607                                  
 27608                                  	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27609                                  	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27610                                  
 27611                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27612                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27613                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27614                                  
 27615                                  	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27616                                  	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27617                                  
 27618                                  	push    ax
 27619                                  	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27620                                  	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27621                                  
 27622                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27623                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27624                                  
 27625                                  	cmp	si,di
 27626                                  	jne	short sc01
 27627                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 27628                                  sc01: 
 27629                                  	jbe	short sc5
 27630                                  
 27631                                  	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27632                                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27633                                  	
 27634                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27635                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27636                                  
 27637                                  	cmp	bx,di
 27638                                  	jne	short sc02
 27639                                  	cmp	dx,ax
 27640                                  sc02:
 27641                                  	jnb	short sc5
 27642                                  
 27643                                  	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27644                                  sc5:	
 27645                                  	pop     ax
 27646                                  
 27647                                  %endif
 27648                                  
 27649                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27650                                  ;	written.
 27651                                  
 27652                                  nosc:	
 27653 000046DE E80A22                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27654                                  
 27655                                  _bufq:	
 27656                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27657 000046E1 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27658 000046E4 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27659                                  
 27660                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27661                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27662                                  
 27663                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27664 000046E6 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27665 000046E9 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27666                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27667 000046EB 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27668                                  bufq04:
 27669 000046EE 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27670                                  
 27671                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27672                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27673                                  
 27674                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27675 000046F0 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27676 000046F3 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27677                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27678 000046F5 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27679                                  bufq05:
 27680 000046F8 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27681                                  
 27682                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27683                                  
 27684                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27685 000046FA F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27686 000046FE 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27687 00004700 E8FC24                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27688                                  bufq4:
 27689                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27690 00004703 C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27691                                  
 27692 00004708 E8F221                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27693 0000470B EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27694                                  bufq5: 
 27695 0000470D 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27696                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27697                                  bufq6: 
 27698 0000470F 363B3E[7E11]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27699 00004714 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27700                                  	
 27701                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27702 00004716 59                      	pop	cx
 27703 00004717 5B                      	pop	bx
 27704 00004718 C3                      	retn
 27705                                  
 27706                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27707                                  
 27708                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27710                                  ;
 27711                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27712                                  ;
 27713                                  ; Inputs:
 27714                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27715                                  ; Function:
 27716                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27717                                  ; Outputs:
 27718                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27719                                  ; Uses:
 27720                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27722                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27723                                  
 27724                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27725                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27726                                  
 27727                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27728                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27729                                  
 27730                                  DIV32:
 27731 00004719 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27732 0000471D 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27733                                  
 27734 0000471F 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27735 00004721 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27736 00004723 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27737 00004727 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27738 00004729 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27739 0000472B 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27740 0000472D 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27741 0000472F D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27742 00004731 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27743 00004733 C3                      	retn
 27744                                  div5:	
 27745 00004734 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27746 00004736 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27747 00004738 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27748 0000473A F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27749 0000473C 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27750 0000473D F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27751 0000473F C3                      	retn
 27752                                  
 27753                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27755                                  ;
 27756                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27757                                  ;
 27758                                  ; Inputs:
 27759                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27760                                  ; Function:
 27761                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27762                                  ; Outputs:
 27763                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27764                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27765                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27766                                  ; Uses:
 27767                                  ;       DX,CX
 27768                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27769                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27770                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27771                                  
 27772                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27773                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27774                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27775                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27776                                  
 27777                                  SHR32:
 27778                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27779 00004740 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27780 00004744 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27781 00004746 E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27782                                  
 27783                                  rotashft2:
 27784 00004748 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27785 0000474A D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27786 0000474C E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27787                                  norota:
 27788 0000474E C3                      	retn
 27789                                  
 27790                                  ;============================================================================
 27791                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 27792                                  ;============================================================================
 27793                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27794                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27795                                  
 27796                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27797                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27798                                  
 27799                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27800                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27801                                  ;
 27802                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27803                                  ;
 27804                                  ; Inputs:
 27805                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27806                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27807                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27808                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27809                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27810                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27811                                  ; Function:
 27812                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27813                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27814                                  ; Outputs:
 27815                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27816                                  ;	ELSE
 27817                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27818                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27819                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27820                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27821                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27822                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27823                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27824                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27825                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27826                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27827                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27829                                  
 27830                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27831                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27832                                  
 27833                                  SEARCH:
 27834                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27835                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27836                                  
 27837                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27838                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27839                                  
 27840                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27841                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h
 27842                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27843                                  
 27844                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27845                                  
 27846                                  	; 13/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27847                                  	; DOSCODE:8797h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27848                                  
 27849                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27850                                  FINDENTRY:
 27851 0000474F E87E06                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27852 00004752 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27853                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27854 00004755 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27855                                  	;cmp	al,8
 27856 00004757 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 27857 00004759 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 27858 0000475B E83B02                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 27859                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 27860 0000475E E84C01                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 27861                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 27862                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 27863                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27864 00004761 724F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 27865                                  
 27866                                  	;entry	Srch
 27867                                  SRCH:
 27868                                  	;;;
 27869                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27870 00004763 C706[A50A]0000          	mov     word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 27871                                  SRCH2:
 27872                                  	;;;
 27873                                  
 27874 00004769 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27875 0000476A 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 27876                                  
 27877                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 27878                                  
 27879 0000476E 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 27880                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 27881 00004770 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 27882 00004772 7461                    	JZ	short FREE
 27883                                  
 27884                                  	;;;
 27885                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27886 00004774 50                      	push	ax
 27887 00004775 8A470B                  	mov	al,[bx+0Bh]		; [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 27888 00004778 E8A503                  	call	check_longname
 27889 0000477B 58                      	pop	ax
 27890 0000477C 7447                    	jz	short NEXTENT2
 27891                                  	;;;
 27892                                  
 27893                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27894 0000477E 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 27895 00004783 7450                    	JZ	short FREE
 27896                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 27897 00004785 F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 27898                                  					; Volume ID file?
 27899 00004789 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 27900                                  
 27901                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27902 0000478B 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 27903                                  CHKFNAM:
 27904                                  ;	Context ES
 27905 00004790 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 27906 00004792 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 27907 00004794 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 27908                                  
 27909                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 27910 00004796 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 27911                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27912                                  
 27913                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 27914                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 27915                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 27916                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 27917                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27918 00004799 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 27919 0000479D 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 27920 0000479F 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 27921                                  NO_E5:
 27922                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27923 000047A3 E88100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 27924 000047A6 7449                    	JZ	short FOUND
 27925 000047A8 1F                      	POP	DS
 27926                                  
 27927                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 27928                                  NEXTENT:
 27929 000047A9 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 27930 000047AD E88600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 27931 000047B0 73B1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 27932                                  	;JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27933                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27934                                  SETESRET:
 27935 000047B2 16                      	PUSH	SS
 27936 000047B3 07                      	POP	ES
 27937                                  
 27938                                  	;;;
 27939                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27940 000047B4 FF36[DA05]              	push	word [ENTLAST]
 27941 000047B8 8F06[B50A]              	pop	word [ENTLAST_PREV]	; previous ENTLAST
 27942 000047BC 7306                    	jnc	short SETESRETN
 27943 000047BE C706[A50A]0000          	mov	word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 27944                                  SETESRETN:
 27945                                  	;;;
 27946                                  
 27947 000047C4 C3                      	retn
 27948                                  
 27949                                  	;;;
 27950                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27951                                  NEXTENT2:
 27952 000047C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 27953 000047C6 FF06[A50A]              	inc	word [LNE_COUNT]	; Long Name entry count
 27954                                  NEXTENT3:
 27955 000047CA C42E[8A05]              	les	bp,[THISDPB]
 27956 000047CE E86500                  	call	NEXTENTRY
 27957 000047D1 7396                    	jnc	short SRCH2
 27958 000047D3 EBDD                    	jmp	short SETESRET
 27959                                  	;;;
 27960                                  
 27961                                  FREE:
 27962 000047D5 1F                      	POP	DS
 27963 000047D6 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 27964 000047DA 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 27965 000047DE 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 27966 000047E0 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 27967                                  TSTALL:
 27968 000047E4 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 27969                                  NEXTENTJ:
 27970                                  	;je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 27971                                  	;;;
 27972                                  	; 13/02/2024
 27973 000047E8 74E0                    	je	short NEXTENT3		; No - continue search
 27974                                  	;;;
 27975 000047EA 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 27976 000047EE F9                      	STC
 27977 000047EF EBC1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27978                                  
 27979                                  FOUND:
 27980                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 27981                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 27982                                  ; ------	------
 27983                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 27984                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 27985                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 27986                                  
 27987 000047F1 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 27988 000047F3 1F                      	POP	DS
 27989 000047F4 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 27990                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 27991 000047F8 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 27992                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 27993 000047FB 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 27994                                  					; point to first cluster field
 27995                                  	;test	ch,8
 27996 000047FE F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 27997 00004801 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 27998                                  	;test	ah,8
 27999 00004803 F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 28000                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 28001                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28002 00004806 74A1                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 28003                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28004                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 28005 00004808 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 28006 0000480A EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 28007                                  check_one_volume_id:
 28008                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 28009 0000480C 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 28010                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 28011                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28012 0000480F 7498                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 28013                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 28014 00004811 E8D005                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 28015 00004814 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 28016 00004816 F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 28017                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28018                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 28019 0000481B 748C                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 28020                                  RETFF:
 28021 0000481D C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 28022                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28023                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 28024                                  	; 15/12/2022
 28025 00004821 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 28026                                  ;SETESRET:
 28027                                  	;PUSH	SS
 28028                                  	;POP	ES
 28029                                  	;retn
 28030                                  	; 24/01/2024
 28031 00004825 EB8B                    	jmp	short SETESRET
 28032                                  
 28033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28034                                  ;
 28035                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 28036                                  ;
 28037                                  ; Inputs:
 28038                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 28039                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 28040                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 28041                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 28042                                  ; Function:
 28043                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 28044                                  ; Outputs:
 28045                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 28046                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 28047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28048                                  
 28049                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28050                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 28051                                  
 28052                                  MetaCompare:
 28053 00004827 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 28054                                  WILDCRD:
 28055 0000482A F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 28056 0000482C 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 28057                                  CHECK_META:
 28058 0000482E 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 28059 00004833 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 28060                                  MetaRet:
 28061 00004835 C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 28062                                  
 28063                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 28064                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28065                                  ;
 28066                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 28067                                  ;
 28068                                  ; Inputs:
 28069                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 28070                                  ; Function:
 28071                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 28072                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 28073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28074                                  
 28075                                  NEXTENTRY:
 28076                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28077                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 28078                                  
 28079                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28080                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28081                                  
 28082                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28083                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 28084                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 28085                                  
 28086                                  	; 14/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28087                                  	; DOSCODE:8884h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 28088                                  
 28089 00004836 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 28090 00004839 3B06[DA05]              	CMP	AX,[ENTLAST]
 28091 0000483D 741C                    	JZ	short NONE
 28092 0000483F 40                      	INC	AX
 28093                                  	;ADD	BX,32
 28094 00004840 8D5F20                  	LEA	BX,[BX+32]
 28095 00004843 39D3                    	CMP	BX,DX
 28096                                  	; 21/11/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS (DOSCODE:7D5Dh)
 28097                                  	;JB	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.0 src (dir.asm)
 28098                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28099 00004845 7540                    	jne	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:7D97h)
 28100                                  
 28101                                  	;;;
 28102                                  	; 14/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28103 00004847 833E[C205]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART],0
 28104 0000484C 750F                    	jnz	short nextentry_cont
 28105 0000484E 833E[DC0A]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART_HW],0
 28106 00004853 7508                    	jnz	short nextentry_cont
 28107                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+9]
 28108 00004855 263B4609                	cmp	ax,[es:bp+DPB.ROOT_ENTRIES] ; Number of root dir entries
 28109                                  	;jnb	short NONE
 28110                                  	;jmp	short GETENT
 28111 00004859 7255                    	jb	short GETENT
 28112                                  NONE:		; 14/02/2024
 28113 0000485B F9                      	stc
 28114 0000485C C3                      	retn
 28115                                  	
 28116                                  nextentry_cont:
 28117                                  	;;;
 28118                                  
 28119 0000485D 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 28120 00004861 FEC3                    	INC	BL
 28121 00004863 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 28122 00004867 7223                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 28123                                  	;;;

 28126 0000486D 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 28127                                  	;;;

 28129 00004875 E8711A                  	call	IsEOF

 28138                                  	;JB	short NONE
 28139                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 28140                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28141 00004884 732A                    	jnb	short GETENT
 28142                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28143                                  	;JB	short NONE
 28144                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 28145                                  	; 14/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28146                                  ;NONE:
 28147                                  	;STC
 28148 00004886 C3                      	retn
 28149                                  HAVIT:

 28152                                  nextentry_retn:

 28206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28207                                  ;
 28208                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 28209                                  ;
 28210                                  ; Inputs:
 28211                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 28212                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 28213                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 28214                                  ; Function:
 28215                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 28216                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 28217                                  ; Outputs:
 28218                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 28219                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 28220                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 28221                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 28222                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28224                                  
 28225                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28226                                  GETENTRY:
 28227                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28228 000048AD A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 28229                                  
 28230                                  	;entry	GETENT
 28231                                  GETENT:
 28232 000048B0 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 28233                                  ;
 28234                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 28235                                  ; directory.
 28236                                  ;
 28237 000048B3 B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 28238 000048B5 D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 28239 000048B7 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 28240                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28241                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 28242                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28243                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 28244                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28245 000048B9 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 28246 000048BB 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 28247                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 28248                                  ;
 28249                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 28250                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 28251                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 28252                                  ;
 28253                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 28254 000048BE 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 28255 000048C2 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 28256                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 28257 000048C5 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 28258                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28259                                  	;MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 28260                                  				; NOTE: This BX value is not used in DIRREAD
 28261                                  				; Erdogan Tan - 14/02/2024
 28262                                  	;PUSH	BX
 28263 000048C7 52                      	push	dx
 28264                                  	;
 28265 000048C8 E82BF6                  	call	DIRREAD
 28266 000048CB 5B                      	POP	BX
 28267                                  	;retc
 28268 000048CC 72BD                    	jc	short nextentry_retn
 28269                                  SETENTRY:
 28270 000048CE 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 28271                                  	;;;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 28272                                  	;;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 28273                                  	;add	dx,24 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 14/02/2024	
 28274 000048D2 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 28275 000048D5 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 28276                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 28277 000048D7 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 28278                                  	; 29/12/2022
 28279                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 28280 000048DB F8                      	clc
 28281 000048DC C3                      	retn
 28282

 28284                                  
 28285                                  ; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28287                                  
 28288                                  sft_fcb_table:
 28289 000048DD 00<rep 14h>             	times 20 db 0
 28290                                  sftfcb.cluster:
 28291 000048F1 00000000                	dd	0
 28292                                  sftfcb.direntry:
 28293 000048F5 0000                    	dw	0

 28305                                  ;Break	<SETDIRSRCH SETROOTSRCH -- Set Search environments>
 28306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28307                                  ;
 28308                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 28309                                  ;
 28310                                  ; Inputs:
 28311                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 28312                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28313                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 28314                                  ; Function:
 28315                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 28316                                  ; Outputs:
 28317                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 28318                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 28319                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28320                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 28321                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28322                                  
 28323                                  ; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28324                                  %if 0
 28325                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28326                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 28327                                  	OR	BX,BX
 28328                                  	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
 28329                                  	MOV	[DIRSTART],BX
 28330                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 28331                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28332                                  	INC	AL
 28333                                  	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 28334                                  
 28335                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 28336                                  	;SAVE	<SI>
 28337                                  	push	si
 28338                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 28339                                  	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 28340                                  	JNZ	short UNP_OK
 28341                                  
 28342                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 28343                                  	;invoke	UNPACK
 28344                                  	call	UNPACK
 28345                                  	JNC	short UNP_OK
 28346                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 28347                                  	pop	si
 28348                                  	;return
 28349                                  	retn
 28350                                  
 28351                                  UNP_OK:

 28353                                  	MOV	DX,BX
 28354                                  	XOR	BL,BL
 28355                                  	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 28356                                  	;invoke	FIGREC
 28357                                  	call	FIGREC
 28358                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 28359                                  	pop	si
 28360                                  	
 28361                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28362                                  
 28363                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28364                                  	;PUSH	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 28365                                  	;MOV	DX,[HIGH_SECTOR]	   ;AN000; >32mb
 28366                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC+2],DX		   ;AN000; >32mb
 28367                                  	;POP	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 28368

 28379

 28381                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 28382                                  	;CLC

 28384                                  
 28385                                  	;entry	SETROOTSRCH
 28386                                  SETROOTSRCH:

 28396                                  	; 19/05/2019
 28397                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+10h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 28398                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h] ; MSDOS 6.0

 28403                                  	; 22/09/2023
 28404                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28405                                  	;MOV	WORD [DIRSEC+2],0	      ;F.C. >32mb
 28406                                  	CLC
 28407                                  	retn
 28408                                  %else
 28409                                  	;;;
 28410                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28557                                  				;      of the last SFT entry

 28560                                  	; Retro DOS v5.0

 28600                                  
 28601 00004A64 93                      	xchg	ax,bx
 28602                                  	;xor	dx,dx ; *
 28603                                  	; dx = 0

 28605 00004A68 F7F1                    	div	cx

 28618                                  	;pop	si

 28628                                  
 28629                                  ; 24/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28631                                  
 28632                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28633                                  find_sft_entry_number:
 28634 00004A7C 06                      	push	es		; es:di = SFT entry
 28635 00004A7D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 28636 00004A7F 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 28637 00004A81 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 28638 00004A86 26C41E[2A00]            	les	bx,[es:SFT_ADDR] ; address of the first SFT
 28639                                  f_sfte_1:
 28640 00004A8B 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 28641 00004A8D 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; same SFT segment ?
 28642 00004A8F 7512                    	jne	short f_sfte_2	; no
 28643 00004A91 89F8                    	mov	ax,di
 28644 00004A93 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx		; ax = entry offset
 28645                                  	;sub	ax,6		; ax = offset from start of the SFT table
 28646 00004A95 83E806                  	sub	ax,SFT.SFTable
 28647                                  	;mov	bx,59
 28648 00004A98 BB3B00                  	mov	bx,SF_ENTRY.size ; (SFT entry size)
 28649 00004A9B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 28650 00004A9D F7F3                    	div	bx		; ax = SFT entry index in the table
 28651 00004A9F 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; ax = SFT index number (for requested SFT entry)
 28652 00004AA1 07                      	pop	es
 28653 00004AA2 C3                      	retn
 28654                                  f_sfte_2:
 28655 00004AA3 26034F04                	add	cx,[es:bx+4]	; SFT.SFCount ; number of entries in the table
 28656 00004AA7 26C41F                  	les	bx,[es:bx]	; SFT.SFLink
 28657 00004AAA 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh ; -1	; the last SFT
 28658 00004AAD 75DC                    	jnz	short f_sfte_1
 28659 00004AAF F9                      	stc			; (not found)
 28660 00004AB0 07                      	pop	es
 28661 00004AB1 C3                      	retn
 28662

 28668                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28669                                  int_2Fh_1230h:		; Windows95 - FIND SFT ENTRY IN INTERNAL FILE TABLES
 28670 00004AB2 E8C7FF                  	call	find_sft_entry_number
 28671 00004AB5 7242                    	jc	short find_sfte_i_error
 28672 00004AB7 06                      	push	es	; ax = SFT enty index number (of the requested SFT entry)
 28673 00004AB8 57                      	push	di
 28674 00004AB9 0E                      	push	cs
 28675 00004ABA 07                      	pop	es
 28676 00004ABB B91400                  	mov	cx,20		; statically allocated with 20 entries,
 28677                                  				; and used only for FCB calls
 28678 00004ABE BF[DD48]                	mov	di,sft_fcb_table ; new file system (internal) table
 28679                                  				;  only for fcb calls
 28680                                  scan_next_sftfcb:
 28681 00004AC1 F2AE                    	repne scasb
 28682 00004AC3 F9                      	stc
 28683 00004AC4 7531                    	jnz	short sfte_i_notfound ; not found (cf=1)
 28684 00004AC6 8D5DFF                  	lea	bx,[di-1]	; offset of the entry in the table
 28685 00004AC9 81EB[DD48]              	sub	bx,sft_fcb_table ; index into new file system table
 28686 00004ACD 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 28687 00004ACF 01DB                    	add	bx,bx		; 2*bx
 28688 00004AD1 01D3                    	add	bx,dx		; 3*bx
 28689 00004AD3 01DB                    	add	bx,bx		; bx = 6*bx  ; entry size = 6 bytes
 28690 00004AD5 268BB7[F348]            	mov	si,[es:bx+sftfcb.cluster+2] ; dir start cluster number, hw
 28691 00004ADA 268B97[F548]            	mov	dx,[es:bx+sftfcb.direntry] ; directory entry number
 28692 00004ADF 51                      	push	cx
 28693 00004AE0 268B8F[F148]            	mov	cx,[es:bx+sftfcb.cluster] ; dir start cluster number, lw
 28694 00004AE5 09C9                    	or	cx,cx
 28695 00004AE7 750C                    	jnz	short sfte_i_found
 28696 00004AE9 09F6                    	or	si,si
 28697 00004AEB 7508                    	jnz	short sfte_i_found
 28698 00004AED 59                      	pop	cx
 28699 00004AEE 09C9                    	or	cx,cx
 28700 00004AF0 75CF                    	jnz	short scan_next_sftfcb
 28701 00004AF2 F9                      	stc			; not found (cf=1)
 28702 00004AF3 EB02                    	jmp	short sfte_i_notfound
 28703                                  
 28704                                  sfte_i_found:
 28705 00004AF5 58                      	pop	ax		; clear stack
 28706 00004AF6 F8                      	clc			; found (cf=0)
 28707                                  sfte_i_notfound:
 28708 00004AF7 5F                      	pop	di
 28709 00004AF8 07                      	pop	es
 28710                                  find_sfte_i_error:
 28711 00004AF9 B80000                  	mov	ax,0
 28712 00004AFC C3                      	retn
