 31172                                  
 31173                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31174                                  %if 0	; SC
 31175                                  
 31176                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31177                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31178                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31179                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31180                                  
 31181                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 31182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31183                                  ;
 31184                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 31185                                  ;
 31186                                  ; Inputs:
 31187                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 31188                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 31189                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 31190                                  ; Function:
 31191                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 31192                                  ; Output:
 31193                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 31194                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 31195                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 31196                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 31197                                  ;
 31198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31199                                  
 31200                                  RW_SC:
 31201                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 31202                                  	
 31203                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 31204                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31205                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 31206                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31207                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31208                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31209                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 31210                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31211                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 31212                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31213                                  
 31214                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 31215                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 31216                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31217                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 31218                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 31219                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 31220                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 31221                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31222                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 31223                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 31224                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 31225                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 31226                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31227                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 31228                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 31229                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 31230                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 31231                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 31232                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 31233                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31234                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 31235                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 31236                                  chklow: 						
 31237                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 31238                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 31239                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 31240                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 31241                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 31242                                  readsr:
 31243                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 31244                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 31245                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 31246                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31247                                  
 31248                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 31249                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 31250                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31251                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31252                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 31253                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 31254                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 31255                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 31256                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 31257                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31258                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31259                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 31260                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31261                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 31262                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 31263                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 31264                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31265                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31266                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 31267                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 31268                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 31269                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 31270                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31271                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 31272                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31273                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 31274                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31275                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31276                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31277                                  
 31278                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 31279                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31280                                  ;
 31281                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 31282                                  ;
 31283                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31284                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31285                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31286                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31287                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31288                                  ; Function:
 31289                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 31290                                  ; Output:
 31291                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 31292                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 31293                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 31294                                  ;
 31295                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31296                                  
 31297                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31298                                  IN_SC:
 31299                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31300                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 31301                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 31302                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31303                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 31304                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 31305                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 31306                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 31307                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31308                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 31309                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31310                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 31311                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31312                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 31313                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 31314                                  	; 16/12/2022
 31315                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 31316                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31317                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 31318                                  
 31319                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 31320                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31321                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31322                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31323                                  
 31324                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 31325                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31326                                  ;
 31327                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 31328                                  ;
 31329                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31330                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31331                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31332                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31333                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 31334                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31335                                  ;
 31336                                  ; Function:
 31337                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 31338                                  ; Output:
 31339                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 31340                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31341                                  
 31342                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 31343                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31344                                  
 31345                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 31346                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31347                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 31348                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 31349                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31350                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 31351                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31352                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31353                                  
 31354                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31355                                  ; 22/11/2022
 31356                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31357                                  
 31358                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 31359                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31360                                  ;
 31361                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 31362                                  ;
 31363                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 31364                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 31365                                  ; Function:
 31366                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31367                                  ; Output:
 31368                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 31369                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 31370                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 31371                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 31372                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 31373                                  ;     
 31374                                  ;		       0 if failed
 31375                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31376                                  
 31377                                  VIRREAD:
 31378                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31379                                  
 31380                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 31381                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31382                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 31383                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31384                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31385                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 31386                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 31387                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 31388                                  
 31389                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 31390                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 31391                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31392                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31393                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31394                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31395                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31396                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31397                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31398                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 31399                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 31400                                  	POP	CX
 31401                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31402                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31403                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31404                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31405                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31406                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 31407                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 31408                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 31409                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 31410                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 31411                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 31412                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31413                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 31414                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 31415                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31416                                  
 31417                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 31418                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31419                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31420                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31421                                  
 31422                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 31423                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31424                                  ;
 31425                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 31426                                  ;
 31427                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 31428                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 31429                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 31430                                  ; Function:
 31431                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31432                                  ; Output:
 31433                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 31434                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 31435                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31436                                  
 31437                                  SC2BUF:
 31438                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31439                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 31440                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31441                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31442                                  	jc	short sexit
 31443                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 31444                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 31445                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31446                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 31447                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 31448                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 31449                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 31450                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 31451                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31452                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31453                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31454                                  	mul	cx
 31455                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 31456                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31457                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 31458                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31459                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 31460                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 31461                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31462                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 31463                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 31464                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 31465                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 31466                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 31467                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31468                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 31469                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 31470                                  nodd:
 31471                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 31472                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31473                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 31474                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 31475                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31476                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 31477                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31478                                  
 31479                                  %endif	; SC

 31749                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31750                                  ;
 31751                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31752                                  ;
 31753                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31754                                  ;
 31755                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31756                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31757                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31758                                  ;
 31759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31760                                  
 31761                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31762                                  
 31763                                  SETDOTENT:
 31764                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31765 00005459 AB                      	STOSW

 31781 00005469 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]

 31803                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31804                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31805                                  ;
 31806                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31807                                  ;
 31808                                  ; Inputs:
 31809                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31810                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31811                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31812                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31813                                  ;
 31814                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31815                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31816                                  ;
 31817                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31818                                  ;               terminated)
 31819                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31820                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31821                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31822                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31823                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31824                                  ; Function:
 31825                                  ;       Make a new node
 31826                                  ; Outputs:
 31827                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31828                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31829                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31830                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31831                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31832                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31833                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31834                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31835                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31836                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31837                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31838                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31839                                  ;       ELSE
 31840                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31841                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31842                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31843                                  ;               containing new node.
 31844                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31845                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31846                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31847                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31848                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31849                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31850                                  ;
 31851                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31852                                  
 31853                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31854                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31855                                  
 31856                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31857                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31858                                  
 31859                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31860                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31861                                  
 31862                                  MakeNode:
 31863                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31864 00005480 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31865 00005486 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31866 00005487 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31867 0000548C A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL

 31876 0000549A 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31877 0000549D 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31878                                  make_err_4:
 31879 0000549F B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31880                                  make_err_ret:
 31881                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31882                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31883 000054A1 98                      	cbw
 31884 000054A2 F9                      	STC
 31885                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31886 000054A3 C3                      	retn

 31890                                  make_type:
 31891                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31892                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 31897                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31898                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31899 000054B0 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31900 000054B5 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31901 000054B7 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31902 000054B8 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31903                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31904                                  make_retn:
 31905                                  	;return
 31906 000054BB C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31907                                  
 31908                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31909                                  
 31910                                  make_type2:
 31911 000054BC C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31912 000054C0 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31913 000054C2 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31914 000054C3 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31915                                  
 31916                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31917                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31918                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31919                                  ;   else => file
 31920                                  
 31921                                  make_exists:
 31922 000054C5 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31923 000054C7 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31924                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31925 000054C9 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31926 000054CE 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31927                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31928                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31929 000054D0 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31930 000054D2 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31931 000054D4 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31932 000054D6 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31933 000054D8 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31934 000054D9 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31935                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31936 000054DD 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31937                                  	;test	ch,1

 31941 000054E9 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31942 000054EA 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31943 000054EC 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31944                                  
 31945                                  make_share:
 31946                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31947                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31948 000054EE 98                      	cbw
 31949 000054EF 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31950 000054F0 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31951 000054F1 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH

 31953 000054F6 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31954 000054FA 56                      	push	si
 31955 000054FB 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31956 000054FC E8C02F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31957 000054FF 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31958                                  
 31959                                  ; User failed request.
 31960 00005501 5B                      	pop	bx
 31961 00005502 5E                      	pop	si
 31962 00005503 59                      	pop	cx
 31963 00005504 58                      	pop	ax
 31964                                  
 31965                                  Make_Share_ret:
 31966 00005505 B006                    	MOV	AL,6
 31967 00005507 EB98                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31968                                  
 31969                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 31970 00005509 59                      	POP	CX		; Get back device ID
 31971                                  make_err_ret_5:
 31972 0000550A B005                    	MOV     AL,5		; Attribute mismatch
 31973                                          ; 22/11/2022
 31974 0000550C EB93                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31975                                  
 31976                                  make_exists_dir:
 31977 0000550E B001                    	MOV	AL,1		; exists as directory, always an error
 31978                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31979 00005510 EB8F                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31980                                  
 31981                                  make_save:
 31982 00005512 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save whether Disk or File
 31983 00005513 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; Device ID to AH
 31984 00005515 E86800                  	CALL	NEWENTRY
 31985 00005518 58                      	POP	AX		; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 31986 00005519 73A0                    	jnc	short make_retn
 31987 0000551B B002                    	MOV	AL,2		; create failed case 2
 31988                                  make_save_retn:
 31989 0000551D C3                      	retn
 31990                                  
 31991                                  make_new:
 31992 0000551E E8F1FF                  	call	make_save
 31993 00005521 72FA                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 31994                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 31995 00005523 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 31996 00005528 75F3                    	jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 31997                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 31998 0000552A 50                      	push	ax
 31999 0000552B 53                      	push	bx
 32000 0000552C 56                      	push	si
 32001 0000552D E88F2F                  	call	ShareEnter
 32002 00005530 5E                      	pop	si
 32003 00005531 5B                      	pop	bx
 32004 00005532 58                      	pop	ax
 32005 00005533 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 32006                                  
 32007                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 32008                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 32009                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 32010                                  
 32011 00005535 50                      	PUSH	AX
 32012 00005536 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 32013                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 32014 0000553A 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 32015                                  
 32016                                  ; 23/02/2024
 32017                                  %if 0	
 32018                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32019                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 32020                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 32021                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 32022                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 32023                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32024                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 32025                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 32026                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 32027                                  yesdirty8:
 32028                                  %else
 32029                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32030 0000553E E8AC16                  	call    SET_BUF_DIRTY	
 32031                                  %endif
 32032 00005541 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 32033                                  	; 15/12/2022
 32034 00005545 268A4600                	mov	al,[ES:BP]
 32035                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32036                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 32037                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 32038 00005549 E87B15                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 32039 0000554C 58                      	POP	AX
 32040 0000554D EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 32041                                  
 32042                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 32043                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 32044                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 32045                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 32046                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 32047                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 32048                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 32049                                  ;
 32050                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 32051                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 32052                                  
 32053                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32054                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32055                                  
 32056                                  MakeEndShare:
 32057 0000554F C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 32058 00005553 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 32059 00005555 E889C3                  	call	ECritSFT
 32060 00005558 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 32061                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32062 0000555B 50                      	push	ax
 32063 0000555C 57                      	push	di
 32064 0000555D 06                      	push	es
 32065 0000555E 9C                      	PUSHF
 32066 0000555F E8582F                  	call	ShareEnd		; remove sharing
 32067 00005562 9D                      	POPF
 32068 00005563 07                      	pop	es
 32069 00005564 5F                      	pop	di
 32070 00005565 268F05                  	pop	word [ES:DI]
 32071                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32072 00005568 E8A3C3                  	call	LCritSFT
 32073                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32074                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32075 0000556B 5B                      	pop	bx
 32076 0000556C 5E                      	pop	si
 32077 0000556D 59                      	pop	cx
 32078 0000556E 58                      	pop	ax
 32079 0000556F E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 32080                                  
 32081                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 32082                                  
 32083 00005572 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 32084 00005574 50                      	push	ax
 32085 00005575 53                      	push	bx
 32086 00005576 56                      	push	si
 32087 00005577 9C                      	PUSHF
 32088 00005578 E8442F                  	call	ShareEnter
 32089 0000557B 9D                      	POPF
 32090 0000557C 5E                      	pop	si
 32091 0000557D 5B                      	pop	bx
 32092 0000557E 58                      	pop	ax
 32093                                  
 32094                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 32095                                  
 32096                                  makeendshare_retn:
 32097 0000557F C3                      	retn

 32099                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32100                                  ;
 32101                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 32102                                  ;
 32103                                  ; Inputs:
 32104                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 32105                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 32106                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 32107                                  ;		  entries
 32108                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 32109                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 32110                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 32111                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 32112                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 32113                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 32114                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32115                                  ;	  If FILE
 32116                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32117                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32118                                  ;	  If device
 32119                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32120                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32121                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32122                                  ; Function:
 32123                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 32124                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 32125                                  ; Outputs:
 32126                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 32127                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 32128                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 32129                                  ;	  else
 32130                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 32131                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 32132                                  ;
 32133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32134                                  
 32135                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32136                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32137                                  
 32138                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32139                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32140                                  
 32141                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 32142                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 32143                                  
 32144                                  NEWENTRY:
 32145 00005580 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 32146 00005584 7315                    	JNC	short EXISTENT	
 32147 00005586 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 32148                                  	;STC
 32149                                  	;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 32150                                  	; 24/09/2023
 32151 0000558B 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 32152 0000558D E8E9FD                  	CALL	BUILDDIR	; Try to build dir
 32153 00005590 72ED                    	jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 32154 00005592 E81BF3                  	call	GETENT		; Point at that free entry
 32155 00005595 72E8                    	jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 32156 00005597 EB0E                    	JMP	SHORT FREESPOT
 32157                                  
 32158                                  ERRRET3:
 32159 00005599 F9                      	STC
 32160                                  newentry_retn:
 32161 0000559A C3                      	retn
 32162                                  
 32163                                  EXISTENT:
 32164 0000559B 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH		; Check if file is I/O device
 32165 0000559D 7903                    	JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 32166 0000559F E98600                  	JMP	DOOPEN		; If so, proceed with open
 32167                                  
 32168                                  NOT_DEV1:

 32170 000055A5 72F3                    	jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 32171                                  FREESPOT:
 32172                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 32173 000055A7 F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 32174 000055AC 7407                    	JZ	short NOTVOLID

 32176 000055B3 75E4                    	JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 32177                                  NOTVOLID:
 32178 000055B5 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 32179 000055B9 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 32180                                  
 32181 000055BB BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1
 32182

 32188                                  
 32189                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 32190 000055C8 B105                    	MOV	CL,5		;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 32191                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 32192                                  
 32193 000055CA 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 32194 000055CC F3AB                    	REP	STOSW		; Zero pad
 32195 000055CE E88BB5                  	call	DATE16
 32196 000055D1 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 32197 000055D2 AB                      	STOSW			; dir_time
 32198 000055D3 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 32199                                  	; 23/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32200                                  	;;;
 32201 000055D4 268945FA                	mov	[es:di-6],ax	; last access date
 32202                                  	;;;

 32208 000055DD AB                      	STOSW
 32209 000055DE AB                      	STOSW
 32210                                  updnxt:
 32211 000055DF 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 32212                                  
 32213                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32214                                  
 32215                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32216 000055E3 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty

 32286                                  ; DOOPEN
 32287                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32288                                  ;
 32289                                  ; Inputs:
 32290                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 32291                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 32292                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32293                                  ;	  If FILE
 32294                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32295                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32296                                  ;	  If device
 32297                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32298                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32299                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32300                                  ; Function:
 32301                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 32302                                  ; Outputs:
 32303                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 32304                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 32305                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 32306                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 32307                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 32308                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 32309                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 32310                                  ;	  If device
 32311                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 32312                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 32313                                  ;	  If file
 32314                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 32315                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 32316                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0

 32585                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32586                                  ;
 32587                                  ; Inputs:
 32588                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB

 32674 0000574A E80E12                  	call	GETBUFFER ; *	; pre read
 32675                                  
 32676 0000574D 5B                      	POP	BX		; Get offset back
 32677 0000574E 72F9                    	jc	short freeent_retn
 32678 00005750 E832E8                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 32679 00005753 031E[E205]              	ADD	BX,[CURBUF]	; Correct it for new buffer

 32682                                  	;;add	si,1Ah
 32683                                  	;ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first	; Get corrected SI
 32684                                  	; 24/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32685                                  	;lea	si,[bx+1Ah]

 32687                                  RET1:
 32688 0000575A F8                      	CLC
 32689 0000575B C3                      	retn
 32690                                  
 32691                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32692                                  %if 0
 32693                                  
 32694                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32695                                  ;
 32696                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32697                                  ;
 32698                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32699                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32700                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32701                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32702                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32703                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32704                                  ;
 32705                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32706                                  
 32707                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32708                                  	PUSH	AX
 32709                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32710                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32711                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32712                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32713                                  	push	es
 32714                                  	push	di
 32715                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32716                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32717                                  	pop	di
 32718                                  	pop	es
 32719                                  
 32720                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32721                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32722                                  	POP	AX
 32723                                  	retn
 32724                                  
 32725                                  %endif

 32979                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32980                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32981                                  ;
 32982                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32983                                  ;
 32984                                  ; Inputs:
 32985                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32986                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32987                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32988                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32989                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32990                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32991                                  ; Function:
 32992                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32993                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32994                                  ; Outputs:
 32995                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32996                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32997                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32998                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32999                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 33000                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 33001                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33002                                  
 33003                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33004                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 33005                                  
 33006                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 33007                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 33008                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 33009                                  
 33010                                  BUFSEC:
 33011                                  	; 25/02/2024
 33012                                  	;;;
 33013                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33014 00005809 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 33015                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 33016 0000580D 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33017 00005811 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33018                                  	;;;
 33019 00005812 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 33020 00005816 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 33021                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 33022 0000581A C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 33023 0000581F E89801                          CALL    FIGREC
 33024 00005822 E83D11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 33025                                  	; 25/02/2024
 33026                                  	;;;
 33027 00005825 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33028                                  	;;;
 33029 00005829 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 33030                                  
 33031 0000582B C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 33032 00005830 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 33033 00005834 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 33034 00005836 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 33035 0000583A 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 33036 0000583C 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 33037 00005840 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 33038                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 33039 00005844 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 33040                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 33041                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33042                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 33043 00005849 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 33044 0000584C 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 33045 00005850 F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 33046 00005851 C3                              retn
 33047                                  
 33048                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 33049                                  
 33050                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33051                                  ;
 33052                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 33053                                  ;
 33054                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 33055                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33056                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33057                                  ;
 33058                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 33059                                  ;
 33060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33061                                  
 33062                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33063                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33064                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33065                                  BUFRD:
 33066 00005852 06                              PUSH	ES
 33067 00005853 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 33068 00005855 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 33069 00005858 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 33070                                  
 33071                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 33072 0000585A 07                              POP	ES
 33073 0000585B EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 33074                                  
 33075                                  BUF_OK:
 33076 0000585D 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 33077 0000585F 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 33078 00005863 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 33079 00005865 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 33080 00005867 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 33081                                  ;M039
 33082                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33083                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 33084                                  	;MOVSB
 33085                                  ;EVENRD:
 33086                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 33087                                  
 33088                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 33089                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 33090                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 33091                                  
 33092                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33093 00005869 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 33094                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 33095                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 33096                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33097 0000586B 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 33098 0000586D A4                      	movsb ; ****
 33099                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33100                                  	;adc	cx,0
 33101                                  	;rep	movsb
 33102                                  ;M039
 33103                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 33104 0000586E 07                              POP	ES
 33105                                  ;hkn; SS override
 33106 0000586F 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 33107                                  	;;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 33108                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33109                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024
 33110 00005874 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 33111 00005877 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 33112 00005879 E88810                          call	PLACEBUF
 33113                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 33114 0000587C 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 33115 00005880 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 33116                                  ;M039
 33117                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33118                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 33119                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 33120                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 33121 00005882 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 33122                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 33123                                  
 33124                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 33125 00005887 F8                              CLC
 33126                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 33127 00005888 16                      	push	ss
 33128 00005889 1F                      	pop	ds
 33129                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 33130 0000588A C3                              retn
 33131

 33137                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33138                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)

 33165                                  	;INC	AX
 33166                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 33167

 33594                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33595                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33596                                  
 33597                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33598                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 
 33599                                  
 33600                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33601                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33602                                  ;
 33603                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33604                                  ;
 33605                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33606                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33607                                  ;
 33608                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33609                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33610                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33611                                  ;
 33612                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33613                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33614                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33615                                  ;
 33616                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33617                                  ;
 33618                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33619                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33620                                  ;           ELSE
 33621                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33622                                  ;
 33623                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33624                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33625                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33626                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33627                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33628                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33629                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33630                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33631                                  ;   allocated.
 33632                                  ;
 33633                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33634                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33635                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33636                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33637                                  ;
 33638                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33639                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33640                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33641                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33642                                  ;   explanation:
 33643                                  ;
 33644                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33645                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33646                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33647                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33648                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33649                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33650                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33651                                  ;   the
 33652                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33653                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33654                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33655                                  ;
 33656                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33657                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33658                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33659                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33660                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33661                                  ;
 33662                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33663                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33664                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33665                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33666                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33667                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33668                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33669                                  ;
 33670                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33671                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33672                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33673                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33674                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33675                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33676                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33677                                  ;
 33678                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33679                                  
 33680                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33681                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33682                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33683                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33684                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33685                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33686                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33687                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33688                                  
 33689                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33690                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33691                                  
 33692                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33693                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33694                                  
 33695                                  ; 25/09/2023
 33696                                  %if 1	; 27/02/2024
 33697                                  callmagic:
 33698 000059F2 1E                      	push	ds
 33699 000059F3 36FF36[0906]            	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33700 000059F8 CB                      	retf	
 33701                                  %endif
 33702                                  
 33703                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33704                                  %if 1

 33706 000059F9 A3[F00A]                	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],ax
 33707                                  	;jmp	short ALLOCATE
 33708                                  %endif

 33723                                  ;the disk compression software to fail allocations if the
 33724                                  ;FAT would allows allocation, but the free space for compressed
 33725                                  ;data would not.

 33729                                  ;;; but we do know the segment and offset of the routine

 33735                                  	;				;if no patch is present

 33737                                          ;call	callmagic		;this is a near call
 33738                                          ;jnc	short Regular_Allocate_Path
 33739                                  	;jmp	Disk_Full_Return
 33740

 33761                                  	; DOSCODE:9AD6h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 33764 00005A07 31DB                            XOR     BX,BX

 33791                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Ch]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 33792                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Dh]	; MSDOS 6.0
 33793                                          mov     bx,[ES:BP+DPB.NEXT_FREE]
 33794                                          cmp     bx,2
 33795                                          ja	short FINDFRE
 33796                                  
 33797                                  ;   couldn't find enough free space beyond dpb_next_free, or dpb_next_free is
 33798                                  ;   <2 or >dpb_max_clus. Reset it and restart the scan
 33799

 33806                                  %else

 33833 00005A55 7526                    	jnz	short FINDFRE
