 46568                                  ;Break   <PathPref - see if one path is a prefix of another>
 46569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46570                                  ;   PathPref - compare DS:SI with ES:DI to see if one is the prefix of the
 46571                                  ;   other.  Remember that only at a pathchar break are we allowed to have a
 46572                                  ;   prefix: A:\ and A:\FOO
 46573                                  ;
 46574                                  ;   Inputs:     DS:SI potential prefix
 46575                                  ;               ES:DI string
 46576                                  ;   Outputs:    Zero set => prefix found
 46577                                  ;                   DI/SI advanced past matching part
 46578                                  ;               Zero reset => no prefix, DS/SI garbage
 46579                                  ;   Registers modified: CX
 46580                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 46586 00007FE3 75F7                    	jnz	short PathPref_retn	; if NZ then return NZ
 46587 00007FE5 50                      	push	ax			; save char register
 46588 00007FE6 8A44FF                  	MOV     AL,[SI-1]               ; get last byte to match
 46589 00007FE9 E82DDE                  	call    PATHCHRCMP              ; is it a path char (Root!)
 46590 00007FEC 7406                    	JZ	short Prefix		; yes, match root (I hope)
 46591                                  NotSep:                                 ; 2/13/KK
 46592 00007FEE 268A05                  	MOV     AL,[ES:DI]		; get next char to match
 46593 00007FF1 E878FE                  	CALL    PathSepGotCh            ; was it a pathchar?
 46594                                  Prefix:
 46595 00007FF4 58                      	pop	ax			; get back original
 46596 00007FF5 C3                      	retn

 46631                                  ; MSDOS 2.11
 46632                                  ;BREAK <$Open - open a file handle>
 46633                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46634                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 46635                                  ;           LDS     DX, Name
 46636                                  ;           MOV     AH, Open
 46637                                  ;           MOV     AL, access
 46638                                  ;           INT     int_command
 46639                                  ;
 46640                                  ;       ACCESS          Function
 46641                                  ;       ------          --------
 46642                                  ;       open_for_read   file is opened for reading
 46643                                  ;       open_for_write  file is opened for writing
 46644                                  ;       open_for_both   file is opened for both reading and writing.
 46645                                  ;
 46646                                  ;   Error returns:
 46647                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_access
 46648                                  ;              = error_file_not_found
 46649                                  ;              = error_access_denied
 46650                                  ;              = error_too_many_open_files
 46651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46652                                  
 46653                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 46654                                  ;	BREAK <$Open - open a file from a path string>
 46655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46656                                  ;
 46657                                  ;**	$OPen - Open a File
 46658                                  ;
 46659                                  ;	given a path name in DS:DX and an open mode in AL, $Open opens the
 46660                                  ;	file and and returns a handle
 46661                                  ;
 46662                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:DX) = pointer to asciz name
 46663                                  ;		(AL) = open mode
 46664                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 46665                                  ;		  (ax) = file handle
 46666                                  ;		'C' set if error
 46667                                  ;		  (ax) = error code
 46668                                  ;	USES	all
 46669                                  ;
 46670                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46671                                  
 46672                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 46673                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 46674                                  
 46675                                  ; 14/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 46676                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0C194h
 46677                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0AF10h)
 46678                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0A9A7h)
 46679                                  
 46680                                  _$OPEN:       
 46681 00007FFF 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah  ; MSDOS 6.0	
 46682                                  _$Open2:
 46683                                  	;mov	ch,16h
 46684 00008001 B516                    	mov	ch,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory
 46685 00008003 E88502                  	call	SetAttrib
 46686 00008006 B9[FE31]                	mov	cx,DOS_OPEN
 46687                                  
 46688                                  	;xor	ah,ah  ; MSDOS 3.3
 46689                                  
 46690 00008009 50                      	push	ax
 46691                                  
 46692                                  ;*	General file open/create code. The $CREATE call and the various
 46693                                  ;	$OPEN calls all come here.
 46694                                  ;
 46695                                  ;	We'll share a lot of the standard stuff of allocating SFTs, cracking
 46696                                  ;	path names, etc., and then dispatch to our individual handlers.
 46697                                  ;	WARNING - this info and list is just a guess, not definitive - jgl
 46698                                  ;
 46699                                  ;	(TOS) = create mode
 46700                                  ;	(CX) = address of routine to call to do actual function
 46701                                  ;	(DS:DX) = ASCIZ name
 46702                                  ;	SAttrib = Attribute mask
 46703                                  
 46704                                  ;	Get a free SFT and mark it "being allocated"
 46705                                  
 46706                                  AccessFile:
 46707 0000800A E8D498                  	call	ECritSFT
 46708 0000800D E845F7                  	call	SFNFree			; get a free sfn
 46709 00008010 E8FB98                  	call	LCritSFT
 46710                                  	;jc	short OpenFailJ		; oops, no free sft's
 46711                                  	; 14/03/2024
 46712 00008013 7248                    	jc	short OpenFail
 46713                                  
 46714 00008015 36891E[AA05]            	MOV	[SS:SFN],BX		; save the SFN for later;smr;SS Override
 46715 0000801A 36893E[9E05]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT],DI		; save the SF offset	;smr;SS Override
 46716 0000801F 368C06[A005]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT+2],ES	; save the SF segment	;smr;SS Override
 46717                                  
 46718                                  ;	Find a free area in the user's JFN table.
 46719                                  
 46720 00008024 E81BF7                  	call	JFNFree			; get a free jfn
 46721                                  	;jnc	short SaveJFN
 46722                                  	; 14/03/2024
 46723 00008027 7234                    	jc	short OpenFail
 46724                                  	;
 46725                                  ;OpenFailJ:
 46726                                  	;JMP	OpenFail		; there were free JFNs... try SFN
 46727                                  
 46728                                  SaveJFN:
 46729 00008029 36893E[AE05]            	mov	[ss:PJFN],DI		; save the jfn offset	;smr;SS Override
 46730 0000802E 368C06[B005]            	MOV	[ss:PJFN+2],ES		; save the jfn segment	;smr;SS Override
 46731 00008033 36891E[AC05]            	MOV	[ss:JFN],BX		; save the jfn itself	;smr;SS Override
 46732                                  
 46733                                  ;	We have been given an JFN. We lock it down to prevent other tasks from

 46969                                  				; ES:DI -> ASCIZ new filename (no wildcards)

 47211 000081AB BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		   ;AN000;;MS.
 47212 000081AE 16                      	PUSH	SS			   ;AN000;;MS.
 47213 000081AF 07                      	POP	ES			   ;AN000;;MS.es:di-> source

 47215                                  rnloop: 				   ;AN000;

 47265                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 47266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47267                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry. Return a file handle if there
 47268                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 47269                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 47270                                  ;
 47271                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 47272                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 47273                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 47274                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 47275                                  ;		Carry Set:
 47276                                  ;		    AX has error code
 47277                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 47278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47279                                  
 47280                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 47281 000081DC 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack
 47282 000081DD B9[9431]                	MOV	CX,DOS_Create_New	; routine to call
 47283 000081E0 E9F1FE                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open
 47284                                  
 47285                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 47286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47287                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 47288                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 47289                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 47290                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 47291                                  ;
 47292                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 47293                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 47294                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 47295                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 47296                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47297                                  
 47298                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 47299                                  ;BinToAscii:
 47300                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 47301                                  ;bta5:
 47302                                  ;	push    cx
 47303                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 47304                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 47305                                  ;	push    ax
 47306                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 47307                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 47308                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 47309                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 47310                                  ;	add     al,7
 47311                                  ;bta6: 
 47312                                  ;	stosb
 47313                                  ;	pop     ax
 47314                                  ;	pop     cx
 47315                                  ;	loop    bta5
 47316                                  ;	retn
 47317                                  
 47318                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47319                                  ; MSDOS 5.0-6.22 & Windows ME
 47320                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0B0D9h)
 47321                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0ABA4h)
 47322                                  %if 0
 47323                                  
 47324                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 47325                                  BinToAscii:
 47326                                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 47327                                  bta5:	
 47328                                  	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 47329                                  	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 47330                                  	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 47331                                  	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 47332                                  	STOSB				; drop in the character
 47333                                  	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 47334                                  	dec	ch
 47335                                  	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 47336                                  	retn
 47337                                  %else
 47338                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47339                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0C385h
 47340                                  
 47341                                  BinToAscii:
 47342 000081E3 50                      	push	ax		; convert a number to a string ; ax = value
 47343 000081E4 86E0                    	xchg	ah,al
 47344                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47345 000081E6 D410                    	aam	10h		; AH = AL / 16 and AL = remainder
 47346 000081E8 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; 'AA'
 47347 000081EB AB                      	stosw
 47348 000081EC 58                      	pop	ax
 47349                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47350 000081ED D410                    	aam	10h
 47351 000081EF 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; add ax,'AA'
 47352 000081F2 AB                      	stosw
 47353 000081F3 C3                      	retn	
 47354                                  %endif

 47356                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 47357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47358                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 47359                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 47360                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 47361                                  ;
 47362                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 47363                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 47364                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 47365                                  ;		AX has handle
 47366                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 47367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47368                                  
 47369                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47370                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47371                                  
 47372                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 47373                                  	;Enter
 47374 000081F4 55                      	push	bp
 47375 000081F5 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 47376                                  
 47377                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 47378                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 47379                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 47380                                  
 47381 000081F7 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 47382                                  
 47383                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 47384 000081FA F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 47385 000081FE 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 47386                                  
 47387                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 47388                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 47389                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 47390                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 47391                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 47392                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 47393                                  
 47394                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 47395 00008200 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 47396 00008203 EB7A                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 47397                                  
 47398                                  OKatts:
 47399                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 47400 00008205 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 47401                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 47402 00008208 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 47403                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 47404 0000820B 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 47405                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 47406 0000820E 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 47407 00008211 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 47408 00008212 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 47409 00008213 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 47410 00008215 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 47411 00008217 F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 47412                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47413 00008219 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 47414 0000821B 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 47415                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 47416                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47417                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47418 0000821D 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 47419                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 47420                                  okok:					;AN000;
 47421 0000821E 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 47422 00008220 F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 47423                                  					;AN000;
 47424 00008222 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 47425 00008223 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 47426 00008227 E8EFDB                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 47427 0000822A 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 47428                                  STOREPTH:
 47429 0000822C B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 47430 0000822E AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 47431                                  SETENDPTR:
 47432                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 47433 0000822F 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 47434                                  CreateLoop:
 47435 00008232 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 47436 00008233 1F                      	pop	ds
 47437 00008234 55                      	push	bp
 47438 00008235 E84E89                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 47439 00008238 5D                      	pop	bp
 47440                                  ;
 47441                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 47442                                  ;
 47443                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 47444 00008239 C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 47445 0000823C 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 47446 0000823E E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 47447 00008241 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 47448 00008243 E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 47449 00008246 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 47450 00008248 AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 47451                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 47452 00008249 C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 47453                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 47454 0000824C 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 47455 0000824F 55                      	push	bp
 47456 00008250 E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 47457 00008253 5D                      	pop	bp
 47458 00008254 732A                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 47459                                  
 47460                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 47461                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 47462                                  
 47463                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 47464                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 47465                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists
 47466                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; file existed => try with new name
 47467                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_access_denied
 47468                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; access denied (attr mismatch)
 47469                                  
 47470                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47471                                  	;cmp	al,50h
 47472 00008256 3C50                    	CMP	AL,error_file_exists	; Q: did file already exist
 47473 00008258 74D8                    	JZ	short CreateLoop	; Y: try again
 47474                                  	;cmp	al,5
 47475 0000825A 3C05                    	CMP	AL,error_access_denied	; Q: was it access denied
 47476 0000825C 7521                    	JNZ	short SETTMPERR		; N: Error out
 47477                                  					; Y: Check to see if we got this due
 47478                                  					;    to the network drive. Note that
 47479                                  					;    the redir will set the exterr
 47480                                  					;    to error_cannot_make if this is 
 47481                                  					;    so.
 47482                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47483                                  %if 0
 47484                                  	CMP	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_net_access_denied ; M069
 47485                                  					; See if it's REALLY an att mismatch
 47486                                  	je	short SETTMPERR		; no, network error, stop
 47487                                  ;M070
 47488                                  ; If the user failed on an I24, we do not want to try again
 47489                                  ;
 47490                                  	cmp	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_FAIL_I24 ;User failed on I24? ;M070
 47491                                  	;je	short SETTMPERR		;yes, do not try again ;M070
 47492                                  
 47493                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop	;attr mismatch, try again ;M070
 47494                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47495                                  	jne	short CreateLoop ; 10/06/2019 
 47496                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47497                                  	;jz	short SETTMPERR
 47498                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop
 47499                                  %else
 47500                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47501                                  	;;;
 47502 0000825E 36A0[2403]              	mov	al,[ss:EXTERR]
 47503 00008262 3C41                    	cmp	al,41h			; error_net_access_denied
 47504 00008264 7419                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47505 00008266 3C53                    	cmp	al,53h			; error_FAIL_I24
 47506 00008268 7415                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47507 0000826A 3C50                    	cmp	al,50h			; error_file_exists
 47508 0000826C 74C4                    	je	short CreateLoop
 47509 0000826E 36C43E[A205]            	les	di,[ss:THISCDS]
 47510 00008273 83FFFF                  	cmp	di,0FFFFh ; -1
 47511 00008276 74BA                    	je	short CreateLoop	; No CDS
 47512                                  	;;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 47513                                  	;test	word [es:di+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 47514 00008278 26F6454480              	test	byte [es:di+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 47515 0000827D 75B3                    	jnz	short CreateLoop
 47516                                  	;;;
 47517                                  %endif
 47518                                  
 47519                                  ;;	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	; Return this "extended" error
 47520                                  					; M049 - end
 47521                                  SETTMPERR:
 47522 0000827F F9                      	STC
 47523                                  CreateDone:
 47524                                  	;Leave
 47525 00008280 89EC                    	mov	sp,bp
 47526 00008282 5D                      	pop	bp
 47527 00008283 7203                    	JC	short CreateFail
 47528 00008285 E9E283                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; success!
 47529                                  CreateFail:
 47530 00008288 E9E983                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 47531                                  
 47532                                  ;   SetAttrib will set the search attribute (SAttrib) either to the normal
 47533                                  ;   (CH) or to the value in CL if the current system call is through
 47534                                  ;   serverdoscall.
 47535                                  ;
 47536                                  ;   Inputs:	fSharing == FALSE => set sattrib to CH
 47537                                  ;		fSharing == TRUE => set sattrib to CL
 47538                                  ;   Outputs:	none
 47539                                  ;   Registers changed:	CX
 47540                                  
 47541                                  SetAttrib:
 47542                                  	;test	byte [SS:FSHARING],-1		;smr;SS Override
 47543                                  	;jnz	short Set
 47544                                  	; 15/03/2024
 47545 0000828B 36803E[7205]00          	cmp	byte [ss:FSHARING],0
 47546 00008291 7502                    	jnz	short Set
 47547                                  
 47548 00008293 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 47549                                  Set:
 47550 00008295 36880E[6D05]            	mov	byte [ss:SATTRIB],cl		;smr;SS Override
 47551 0000829A C3                      	retn
 47552                                  
 47553                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47554                                  	; 16/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 47555                                  ext_inval2:
 47556                                  	;mov	al,1
 47557 0000829B B001                    	mov	al,error_invalid_function
 47558                                  eo_err:

 47560 0000829D EBE9                    	jmp	short CreateFail

 47567                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 47568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47569                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 47570                                  ;	 BX= mode
 47571                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 47572                                  ;	 DX= flag
 47573                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 47574                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 47575                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 47576                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 47577                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 47578                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE
 47579                                  ; Function: Extended Open
 47580                                  ; Output: carry clear
 47581                                  ;		     AX= handle
 47582                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened
 47583                                  ;			2 file created/opened
 47584                                  ;			3 file replaced/opened
 47585                                  ;	  carry set: AX has error code
 47586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47587                                  
 47588                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47589                                  	; 16/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47590                                  
 47591                                  _$Extended_Open:			  ;AN000;
 47592                                  	;ASSUME	CS:DOSCODE,SS:DOSDATA	  ;AN000;
 47593 0000829F 368916[F405]            	MOV	[SS:EXTOPEN_FLAG],DX	  ;AN000;EO. save ext. open flag;smr;SS Override
 47594 000082A4 36C706[F705]0000        	MOV	word [SS:EXTOPEN_IO_MODE],0 ;AN000;EO. initialize IO mode;smr;SS Override
 47595                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47596 000082AB F6C6FE                  	test	dh,0FEh ; 04/12/2022 
 47597                                  	;;test	dx,0FE00h
 47598                                  	;TEST	DX,RESERVED_BITS_MASK	  ;AN000;EO. reserved bits 0 ?
 47599 000082AE 75EB                    	JNZ	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. no
 47600 000082B0 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL			  ;AN000;EO. make sure flag is right
 47601 000082B2 80FA00                  	CMP	DL,0			  ;AN000;EO. all fail ?
 47602 000082B5 74E4                    	JZ	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. yes, error
 47603                                  	;and	dl,0Fh
 47604 000082B7 80E20F                  	AND	DL,EXISTS_MASK		  ;AN000;EO. get exists action byte
 47605 000082BA 80FA02                  	CMP	DL,2			  ;AN000;EO, > 2
 47606 000082BD 77DC                    	JA	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. yes, error
 47607                                  	;and	ah,0F0h
 47608 000082BF 80E4F0                  	AND	AH,NOT_EXISTS_MASK	  ;AN000;EO. get no exists action byte
 47609 000082C2 80FC10                  	CMP	AH,10H			  ;AN000;EO. > 10
 47610 000082C5 77D4                    	JA	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. yes, error
 47611                                  
 47612 000082C7 368C06[FB05]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_ES],ES		  ;AN000;EO. save API parms;smr;SS Override
 47613 000082CC 36893E[F905]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_DI],DI		  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47614 000082D1 36FF36[F405]            	PUSH	word [SS:EXTOPEN_FLAG]	  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47615 000082D6 368F06[FD05]            	POP	word [SS:SAVE_DX]	  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47616 000082DB 36890E[FF05]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_CX],CX		  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47617 000082E0 36891E[0106]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_BX],BX		  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47618 000082E5 368C1E[0506]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_DS],DS		  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47619 000082EA 368936[0306]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_SI],SI		  ;AN000;EO.;smr;SS Override
 47620 000082EF 89F2                    	MOV	DX,SI			  ;AN000;EO. ds:dx points to file name
 47621 000082F1 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX			  ;AN000;EO. ax= mode
 47622                                  ; 16/03/2024
 47623                                  %if 0
 47624                                  	JMP	SHORT goopen2		  ;AN000;;EO. do normal
 47625                                  ext_inval2:				  ;AN000;;EO.
 47626                                  	;mov	al,1
 47627                                  	mov	al,error_invalid_function ;AN000;EO.. invalid function
 47628                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47629                                  eo_err:

 47631                                  	jmp	short CreateFail
 47632                                  %endif
 47633                                  
 47634                                  ; 16/03/2024
 47635                                  %if 0

 47807                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 47809                                  
 47810                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 47811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47812                                  ;
 47813                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47814                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 47815                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 47816                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 47817                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 47818                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 47819                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 47820                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 47821                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47822                                  ;
 47823                                  ;   Error returns:
 47824                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 47825                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 47826                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 47827                                  ;
 47828                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47829                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 47830                                  ;
 47831                                  ;				    0? lock all
 47832                                  ;				    8? lock write
 47833                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 47834                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 47835                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 47836                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 47837                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 47838                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 47839                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 47840                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 47841                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47842                                  ;
 47843                                  ;   Error returns:
 47844                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 47845                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 47846                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 47847                                  ;
 47848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47849                                  
 47850                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47851                                  
 47852                                  	; 17/03/2024
 47853                                  	; 16/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47854

 48076                                  	JMP	short ValChk
 48077                                  %endif

 48081                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(6*4)]	; 6 = Set_Block ;smr;SS Override

 48087                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 48088                                  ; LOCK_CHECK
 48089                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 48090                                  
 48091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48092                                  ; Inputs:
 48093                                  ;	Outputs of SETUP
 48094                                  ;	[USER_ID] Set
 48095                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 48096                                  ; Function:
 48097                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 48098                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 48099                                  ; Outputs:
 48100                                  ;    Carry clear
 48101                                  ;	Operation is OK
 48102                                  ;    Carry set
 48103                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 48104                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 48105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48106                                  
 48107                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48108                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48109                                  LOCK_CHECK:
 48110 00008413 8B1E[1A00]              	MOV	BX,[RetryCount]	; Number retries
 48111                                  LockRetry:
 48112 00008417 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 48113 00008418 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48114                                  
 48115                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 48116                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48117                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 48118 00008419 FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48119                                  
 48120 0000841D 58                      	pop	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48121 0000841E 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 48122 0000841F 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 48123                                  LockN:
 48124 00008421 E8B693                  	call	Idle		; wait a while
 48125 00008424 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 48126 00008425 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 48127 00008427 F9                      	STC
 48128                                  lc_ret_label:
 48129 00008428 C3                      	retn

 48298                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+29h]
 48299 000084AA 268B5629                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR]
 48300                                  sharev_2: 
 48301                                  	;;;

 48311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48312                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 48313                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 48314                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 48315                                  ;
 48316                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 48317                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 48318                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 48319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48320                                  
 48321                                  ShareEnd:
 48322                                  	; 26/07/2019
 48323 000084BA FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 48324 000084BE C3                      	retn
 48325                                  
 48326                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 48327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48328                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 48329                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 48330                                  ;
 48331                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 48332                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 48333                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 48334                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 48335                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 48336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48337                                  
 48338                                  ShareEnter:
 48339 000084BF 51                      	push	cx
 48340                                  retry:
 48341 000084C0 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 48342                                  attempt:
 48343 000084C4 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 48344 000084C8 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 48345                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],ax
 48346 000084CA 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 48347 000084CE 51                      	push	cx
 48348 000084CF E8A4FF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 48349 000084D2 59                      	pop	cx
 48350 000084D3 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 48351 000084D5 E80293                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 48352 000084D8 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 48353 000084DA E89EFF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 48354 000084DD 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 48355                                  done:
 48356 000084DF 59                      	pop	cx
 48357 000084E0 C3                      	retn

 48365                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 48366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48367                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 48368                                  ;
 48369                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 48370                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 48371                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 48372                                  ;
 48373                                  ;	Revision history:
 48374                                  ;
 48375                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 48376                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48377                                  
 48378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48379                                  ;
 48380                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 48381                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 48382                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 48383                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 48384                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 48385                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 48386                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 48387                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 48388                                  ;
 48389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48390                                  
 48391                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 48392                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 48393                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 48394                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 48395                                  
 48396                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 48397                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48398                                  
 48399                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 48400                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 48401                                  
 48402                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 48403                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 48404                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 48405                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 48406                                  
 48407                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 48408                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48409                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 48410                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 48412                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 48413                                  ;
 48414                                  ;struc ERStruc
 48415                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 48416                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 48417                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 48418                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 48419                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 48420                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 48421                                  ; .size:
 48422                                  ;endstruc
 48423                                  
 48424                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 48425                                  
 48426                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48427                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48428                                  
 48429                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48430                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48431                                  
 48432                                  	; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48433                                  	; DOSCODE:C697h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 48434                                  
 48435                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 48436                                  
 48437                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48438                                  ;
 48439                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 48440                                  ;
 48441                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 48442                                  ;
 48443                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48444                                  
 48445                                  ExecReady:
 48446 000084E1 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 48447                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48448                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48449 000084E3 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48450                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 48451 000084E7 7418                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 48452                                  
 48453                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48454 000084E9 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48455 000084EC 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 48456 000084EF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 48457                                  
 48458                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 48459 000084F1 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 48460                                  	;mov	ax,[si+12]	; 11/04/2024
 48461 000084F4 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 48462                                  
 48463                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 48464 000084F7 36FF16[670D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 48465                                  	
 48466                                  	; 20/03/2024
 48467                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48468 000084FC 36FF16[3E13]            	call	word [ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 48469                                  
 48470                                  er_setver:
 48471                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 48472                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48473 00008501 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 48474                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 48475 00008505 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 48476                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 48477 00008507 1E                      	push	ds
 48478 00008508 56                      	push	si
 48479                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 48480 00008509 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 48481 0000850C E8D2EC                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 48482 0000850F E8E3EC                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 48483 00008512 5E                      	pop	si
 48484 00008513 1F                      	pop	ds
 48485                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 48486 00008514 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48487 00008517 36A1[BB0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 48488                                  	;mov	[es:40h],ax ; 11/04/2024
 48489 0000851B 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 48490                                  
 48491                                  er_chkdoshi:
 48492 0000851F 36803E[660D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 48493 00008525 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 48494                                  
 48495                                  					; M068 - Start
 48496                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48497 00008527 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 48498                                  
 48499                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 48500 0000852A 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 48501                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 48502                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 48503                                  					; explanation
 48504                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48505                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48506 00008530 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48507                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 48508 00008534 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 48509                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 48510 00008536 1E                         	push	ds
 48511 00008537 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 48512 00008539 E8AD05                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 48513 0000853C 1F                      	pop	ds
 48514                                  
 48515                                  er_setA20:
 48516                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 48517                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 48518                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 48519                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 48520                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 48521                                  
 48522 0000853D 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 48523 00008542 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 48524                                  					; turned OFF.
 48525                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 48526 00008546 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 48527 00008548 C3                      	retn
 48528
