 55525                                  ;============================================================================
 55526                                  ; MPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1993)
 55527                                  ;============================================================================
 55528                                  ; 27/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 55529                                  
 55530                                  ;mpatch.asm -- holds data patch location for callouts 
 55531                                  ; -- allocate cluster in rom.asm
 55532                                  ;
 55533                                  ; This area is pointed to by OffsetMagicPatch[609h] in fixed DOS data.
 55534                                  ; Currently, this location is used only by magicdrv.sys's patch to
 55535                                  ; cluster allocation, however it can be expanded to be used by other
 55536                                  ; patches. This is important since we have an easy-access pointer to
 55537                                  ; this location in OffsetMagicPatch. Magicdrv.sys is guaranteed to
 55538                                  ; only patch out a far call/retf, so any space after that could be
 55539                                  ; used as a patch by using OffsetMagicPatch+6. See rom.asm on how
 55540                                  ; to call out here.
 55541                                  ;
 55542                                  ; Currently, we allocate only the minimum space required for the 6
 55543                                  ; byte magicdrv patch, so if you change the dos data, you may want
 55544                                  ; to reserve space here if your new data will be position dependent
 55545                                  ; and would prohibit growing of this table.
 55546                                  ;
 55547                                  ;history	-	created 8-7-92 by scottq
 55548                                  ;		-	added Rational386PatchPtr 2-1-93 by jimmat
 55549                                  ;
 55550                                  ;Exported Functions
 55551                                  ;==================
 55552                                  ;MagicPatch     -       callout patched by magidrv.sys for cluster allocations
 55553                                  
 55554                                  ; DosData Segment
 55555                                  
 55556                                  ; DOSDATA:1362h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 55557                                  
 55558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 55559                                  
 55560                                  ; Rational386PatchPtr points to either a RET instruction (80286 or less) or
 55561                                  ; a routine to fix buggy versions of the Rational DOS Extender (80386 or
 55562                                  ; greater). Added to this file because it needed to be somewhere and is
 55563                                  ; 'patch' related.
 55564                                  
 55565                                  Rational386PatchPtr:
 55566 0000133E 0000                    	dw	0	; points to patch routine or RET instr.
 55567                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 55568                                  
 55569                                  ; 25/03/2024
 55570                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSDATA:1340h
 55571                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - DOSDATA:133Eh)
 55572                                  
 55573                                  MagicPatch:
 55574                                  ;MagicPatch proc far
 55575 00001340 CB                              retf            ;default is to just return to allocate
 55576 00001341 90                              nop             ;however, this code will be patched
 55577 00001342 90                              nop             ;by magicdrv.sys to
 55578 00001343 90                              nop             ; call far ?:?     
 55579 00001344 90                              nop             ; retf or perhaps just jmp far
 55580 00001345 90                              nop             ;retf/nop take one byte, so we need six instructions
 55581                                                          ;for 6 byte patch
 55582                                  ;MagicPatch endp
 55583                                  
 55584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 55585                                  
 55586                                  ;DosData Ends
 55587                                  
 55588                                  ; MSDOS 5.0-6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSDATA:136Ah
 55589                                  ;
 55590                                  ; 25/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 55591                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSDATA:1346h
 55592                                  
 55593                                  ;; Windows ME IO.SYS
 55594                                  ;; db 12 dup(0)
 55595                                  
 55596                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - DOSDATA:1344h)
